K10divav33u:2: ekasin samaye bhagavān śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma/
K10divav33u:4: p.1.2/.atha^āyuṣmān ānandaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātra^cīvaram ādāya śrāvastīṃ mahā^nagarīṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat/
K10divav33u:5: atha^āyuṣmān ānandaḥ śrāvastīṃ piṇḍāya caritvā kṛta^bhakta^kṛtyo yenānyatamam udapānaṃ tena^upasaṃkrāntaḥ/
K10divav33u:6: p.1.3/.tena khalu samayena tasminn udapāne prakṛtir nāma mātaṅga^dārikā udakam uddharate sma/
K10divav33u:7: atha^āyuṣmān ānandaḥ prakṛtiṃ mātaṅga^dārikām etad avocat/
K10divav33u:9: p.1.4/.evaṃ kite prakṛtir mātaṅga^dārikāyuṣmantam ānandam idam avocat/
K10divav33u:11: na^ahaṃ te bhagini kulaṃ vā jātiṃ vā pṛcchāmi/
K10divav33u:12: api tu sacette parityaktaṃ pānīyaṃ dehi pāsyāmi/
K10divav33u:13: p.1.5/.atha prakṛtir mātaṅga^dārikāyuṣmantam ānandāya pānīyam adāt/
K10divav33u:15: p.1.6/.atha prakṛtir mātaṅga^dārikāyuṣmanta ānandsya śarīre mukhe svare sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca nimittam udgṛhītvā yoniśo manasikāreṇāviṣṭā saṃrāgacittam utpādayati (1) sma/
K10divav33u:16: āryo me ānandaḥ svāmī ayād iti/
K10divav33u:17: mātā ca me mahā^vidyādharī sā śakṣyaty āryam ānandam ānayitum/
K10divav33u:18: p.2.1/.atha prakṛtir mātaṅga^dārikā pānīyaghaṭam ādāya yena caṇḍāla^gṛhaṃ tena^upasaṃkramya pānīya^ghaṭam ekānte nikṣipya svāṃ jananīm idam
K10divav33u:19: p.2.2/.yat khalv evam amba jānīyā ānando nāma śramaṇo mahāśramaṇa^gautamasya śrāvaka upasthāyakas tam ahaṃ svāminam icchāmi/
K10divav33u:23: sthāpayitvā yo mṛtaḥ syād yo vā vīta^rāgaḥ/
K10divav33u:24: api ca rājā prasenajit kauśalaḥ śramaṇa^gautamam atīva sevate bhajate paryupāsate/
K10divav33u:28: p.2.4/.evam uktā prakṛtir mātaṅga^dārikā mātaram idam avocat/
K10divav33u:29: sa ced amba śramaṇo gautamā vīta^rāgastasya^antikāc chramaṇam ānandaṃ na pratilapsye jīvitaṃ parityajeyaṃ sa cet pratilipsye jīvāmi/
K10divav33u:30: p.2.5/.mā te putri jīvitaṃ parityajasi ānayāmi śramaṇam ānandam/
K10divav33u:31: p.2.6 /.atha prakṛter mātaṅga^dārikāyā mātā madhye gṛhāṅganasya gomayenopalepanaṃ
K10divav33u:32: kṛtvā vedīm ālipya darbhān saṃstīrya^agniṃ prajvālya^aṣṭaśatam arka^puṣpāṇāṃ gṛhītvā
K10divav33u:33: mantrān āvartayamānā ekaikam arka^puṣpaṃ parijapya agnau pratikṣipati sma /
K10divav33u:37: icchayā devo varṣati vidyotati gajeti vismayaṃ mahā^rājasya samabhivardhāyituṃ devebhyo manuṣyebhyo gandharvebhyoḥ śikhi^grahā devā viśikhi^gra(@)
K10divav33u:38: hā devā ānandasya^āgamanāya saṃgamanāya kramaṇāya grahaṇāya juhomi svāhā/
K10divav33u:40: sa vihārān niṣkramya yena caṇḍāla^gṛhaṃ tena^upasaṃkrāmati sma/
K10divav33u:41: p.3.3/.adrākṣīc caṇḍālī āyuṣmantam ānandaṃ dūrād eva^āgacchantaṃ/
K10divav33u:42: dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ prakṛtiṃ duhitaram idam avocat/
K10divav33u:43: ayam asau putri śramaṇa ānanda āgacchati śayanaṃ prajñapaya/
K10divav33u:44: p.3.4/.atha prakṛtir mātaṅga^dārikā hṛṣṭa^tuṣṭā pramudita^manā āyuṣmata ānandasya śayyāṃ prajñapayati sma/
K10divav33u:47: ekānta^sthitaḥ sa punar āyuṣmān ānandaḥ prārodīd/
K10divav33u:49: vyasana^prāpto +aham asmi na ca me bhagavān samanvāharati/
K10divav33u:50: p.3.6/.atha bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandaṃ samanvāharati sma/
K10divav33u:56: p.4.1cd/.ītayo yatra śāmyanti bhayāni calitāni ca/
K10divav33u:57: p.4.2ab/.tad vai devā namsyanti sarva^siddhāś ca yoginaḥ/
K10divav33u:59: p.4.3/.atha^āyuṣmān ānandaḥ pratihata^caṇḍāla^mantraś caṇḍāla^gṛhān niṣkramya yena svako vihāras tena^upasaṃkramitum ārabdhaḥ/
K10divav33u:61: ānandam āyuṣmantaṃ pratigacchantaṃ dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ svāṃ jananīm idam avocat/
K10divav33u:62: ayam asau mātaḥ śramaṇa ānandaḥ pratigacchati/
K10divav33u:64: niyataṃ putri śramaṇena gautamena samanvāhṛto bhaviṣyati/
K10divav33u:67: kiṃ punar amba balavattarāḥ śramaṇasya gautamasya mantrā na^asmākaṃ/
K10divav33u:70: ye putri mantāḥ sarva^lokasya prabhavanti tān mantrān śramaṇo gautama ākāṅkṣamāṇaḥ pratihanti/
K10divav33u:71: na punar lokaḥ prabhavati śramaṇasya gautamasya mantrān pratihantuṃ/
K10divav33u:75: p.4.6/.ekānta^sthitam āyuṣmantam ānandaṃ bhagavān idam avocat/
K10divav33u:76: udgṛhṇa tvam ānanda imāṃ ṣaḍakṣarīvidyāṃ dhāraya vācaya paryavāpnuhi/
K10divav33u:77: ātmano hitāya sukhāya bhikṣūṇāṃ bhikṣuṇīnām upāsakānām upasikānāṃ hitāya sukhāya/
K10divav33u:78: iyam ānanda ṣaḍkṣarīvidyā ṣaḍbhiḥ samyak saṃbuddhair bhāṣitā caturbhiś ca mahā^rājaiḥ śakreṇa devānām indreṇa brahmaṇā ca sahāpatinā/
K10divav33u:81: tvam apy etarhy ānanda tāṃ dhāraya vācaya paryavāpnuhi/
K10divav33u:83: p.5.1/.aṇḍare pāṇḍare kāraṇḍe keyūre +arci^haste khara^grīve bandhu^mati cīra^mati dharavidha cilimile viloḍaya viṣāṇi loke/
K10divav33u:85: gola^mati gaṇḍavile cilimile sa^atinimne yathā saṃvibhakta^gola^mati gaṇḍa^vilāyai svāhā/
K10divav33u:86: p.5.2/.yaḥ kaś cid ānanda^ṣaḍakṣaryā vidyayā paritrāṇaṃ svastyayanaṃ kuryāt sa yadi vadha^arho bhavet daṇḍena mucyate/
K10divav33u:87: daṇḍa^arhaḥ prahāreṇa prahāra^arhaḥ paribhāṣaṇayā paribhāṣaṇa^arho romaharṣaṇena romaharṣaṇa^arhaḥ punar eva mucyate/
K10divav33u:88: p.5.3 /.na^aham ānanda taṃ samanupaśyāmi sa^deva^loke samāra^loke sabrahma^loke saśramaṇa^brāhmaṇikāyāṃ
K10divav33u:89: prajāyāṃ sa^deva^mānuṣikāyāṃ sa^asurāyāṃ yas tv anayā ṣaḍakṣayaṃ vidyayā rakṣāyāṃ
K10divav33u:90: kṛtāyāṃ rakṣā^sūtre bāhau baddhe svastyayane kṛte +abhibhavituṃ śakroti varjayitvā
K10divav33u:92: p.6.1 /.atha prakṛtir mātaṅga^dārikā tasyā eva rātryā atyayāt śiraḥ^snātā +anāhata
K10divav33u:93: dūṣya^prāvṛtā muktā^mālya^ābharaṇā yena śrāvasto nagarī tena^upasaṃkramya nagara^dvāre
K10divav33u:97: p.6.2/.atha^āyuṣmān ānandaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātra^cīvaram ādāya śrāvastīṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat/
K10divav33u:99: dūrata eva dṛṣṭvā ca punar āyuṣmantam ānandaṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhā gacchantam anugacchati tiṣṭhantam anutiṣṭhati/
K10divav33u:100: yad yad eva kulaṃ piṇḍāya praviśati tasya tasyaiva dvāre tūṣṇībhūtā tiṣṭhati āyuṣmantam
K10divav33u:103: pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhāṃ dṛṣṭvā ca punar jehrīymāṇarūpo +apragalbhāyamānarūpo duḥkhī durmanāḥ śīghraṃ śīghraṃ śrāvastyā vinirgamya yena jetavanaṃ tanopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
K10divav33u:105: ekānta^sthita āyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam idam avocat/
K10divav33u:107: prakṛtir mātaṅga^dārikā pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhā gacchantam anugacchati,
K10divav33u:109: yad yad eva kulaṃ piṇḍāya praviśāmi tasya tasyaiva dvāre tūṣṇībhūtā tiṣṭhati/
K10divav33u:110: trāhi me bhagavan trāhi me sugata/
K10divav33u:111: p.6.4/.evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam idam avocat/
K10divav33u:113: atha bhagavān prakṛtiṃ mātaṅga^dārikām idam avocat/
K10divav33u:114: hiṃ te prakṛte mātaṅga^dārike ānandena bhikṣuṇā/
K10divav33u:122: p.7.1/.atha prakṛtir mātaṅga^dārikā bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavantaṃ triḥpradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavato +antikāt
K10divav33u:125: ekānta^sthitā svakau mātā pitarāv idam avocat/
K10divav33u:127: p.7.2/.atha prakṛter mātaṅga^dārikāyā mātāpitarau prakṛtim ādāya yana bhagavāms tena^upasaṃkrāntau/
K10divav33u:128: uapsaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā^ekānte nyaṣīdatāṃ/
K10divav33u:129: atha prakṛtir mātaṅga^dārikā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā banditvā ekānte +asthād/
K10divav33u:132: p.7.3/.atha bhagavān prakṛter mātaṅga^dārikāyā mātāpitarāv idam avoct/
K10divav33u:136: tena hi yūyaṃ prakṛtim apahāya gacchata svagṛham/
K10divav33u:137: p.7.4/.atha prakṛter mātaṅga^dārikāyā mātāpitarau bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavantaṃ triḥpradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavato +antikāt prakrāntau/
K10divav33u:138: p.7.5/.atha prakṛter mātaṅga^dārikāyā mātāpitarāv aciraprakrāntau viditvā bhagavān prakṛtiṃ mātaṅga^dārikām idm avocat/
K10divav33u:142: tena hi prakṛte ya ānandasya veśaḥ sa tvayā dhārayitavyaḥ/
K10divav33u:147: p.8.1/.atha bhagavān prakṛtiṃ mātaṅga^dārikām idam avocat/
K10divav33u:149: p.8.2/.evam ukte prakṛtir mātaṅga^dārikā bhagavatā muṇḍā kāṣāya^prāvṛtā/
K10divav33u:150: atha bhagavān prakṛtiṃ mātaṅga^dārikām ehi bhikṣuṇīvādena pravrājayitvā dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati sma,
K10divav33u:154: yeyaṃ kathā dīrgha^rātraṃ saṃsārasamāpannānāṃ pratikūlā śravaṇīyā/
K10divav33u:157: ādīnavaṃ niḥsaraṇaṃ bhayaṃ saṃkleśavyavadānaṃ bodhipakṣāṃs tān dharmān bhagvān prakṛtyai bhikṣuṇyai saṃprakāśayati sma/
K10divav33u:158: p.8.3 /.atha prakṛtir bhikṣuṇī bhagavatā dharmyaya kathayā saṃdarśitā samādāpitā
K10divav33u:159: samuttejitā saṃpraharṣitā hṛṣṭa^cittā kalyāṇacittā muditacittā vinīvaraṇacittā ṛjucittā
K10divav33u:161: p.9.1 /.yadā ca bhagavān jñātaḥ prakṛtiṃ bhikṣuṇīṃ hṛṣṭa^cittāṃ kalyāṇacittāṃ muditacittāṃ
K10divav33u:162: vinivaraṇacittāṃ bhavyāṃ pratibalāṃ sāmutkarpikīṃ dharma^deśanām ājñātuṃ tadā yeyaṃ
K10divav33u:164: yad uta duḥkhaṃ samudayo nirodho mārgaḥ,
K10divav33u:165: tāṃ bhagavān prakṛter bhikṣuṇyā vistareṇa saṃprakāśayati sma/
K10divav33u:166: p.9.2/.atha prakṛtibhikṣuṇī tasminn evāsane niṣaṇṇā caturārya^satyānyabhijñātāsit/
K10divav33u:168: tad yathā vastām apagatakālakaṃ rajanopagataṃ raṅga^udake prakṣiptaṃ samyag eva raṅgaṃ
K10divav33u:169: pratigṛhṇīyād evam eva prakṛtir bhikṣuṇī tasminnevāsane niṣaṇṇā caturārya^satyāni abhisamayati sma,
K10divav33u:170: tad yathā duḥkhaṃ sumudayaṃ nirodhaṃ mārgam/
K10divav33u:171: p.9.3 /.atha prakṛtir bhikṣuṇī kṛṣṭa^dharmā prāpta^dharmā vidita^dharmā akopya^dharmā
K10divav33u:174: dharmeṣu bhagavataḥ pādayoḥ śirasā nipatya bhagavantam idam avocat /
K10divav33u:175: p.9.4/.atyayo me bhagavann atyayo me sugata/
K10divav33u:176: yathā bālā yathā mūḍhā yathā +avyaktā yathā +akuśalā duṣprajña^jātīyā yāham ānandaṃ bhikṣuṃ svāmi^vādena samudācarṣaṃ/
K10divav33u:181: atas tasyā mama bhagavann atyayam atyayato jānātu pratigṛhṇātu
K10divav33u:184: āyatyāṃ saṃvarāya sthitvā tvaṃ prakṛte +atyayam atyayato +adhyāgamaḥ/
K10divav33u:185: yathā bālā yathā mūḍhā yathā +avyaktā yathā +akuśalā duṣprajña^jātīya tvam ānandaṃ bhikṣuṃ svāmi^vādena (10)
K10divav33u:187: yataś ca tvaṃ prakṛte +atyayaṃ jānāsi atyayaṃ paśyasi āyatyāṃ ca saṃvaram āpadyase,
K10divav33u:188: aham api te +atyayam atyayato gṛhṇāmi/ vṛddhir
K10divav33u:189: eva te prakṛte pratikāṅkṣatavyā kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ na hāniḥ/
K10divav33u:190: p.10.1/.atha prakṛtir bhikṣuṇī bhagavatā^abhinanditā anuśiṣṭā ekāvyapakṛṣṭā +apramattā ātāpinī smṛtim atī saṃprajānā prahitāni viviktāni viharati
K10divav33u:191: yad arthaṃ kula^duhitaraḥ keśān avatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇy ācchādya samyag eva śraddhayā^āgārād
K10divav33u:192: anāgārikāṃ pravrajanti tadanuttara^brahmacarya^paryavasānaṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharme svayam
K10divav33u:195: kṣīṇā me jātir uṣitaṃ brahmacaryaṃ kṛtaṃ karaṇīyaṃ na^aparamasmād bhavaṃ prajānāmi^iti/
K10divav33u:196: p.10.2/.aśrauṣuḥ śrāvasteyakā brāhmaṇa^gṛhapatayo bhagavatā kila canḍāla^dārikā pravrājiteti/
K10divav33u:198: kathaṃ hi nāma caṇḍāla^dārikā bhikṣūṇāṃ samyakcaryāṃ cariṣyati/
K10divav33u:200: kathaṃ hi nāma caṇḍāla^dārikā brahma^kṣatriya^gṛhapati^mahā^śāla^kuleṣu pravekṣyati/
K10divav33u:201: p.11.1/.aśrauṣīd rājā prasenajit kauśalo bhagavatā caṇḍāla^dārikā pravrājiteti/
K10divav33u:203: kathaṃ hi nāma caṇḍāla^dārikā bhikṣūṇāṃ samyak^caryāṃ cariṣyati/
K10divav33u:206: p.11.2/.vimṛṣya ca bhadaraṃ yānaṃ yojayitvā bhadraṃ yānam abhiruhya saṃbahulaiś ca śrāvasteyair brāhmaṇa^gṛhapatibhiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ śrāvastyā niryāti sma/
K10divav33u:208: tasya khalu yāvatī yānasya bhūmis tāvad yānena gatvā sa yānād avatīrya pattikāya^parivṛtaḥ pattikāya^puraskṛtaḥ padbhyām eva^ārāmaṃ prāvikṣat/
K10divav33u:210: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
K10divav33u:211: te +api saṃbahulāḥ śrāvasteyakā brāhmaṇa^kṣatirya^gṛhapatayo bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā^ekānte niṣaṇṇāḥ/
K10divav33u:212: apy aikatyā bhagavatā sārdhaṃ saṃmukhaṃ saṃrañjanīṃ saṃmodinīṃ vividhāṃ kathāṃ vyatisārya^ekānte niṣaṇṇāḥ/
K10divav33u:215: apy aikatya yena bhagavāṃs tena^añjaliṃ praṇamya^ekānte niṣaṇṇāḥ/
K10divav33u:216: apy aikatyās tūṣṇīṃ bhūtā ekānte niṣaṇṇāḥ/
K10divav33u:217: p.11.3 /.atha bhagavān rājānaṃ prasenajitaṃ kauśalam ārabhya teṣāṃ ca saṃbahulānāṃ
K10divav33u:218: śrāvasteyakānāṃ brāhmaṇa^kṣatriya^gṛhapatīnāṃ cetasā cittam ājñāya prakṛter bhikṣuṇyāḥ
K10divav33u:220: icchatha yūyaṃ bhikṣavas tathā^āgatasya sammukhaṃ prakṛter bhikṣuṇyāḥ pūrva^nivāsam ārabhya dharma^kathāṃ śrotum/
K10divav33u:222: etasya bhagavan kāla etasya sugata samayo yad bhagavān prakṛter bhikṣuṇyāḥ pūrva^nivāsam ārabhya dharma^kathāṃ kathāyet/
K10divav33u:226: tena hi bhikṣavaḥ śṛṇuta sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuruta bhāṣiṣye/
K10divav33u:227: evaṃ sādhu bhagavann iti te bhikṣavo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣuḥ/ bhagavāṃs
K10divav33u:229: p.12.1/.bhūta^pūrvaṃ bhikṣavo +atīte +adhvani gaṅgā^taṭe +atimukta^kadalī^pāṭalaka^āmalakī vana^gahana^pradeśe tatra triśaṅkur nāma mātaṅga^rājaḥ prativasati sma/
K10divav33u:231: sa punar bhikṣavas triśaṅkur mātaṅga^rajaḥ pūrva^janma^adhītān vedān samanusmarati sma sa^aṅga^upāṅgān sarahasyān sanighaṇṭa^kaiṭabhān sa^akṣara^prabhedān
K10divav33u:233: padako vaiyākaraṇo lokāyata^yajña^mantre mahā^puruṣa^lakṣaṇe niṣṇāto niṣkāṅkṣo bhāṣyaṃ ca yathārdharmaṃ veda^vrata^padāny anuśrutaṃ ca bhāṣate
K10divav33u:234: p.12.2/.tasya triśaṅkur mātaṅga^rājasya śārdūakarṇo nāma kumāro +abhūd utpannaḥ/
K10divav33u:235: rūpataś ca kulataś ca śīlataś ca guṇataś ca sarva^guṇaiś ca^upeto +abhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ paramayā śubha^varṇa^puṣkalatayā samanvāgataḥ/
K10divav33u:237: śārdūlakarṇaṃ kumāraṃ pūrva^janmādhītān vedān adhyāpayati sma/
K10divav33u:238: yad uta sa^aṅga^upāṅgān sarahasyān sanighaṇṭa^kaiṭabhān sa^akṣara^prabhedān itihāsa^pañca^mānanyāni ca śāstrāṇi bhāṣyaṃ ca yathā^dharmaṃ veda^vrata^padāni/
K10divav33u:240: ayaṃ mama putraḥ śārdūlakarṇo nāma kumāraḥ/
K10divav33u:241: upeto rūpataś ca kulataś ca śīlataś ca guṇataś ca/
K10divav33u:243: darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ paramayā ca varṇa^puṣkalatayā samanvāgataḥ/
K10divav33u:245: samayo +ayaṃ yan ny aham asya niveśana^dharmaṃ kariṣye/ tat kuto ny
K10divav33u:246: avaṃ śārdūlakarṇasya putrasya śīlavatīṃ guṇavatīṃ rūpavatīṃ pratirūpāṃ prajāvatīṃ labheyam iti/checked
K10divav33u:247: p.13.1/.tasmin khalu samaye puṣkarasārī nāma brāhmaṇa utkūṭaṃ nāma droṇa^mukhaṃ paribhuṅkte sma/
K10divav33u:248: samapta^utsadaṃ sa^tṛṇa^kāṣṭha^udakaṃ dhānya^sahagataṃ rājñā +agnidattena brahma^deyaṃ dattam/
K10divav33u:249: p.13.2/.puṣkarasārī punar brāhmaṇa upetaḥ mātṛtaḥ pitṛtaḥ saṃśuddho gṛhiṇyāmanākṣipto jātivādena gotra^vādena yāvad āsaptamamātāmahapitāmahaṃ/
K10divav33u:250: yugapad upādhyāyo +adhyāpako mantra^dharas trayāṇāṃ vedānāṃ pāragaḥ sa^aṅga^upāṅgānāṃ
K10divav33u:255: p.13.3/.puṣkarasāriṇo brāhmaṇasya prakṛtir nāma māṇavikā duhitā bhūtā/
K10divav33u:256: upetā rūpataś ca kulataś ca śīlataś ca guṇataś ca/
K10divav33u:257: sarva^guṇa^upetā +abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā paramayā varṇa^puṣkalatayā samanvāgatā śīlavatī guṇavatī/
K10divav33u:264: sasapta^utsadaṃ satṛṇa^kāṣṭha^udakaṃ dhānya^bhogaiḥ sahagataṃ rājñā +agnidattena brahma^deyaṃ dattam/
K10divav33u:265: p.14.1 /.tasya puṣkarasāriṇo brāhmaṇasya prakṛtir nāma māṇavikā duhitā upetā rūpataś
K10divav33u:266: ca kulataś ca śīlataś ca sarva^guṇa^upetā +abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā paramayā
K10divav33u:268: śīlavatī guṇavatī putrasya me śārdūlakarṇasya pratirūpā patnī bhaviṣyatiti/
K10divav33u:269: p.14.2 /.atra triśaṅkur mātaṅga^rāja etam evārthaṃ bahulaṃ rātrau cintayitvā vitarkya
K10divav33u:270: tasyā eva rātryā atyayāt pratyūṣa^kāla^samaye sarva^śvetaṃ vaḍavā ratham abhiruhya
K10divav33u:273: p.14.3 /.atha triśaṅkur mātaṅga^rāja utkūṭasya^uttarapūrveṇa sumanaskaṃ nāma^udyānaṃ
K10divav33u:274: nānā^vṛkṣa^saṃcchannaṃ nānā^vṛkṣa^kusumitaṃ nānā^dvijanikūjitaṃ nandanam iva devānāṃ tad upasaṃkrāntaḥ /
K10divav33u:276: brāhmaṇaḥ puṣkarasārī māṇavakān mantrān vācayitum ihāgamiṣyati^iti/
K10divav33u:277: p.14.4/.atha brāhmaṇaḥ puṣkarasārī tasyā eva rātryā atyayāt sarva^śvetaṃ vaḍavāratham abhiruhya śiṣyagaṇaprivṛtaḥ pañca^mātrair māṇavaka^śateḥ puraskṛta utkūṭān niryti sma,
K10divav33u:279: p.15.1 /.adrākṣīt triśaṅkur mātaṅga^rājo brāhmaṇaṃ puṣkarasāriṇaṃ sūryam iva^udayantaṃ
K10divav33u:280: tejasā jvalantam iva hutavahaṃ yajñam iva brāhmaṇa^parivṛtaṃ śakram iva deva^gaṇaparivṛtaṃ
K10divav33u:281: haimavantam ivauṣadhibhiḥ samudram iva ratnaiś candram iva nakṣatrair vaiśravaṇam
K10divav33u:282: iva yakṣa^gaṇair brahmāṇam iva deva^rṣigaṇaiḥ parivṛtaṃ śobhamānaṃ /
K10divav33u:286: kāryaṃ ca te vakṣyāmi tac chrūyatāṃ/
K10divav33u:287: evam ukte brāhmaṇaḥ puṣkarasārī triśaṅkumātaṅga^rājam idam avocat/
K10divav33u:288: p.15.3/.na hi bhos triśaṅko śakyaṃ brāhmaṇena saha bhoḥ kāraṃ kartuṃ/
K10divav33u:289: p.15.4/.ahaṃ bhoḥ puṣkarasārin śaknomi bhoḥ kāraṃ kartuṃ/
K10divav33u:290: yacchakyaṃ me kartuṃ bhavati naiva tacchakyaṃ te kartuṃ/
K10divav33u:291: api tu catvāro bhoḥ puṣkarasārin puruṣasya kāryasamārambhāḥ pūrva^samārabdhā bhavanti/
K10divav33u:292: yad uta ātmārthaṃ vā parārthaṃ vātmīyārthaṃ (16)
K10divav33u:294: idaṃ ca^atra mahattaraṃ kāryaṃ yat te vyākhyāsyāmi tac chrūyatāṃ/ putrāya
K10divav33u:295: me śārdūlakarṇāya prakṛtiṃ duhitaram utsṛja bhāryā^arthāya/
K10divav33u:297: p.16.1 /.idaṃ ca khalu punarvacanaṃ śrutvā triśaṅkor mātaṅga^rājasya bhṛśaṃ brāhmaṇaḥ
K10divav33u:298: puṣkarasārī abhiṣaktaḥ kupitaś caṇḍībhūto +anāttamanāḥ kopaṃ ca kveṣaṃ ca mrakṣyaṃ
K10divav33u:299: ca tatpratyayāt saṃjanayitvā lalāṭe triśikhāṃ bhṛkuṭiṃ kṛtvā kaṇṭhaṃ dhamayitvā +akṣiṇī
K10divav33u:300: parivartya nakula^piṅgalāṃ dṛṣṭim utpādya triśaṅkuṃ mātaṅga^rājam idam avocat /
K10divav33u:304: yastvaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ veda^pāragaṃ hīnaś caṇḍāla^yonijo bhūtvā icchasy avamardituṃ/
K10divav33u:311: p.17.1ab/. na hi cāmī^karaṃ mūḍha bhaved bhasma kadācana/
K10divav33u:313: p.17.2ab/.caṇḍāla^yonijas tvaṃ hi dvijātiḥ punar apy ahaṃ/
K10divav33u:314: p.17.2cd/.hīnaḥ śreṣṭhena sambandhaṃ mūḍha prāthayase kathaṃ//
K10divav33u:316: p.17.3cd/.na hi śreṣṭhaḥ prahīnena sambandhaṃ kartum icchati//
K10divav33u:317: p.17.4ab/.śreṣṭhāḥ śreṣṭhair hi sambandhaṃ kurvantīha dvijātayaḥ/
K10divav33u:318: p.17.4cd/.vidyayā ye tu sampannāḥ saṃśuddhaś caraṇena ca//
K10divav33u:319: p.17.5ab/.jātyā caivān abhikṣiptā mantraiḥ paramatāṃ gatāḥ/
K10divav33u:321: p.17.6ab/.nighaṇṭakaiṭabhān vedān brāhmaṇa ye hy adhīyate/
K10divav33u:322: p.17.6cd/.tais tādṛśair hi sambandhaṃ kurvantīha dvijātayaḥ//
K10divav33u:323: p.17.7ab/.na hi śreṣṭho hi hīnena sambandhaṃ kartum icchati/
K10divav33u:325: p.17.8ab/.yad asmābhiś ca sambandham iha tvaṃ kartum icchasi/
K10divav33u:327: p.17.8ef/.gaccha tvaṃ vṛṣala kṣipraṃ kim asmān avamanyase//
K10divav33u:328: p.18.1ab/.caṇḍālāḥ saha caṇḍālaiḥ pukkaśāḥ saha pukkaśaiḥ/
K10divav33u:329: p.18.1cd/.kurvantīhaiva sambandhaṃ jātibhir jātir eva ca//
K10divav33u:330: p.18.2ab/.brāhmaṇā brāhmaṇaiḥ sārdhaṃ kṣatriyāḥ kṣatriyaiḥ saha/
K10divav33u:331: p.18.2cd/.sārdhaṃ vaiśyās tathā vaiśyaiḥ śūdrāḥ śūdrais tathā saha//
K10divav33u:333: p.18.3cd/.na hi kurvanti caṇḍālāḥ sambandhaṃ brāhmaṇaiḥ saha//
K10divav33u:335: p.18.4cd/.kathaṃ hīnaś ca śreṣṭhena sambandhaṃ kartum icchasi//
K10divav33u:336: p.18.5/.idaṃ punarvacanaṃ śrutvā brāhmaṇasya puṣkarasāriṇas triśaṅkur mātaṅga^rāja idam avocat/
K10divav33u:339: p.18.6cd/.brāhmaṇe vānya^jātau vā na viśeṣo +asti vai tathā//
K10divav33u:342: p.18.7cd/.brāhmaṇe vānya^jātau vā na viśeṣo +asti vai tathā//
K10divav33u:345: p.18.8cd/.bhitvā vā pṛthivīṃ jāto jāta^vedā yathāraṇeḥ//
K10divav33u:348: p.18.9cd/.śreṣṭhatve vṛṣalatve ca kiṃ vā paśyasi kāraṇaṃ//
K10divav33u:350: p.18.10cd/.varṇās tathā^eva vā^apy anye kā nu tatra viśeṣatā//
K10divav33u:351: p.19.1ab/.yat kiñ cit pāpakaṃ karma kilviṣaṃ kalir eva ca/
K10divav33u:356: p.19.3cd/.mantrair hi prokṣitāḥ santaḥ svargaṃ gacchanty ajaiḍakāḥ//
K10divav33u:357: p.19.4ab/.yady eṣa mārgaḥ svartāya kasmān na brāhmaṇā hy amī/
K10divav33u:358: p.19.4cd/.ātmānam athavā bandhūn mantraiḥ saṃprokṣayanti vai//
K10divav33u:359: p.19.5ab/.mātaraṃ pitaraṃ ca^eva bhrātaraṃ bhaginīṃ tathā/
K10divav33u:360: p.19.5cd/.putraṃ duhitaraṃ bhāryāṃ dvijā na prokṣayanty amī//
K10divav33u:361: p.19.6ab/.mitraṃ jñātiṃ sakhīṃ vā^api ye vā viṣayavāsinaḥ/
K10divav33u:362: p.19.6cd/.prokṣitās te +api vā mantraiḥ sarve yāsyanti sadgatiṃ//
K10divav33u:363: p.19.7ab/.sarve yajñaiḥ samāhutā gamiṣyanti satāṃ gatiṃ/
K10divav33u:364: p.19.7cd/.paśubhiḥ kiṃ nu bho yaṣṭair ātmānaṃ kiṃ na yakṣyase//
K10divav33u:365: p.19.8ab/.na prokṣaṇair na mantraiś ca svargaṃ gacchanty ajaiḍakāḥ/
K10divav33u:366: p.19.8cd/.na hy eṣa mārgaḥ svargāya mithyāprokṣaṇam ucyate//
K10divav33u:367: p.19.9ab/.brāhmaṇair audracittais tu paryāyo hy eṣa cintitaḥ/
K10divav33u:368: p.19.9cd/.māṃsaṃ khāditukāmais tu prokṣaṇaṃ kalpitaṃ paśoḥ//
K10divav33u:369: p.19.10ab/.anyac ca^ahaṃ pravakṣyāmi brāhmaṇair yat prakalpitaṃ/
K10divav33u:372: p.20.1cd/.brahmāghnatā ca catvāraḥ pātakā brāhmaṇeṣv amī//
K10divav33u:374: p.20.2cd/.suvarṇaṃ yo hared vipraḥ sa tena +abrāhmaṇo bhavet//
K10divav33u:376: p.20.3cd/.surāṃ tu yaḥ pived vipraḥ sa tena^abrāhmaṇo bhavet//
K10divav33u:379: p.20.4cd/.guru^dārāṃ tu yo gacchet sa tena^abrāhmaṇo bhavet//
K10divav33u:380: p.20.5ab/.na hanyād brāhmaṇaṃ hy ekaṃ hanyād anyān anekaśaḥ/
K10divav33u:381: p.20.5cd/.hayātta brāhmaṇaṃ yo vai sa tena^abrāhmaṇo bhavet//
K10divav33u:382: p.20.6ab/.ity ete pātakā hy uktā brāhmaṇeṣu catur^vidhāḥ/
K10divav33u:384: p.20.7ab/.kṛtvā caturṇam ekaikaṃ bhaved abrāhmaṇas tu saḥ/
K10divav33u:385: p.20.7cd/.labhate na ca sāmīcīṃ brāhmaṇāṇāṃ samāgame/
K10divav33u:386: p.20.7ef/.āsanaṃ ca^udakaṃ ca^eva vyutthānaṃ sa na ca^arhati//
K10divav33u:387: p.20.8ab/.tasya niḥsaranaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ brāhmaṇaiḥ patitasya tu/
K10divav33u:388: p.20.8cd/.vrataṃ vai sa samādāya punar brāhmaṇatāṃ vrajet//
K10divav33u:390: p.20.9cd/.khāṭvāṅgam ucchritaṃ kṛtvā mṛtaśīrṣe ca bhojanaṃ//
K10divav33u:392: p.21.1cd/.pūrṇe dvādaśame varṣe punar brāhmaṇatāṃ vrajet//
K10divav33u:393: p.21.2ab/.iti niḥsaraṇaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ brāhmaṇais tu tapasvibhiḥ/
K10divav33u:395: p.21.3/ tad idaṃ brāhmaṇa te bravīmi,
K10divav33u:396: saṃjñāmātrakam idaṃ lokasya yad idam ucyate brāhmaṇa iti vā kṣatriya iti vā vaiśya iti vā śūdra ity vā/
K10divav33u:397: sarvam idam ekam eveti vijñaya putrāya me śārdūlakarṇāya prakṛtiṃ māṇavikāmanuprayaccha bhāryā^arthāya/
K10divav33u:399: idaṃ ca khalu punarvacanaṃ śrutvā triśaṅkor mātaṅga^rājasya
K10divav33u:400: brāhmaṇaḥ puṣkarasārī abhiṣaktaḥ kupitaś caṇḍībhūto +anāttamanāḥ kopaṃ ca dveṣaṃ ca catpratyayaṃ janayitvā lalāṭe triśikhāṃ bhṛkuṭiṃ kṛtvā kaṇṭhaṃ
K10divav33u:401: dhamayitvā +akṣiṇī parivartya nakula^piṅgalāṃ dūṣṭim utpādya triśaṅkuṃ mātaṅga^rājam idam avocat/
K10divav33u:403: p.22.1cd/.ekaiva jātir loke +asmin sāmānyā na pṛthag^vidhā//
K10divav33u:407: tad yathā deśa^dharme vā nagara^dharme vā grāma^dharme vā nigamadhama vā śulka^dharme vā āvāha^dharme vā vivāha^dharme vā pūrva^karmasu vā/
K10divav33u:409: yad uta brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyo vaiśyaḥ śūdra iti/
K10divav33u:410: teṣāṃ vivāha^dharmeṣu catasro bhāryā brāhmaṇasya bhavanti/
K10divav33u:417: śūdrasya av ekā bhāryā bhavati śūdrī eva/
K10divav33u:418: evaṃ brāhmaṇasya vṛṣala catvāraḥ putrā bhavanti/
K10divav33u:419: tad yathā brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyo vaiśyaḥ śūdraś ceti/
K10divav33u:423: śūdra iti/ śūdrasya tv eka eva putro bhavati yad uta śūdra eva/
K10divav33u:424: p.22.4/.te brāhmaṇāḥ punar vṛṣala brahmaṇaḥ putrāḥ/
K10divav33u:429: p.22.5/.brahmaṇā^ayaṃ khalu vṛṣala lokaḥ sarva^bhūtāni nirmitāni/
K10divav33u:430: p.23.1ab/.tasya jyeṣṭhā vayaṃ putrāḥ kṣatriyās tad anantaraṃ/
K10divav33u:432: p.23.2/.sa tvaṃ vṛṣala caturthe +api varṇe na saṃdṛśyase/
K10divav33u:433: ahaṃ ca^agre varṇe śreṣṭhe varṇe parame varṇe pravare varṇe/
K10divav33u:434: paramārthaṃ ca saṃyogamākāṅkṣasi praṇaśya tvaṃ vṛṣala kṣipraṃ /
K10divav33u:436: p.23.3/.idaṃ punarvacanaṃ śrutvā brāhmaṇasya puṣkarasāriṇas triśaṅkur mātaṅga^rāja idam avocat/
K10divav33u:437: idam atra brāhmaṇa śṛṇu yad bravīmi/
K10divav33u:440: p.23.4ab/.tasya jyeṣṭhā vayaṃ putrāḥ kṣatriyās tad anantaraṃ/
K10divav33u:442: p.23.5ab/.sapāda^jaṅghāḥ sanakhāḥ samāṃsāḥ sapārśvapṛṣṭhāś ca narā bhavanti/
K10divav33u:443: p.23.5cd/.ekāṃśato nāsti yato viśeṣo varṇāś ca catvāra ito na santi//
K10divav33u:444: p.23.6ab/.atho viśeṣaḥ pravatosti kaścit tad brūhi yac ca^anumataṃ yathā te/
K10divav33u:445: p.23.6cd/.atho viśeṣaḥ pravaro hi nāsti varṇāś ca catvāra ito na santi//
K10divav33u:446: p.24.1ab/. yathā hi dāurukā bālāḥ krīḍamānā mahā^pathe/
K10divav33u:450: p.24.2cd/.na ca bālasya vacanāt pāṃśavo +annaṃ bhavanti hi//
K10divav33u:451: p.24.3ab/.varṇās tathāiva catvāro yathā brāhmaṇa bhāṣase/
K10divav33u:452: p.24.3cd/.pāṃśupuñjābhidhānena yogo [yaḥ ko] py eṣa na vidyate//
K10divav33u:453: p.24.4ab/.na keśena na karṇābhyāṃ na śīrṣaṇa na cakṣuṣā/
K10divav33u:454: p.24.4cd/.na mukhena na nāsayā na grīvaya na bāhunā//
K10divav33u:457: p.24.6ab/.na svareṇa na varṇena na sarvāṃśair na maithunaiḥ/
K10divav33u:459: p.24.7ab/.yathā hi jātiṣv anyāsu liṅgaṃ yoniḥ pṛthak pṛthak/
K10divav33u:460: p.24.7cd/.sāmānyaṃ kāraṇaṃ tatra kiṃ vā jātiṣu manyase//
K10divav33u:461: p.24.8ab/.saśīrṣakāś ca^atha narāsthi^yuktāḥ sacarmakāḥ sendriyasodarāś ca/
K10divav33u:462: p.24.8cd/.ekāṃśato nāsti yato viśeṣo varṇā na yuktāś caturo +abhidhātuṃ//
K10divav33u:463: p.24.9ab/.athāsti kaścit pravaro viśeṣas tad brūhi yaccānumataṃ yathā te/
K10divav33u:464: p.24.9cd/.atho viśeṣaḥ pravaro +atra nāsti varṇā na yuktāś caturobhidhātuṃ//
K10divav33u:465: p.25.1ab/.doṣo hy ayaṃ ca^atra bhaved ayukto yad yat tvayā ca^abhihitaṃ nidāne/
K10divav33u:466: p.25.1cd/.śrutvā tu mattaḥ pratipadya saumya yac ca^atra manye śṛṇucodyamānaṃ//
K10divav33u:467: p.25.2ab/.yac ca^atra yuktaṃ viṣamaṃ samaṃ vā tāt te pravakṣyāmi niyujyamānaḥ/
K10divav33u:468: p.25.2cd/.doṣo hi yaś ca^api bhaved ayukto vakṣyāmi te hy uttarata^uttaraṃ ca/
K10divav33u:469: p.25.3ef/.śrutvā tu mattaḥ pratipadya saumya karma^adhipatyaprabhavā manuṣyāḥ//
K10divav33u:470: p.25.4/.anumānam api te brāhmaṇa yadi pramāṇaṃ,
K10divav33u:471: tatra yad bravīṣi brahmā eka iti tasmāt prajā api eka^jātyā eva/
K10divav33u:473: yac ca vravīṣi brahmaṇā^ayaṃ lokaḥ sarva^bhūtāni ca nirmitāni^iti/
K10divav33u:475: tad idaṃ te brāhmaṇa ayuktaṃ yad bravīṣi catvāro varṇā brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyā śūdrāś ceti/
K10divav33u:476: p.25.4/.api tu brāhmaṇa mithyā mama vaco bhavet yadi brāhmaṇa saṃvādena munuṣyajāter nānā^karaṇaṃ prajñāyate/
K10divav33u:477: yad uta śīrṣato vā mukhato vā karṇato vā nāsikāto vā (26)
K10divav33u:478: bhrūto vā rūpato vā saṃsthānato vā varṇato vā ''kārato vā yonito vā ''hārato vā sambhāvato vā nānā^karaṇaṃ prajñāyate/
K10divav33u:479: p.26.1/.tad yathā^api bhoḥ puṣkarasārin gavāś ca gardabho ṣṭramṛgapakṣyajaiḍakā^nāmaṇḍajajarāyujasaṃsvedajaupapādukānāṃnānā^karanaṃ prajñāyate/
K10divav33u:480: yad uta pādato +api mukhatopi varṇato +api saṃsthānato +api āhārato +api yonisambhavato +api nānā^karaṇaṃ prajñāyate naca^evaṃ teṣāṃ caturṇāṃ varṇānāṃ nānā^karaṇaṃ prajñāyate/
K10divav33u:481: tat tasmāt sarvam idam ekam iti/
K10divav33u:483: yad uta mūlataś ca skandhataś ca tvagbhāgataś ca sārataś ca patrataś ca puṣpataś ca phalataś ca nānā^karaṇaṃ prajñāyate/
K10divav33u:484: na ca^evaṃ caturṇāṃ varṇānāṃ nānā^karaṇaṃ prajñāyate/
K10divav33u:485: p.26.3/.tad yathā brāhmaṇāmīṣāṃ sthalajānāṃ vṛkṣāṇāṃ sāratamālanaktamālakarṇikārassaptaparṇaśirīṣakovidārasyandanacandanaśiṃśapairaṇḍakhadira^ādīnāṃ nānā^karaṇaṃ prajñāyate/
K10divav33u:486: p.26.4/.yad uta mūlataś ca skandhataś ca tvagbhāgataś ca gulmataś ca sārataś ca patrataś ca puṣpataś ca phalataś ca viśeṣa upalabhyate/
K10divav33u:487: na ca^evaṃ caturṇāṃ varṇānāṃ nānā^karaṇaṃ prajñāyate/
K10divav33u:488: p.26.5/.tad yathā bhoḥ puṣkarasārinn amīṣāṃ kṣīravṛkṣāṇām udumbaraplakṣāśvatthanyagrodhavalgukety evam ādīnāṃ nānā^karaṇaṃ prajñāyate/
K10divav33u:489: yad uta mūlataś ca skandhataś ca tvag bhāgataś ca sārataś ca patrataś ca puṣpataś ca phalataś ca nānā^karaṇaṃ prajñāyate/
K10divav33u:490: na tv eva caturṇāṃ varṇānāṃ nānā^karaṇaṃ prajñāyate/
K10divav33u:491: p.26.6 /.tad yathā puṣkarasārinn amīṣām api phalabaiṣajyavṛkṣāṇām āmalakīharītakīvibhītakī
K10divav33u:492: pharasaka^ādīnām anyāsām api vividhānām oṣadhīnāṃ grāma^jānāṃ pārvatīyānāṃ tṛṇa^vanaspatīnāṃ
K10divav33u:494: yad uta mūlataś ca skandhataś ca (27)
K10divav33u:495: gulmataś ca sārataś ca patrataś ca puṣpataś ca phalataś ca nānā^karaṇaṃ prajñāyate/
K10divav33u:498: p.27.1/.tad yathā sthalajānāṃ puṣpa^vṛkṣāṇām atimuktaka^campaka^pāṭalānāṃ sumanā vārṣikādhanaṣkārika^ādīnāṃ nānā^karaṇaṃ prajñāyate/
K10divav33u:499: yad uto rūpato +api varṇato +api gandhato +api saṃsthānato +api nānā^karaṇaṃ prajñāyate/
K10divav33u:500: na tv eva caturṇāṃ varṇānāṃ nānā^karaṇaṃ prajñāyate/
K10divav33u:501: p.27.2/.tad yathā brāhmaṇām īṣām api jalajānāṃ puṣpāṇāṃ padma^utpala^saugandhika^mṛdu^gandhika^ādīnāṃ nānā^karaṇaṃ prajñāyate/
K10divav33u:502: yad uta rūpataś ca gandhataś ca saṃsthānataś ca vaṇataś ca nānā^karaṇaṃ prajñāyate/
K10divav33u:504: tad yathā puṣkarasārin amī brāhmaṇā iti kṣatriyā iti vaiśyā iti śūdrā iti/
K10divav33u:506: p.27.3ab/.apy anyat te pravakṣyāmi brāhmaṇaiḥ kalpitaṃ yath/ā/
K10divav33u:507: p.27.3cd/.śiraḥ satāraṃ gaganam ākāśam udaraṃ tathā//
K10divav33u:508: p.27.4ab/.parvatāś ca^apy ubhāv ūrū pādau ca dharaṇī^talaṃ/
K10divav33u:510: p.27.5ab/.aśrūṇy avocad varṣā +asya nadyaḥ prasrāvam eva ca/
K10divav33u:514: yasmād brahmaṇo brāhmaṇā utpannās tasmāt kṣatriyā api vaiśyā api śūdrā apy utpannāḥ/
K10divav33u:515: p.28.2ab/.evaṃ prasūtir yadi tatvataḥ syāt tato hi syād varṇa^kṛto viśeṣaḥ/
K10divav33u:516: p.28.2cd/.yadi brāhmaṇā brahma^lokaṃ vrajeyus trayaś ca varṇā na vrajeyuḥ svargaṃ/
K10divav33u:517: p.28.2ef/.evaṃ bhaved varṇa^kṛto viśeṣo na cenna catvāro bhavanti varṇāḥ//
K10divav33u:518: p.28.3ab/.yasmād dhi varṇaś caturtha evaṃ prayāti svargaṃ svakṛtena karmaṇā/
K10divav33u:519: p.28.3cd/.yatas tapaś ca^ārṣam iha praśastaṃ tasmād dvijāter na viśeṣaṇaṃ syād//
K10divav33u:520: p.28.4ab/.yadi brāhmaṇaḥ syād ihaika eva dvijihvaś catuḥ^śravaṇas tathā^eva/
K10divav33u:521: p.28.4cd/.catur^viṣāṇo bahupād dviśīrṣa evaṃ kṛte varṇa^kṛto viśeṣaḥ//
K10divav33u:522: p.29.1ab/.rāgaiś ca nāma paraghātanaṃ ca evaṃ prakāraṃ ca viheṭhanaṃ ca/
K10divav33u:523: p.29.1cd/.sattvasya vai karmaṇo dhvaṃsanaṃ ca etāny akalyāṇakṛtāni vipraiḥ//
K10divav33u:524: p.29.2ab/.yuddhaṃ vivādṃ kalahāny abhīkṣṇaṃ goprokṣaṇaṃ cintitaṃ brāhmaṇair hi/
K10divav33u:525: p.29.2cd/.atharvaṇaḥ karmaṇā trāsanaṃ ca etāni mantrāṇi kṛtāni vipraiḥ//
K10divav33u:526: p.29.3ab/.pāpecchatā bahu^jana^vañcanaṃ ca śāṭhyaṃ ca dhaurtyaṃ ca tathā^eva kalpaṃ/
K10divav33u:527: p.29.3cd/.evaṃ pareṣām ahitaṃ vicintya kadā ca te svargam ito vrajeyuḥ//
K10divav33u:528: p.29.4ab/.ye brāhmaṇā ugratapā vinītā vratena śīlena sadā hy upetāḥ/
K10divav33u:529: p.29.4cd/.ahiṃsakā ye dama saṃyame ratās te brāhmaṇā brahma^puraṃ vrajanti//
K10divav33u:530: p.29.5ab/.saha^asthi^māṃsaḥ sanakhaḥ sacarmā duḥkhaṃ sukhaṃ mūtra^purīṣam ekaṃ/
K10divav33u:531: p.29.5cd/.pañca^indriyair nāsti yato viśeṣas tasmān na vai varṇa^catuṣka eṣaḥ//
K10divav33u:532: p.29.6/.tad yathā nāma brāhmaṇa kasya^cit puruṣasya catvāraḥ putrā bhaveyuḥ/
K10divav33u:533: sa teṣāṃ nāmāni kuryān nandaka iti vā jīvaka iti vā aśoka iti vā śatāyur iti vā /
K10divav33u:534: iṣṭāś ca (30) punar bho etasya puruṣasya putrā bhaveyuḥ/
K10divav33u:539: p.30.1/.nāmataḥ punar brāhmaṇa teṣāṃ nānā^karaṇaṃ prajñāyate na jātitaḥ/
K10divav33u:541: iha khalu punar brāhmaṇa pitṛtaḥ putro jāyte/
K10divav33u:543: p.30.2ab/.mātā bhastrā pituḥ putro yena jātaḥ sa eva saḥ/
K10divav33u:544: p.30.2cd/.yady evaṃ bho vijānāsi na te (putrā)
K10divav33u:546: p.30.3/.parīkṣasva brāhmaṇa saṃyageva ko +atra brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyo vaiśyaḥ śūtra iti/
K10divav33u:547: p.30.4ab/.sarve kāṇāś ca kubjāś ca sarve +apasmāriṇopi vā/
K10divav33u:548: p.30.4cd/.kilāsinaḥ kuṣṭhinaś ca gaurāḥ kṛṣṇāḥ pṛthak pṛthak//
K10divav33u:549: p.30.5/.pratiṣṭhitāḥ samamajjānakhatvacapārśva^udaravaktrāḥ prajā hi tāḥ svakarmaṇā/
K10divav33u:550: evaṃ gate brāhmaṇa naiva bhavati viśeṣaḥ/
K10divav33u:552: p.30.6/.yasmān na jāter viśeṣaṇo +asti tasmān na vai varṇa^catuṣka eva/
K10divav33u:553: p.31.1/.tasmāt te brāhmaṇa bravīmi saṃjñāmātram idaṃ lokasya yad idaṃ brāhmaṇa iti vā kṣatriya iti vā vaiśya iti vā śūdra iti vā caṇḍāla iti
K10divav33u:555: putrāya me śārdūlakarṇāya prakṛtiṃ duhitaram utsṛja bhāryā^arthāya yāvantaṃ kula^śulkaṃ manyase tāvantam anupradāsyāmi/
K10divav33u:556: p.31.2/.idaṃ punarvacanaṃ śrutvā triśaṅkor mātaṅga^rājasya brāhmaṇaḥ puṣkarasārīdam avocat/
K10divav33u:562: adhyātmam api mṛgacakraṃ vā nakṣatra^gaṇo vā tithi^kramagaṇo vā tvayādhītaḥ/
K10divav33u:566: athavā rāhucairtaṃ vā śukra^caritaṃ vā grahacaritaṃ vā tvayādhītaṃ/
K10divav33u:567: athavā lokāyateṃ bhavatā bhāṣyapravacanaṃ vā pakṣādhyāyo vā nyāyo vā tvayādhītaḥ/
K10divav33u:568: p.32.1/.evam ukte triśaṅkur mātaṅga^rāhaḥ puṣkarasāriṇaṃ brāhmaṇam etad avocat/
K10divav33u:569: etac ca mayā brāhmaṇādhītaṃ bhūyaś ca^uttaraṃ /
K10divav33u:570: yad api te brāhmaṇa evaṃ syād aham asmi mantreṣu pāraṃ prāpta iti/
K10divav33u:571: tatra te brāhmaṇa saha dharmeṇānumānaṃ pravakṣyāmi/
K10divav33u:572: na khalv evaṃ brāhmaṇa prāthamakalpikānāṃ sattvānām etad abhavat/
K10divav33u:573: yad uta brāhmaṇa iti vā kṣatriya iti vā vaiśya
K10divav33u:576: p.32.2/.atha brāhmaṇa sattvānāmasadṛśānāṃ ca^ubhayathā sadṛśānāṃ tato +anye sattvāḥ śālikṣetrāṇi kelāyanti gopāyanti vāpayanti vā/
K10divav33u:578: athātra brāhmaṇa tad anyatamānāṃ sattānām etad abhavat/
K10divav33u:579: parigraho rogaḥ parigraho gaṇḍaḥ parigrahaḥ śalyaḥ/
K10divav33u:581: tṛṇa^kāṣṭhaśākhāparṇapalāśakānupasaṃhṛtya tṛṇa^kuṭikāṃ vā parṇakuṭikāṃ vā kṛtvā praviśya dhyāyena iti/
K10divav33u:582: p.32.3/.atha te sattvās taṃ svakaṃ parigraham apahāyāraṇyāyatanaṃ gatvā tṛṇa^kāṣṭhaśākhāpatraparṇapalāśakais tṛṇa^kuṭiṃ vā parṇakuṭikāṃ vā kṛtvā tatra^eva praviśya dhyāyanti sma/
K10divav33u:583: te tatra sāyam āsanahetoḥ prāntavāṭikāṃ prātaraśanahetoś ca grāmaṃ piṇḍāya praviśanti sma/
K10divav33u:584: p.32.4/.atha teṣāṃ grāma^vāsināṃ sattvānām etad abhavat/
K10divav33u:585: duṣkarakārakā vata bhoḥ sattvā ye svakaṃ parigraham utṛjya grāma^nigamajana^padebhyo bahir nirgatās teṣāṃ bahirmanaskā brāhyaṇā iti saṃjñā udapādi/
K10divav33u:586: te ca punar grāma^vāsinaḥ sattvās tān atīva satkurvanti sma/
K10divav33u:588: p.33.1/.atha teṣām eva sattvānām anyatame sattvās tāni dhyānāny asaṃbhāvayanto grāmeṣv avatīrya mantra^padān svādhyāyanti sma/
K10divav33u:589: tāṃs te grāma^nivāsina āhuḥ --- na levalam ime sattvā ime +adhyāpakāḥ,
K10divav33u:590: teṣām adhyāpakā iti loke saṃjñā udapādi/
K10divav33u:591: p.33.2/.ayaṃ hetur ayaṃ pratyayo brāhmaṇānāṃ loke prādurbhāvāya/
K10divav33u:592: athānyatame sattvā viveka^kāla^pratisaṃyuktān karma^antān vividhān artha^pratisaṃyuktān kurvanti sma/
K10divav33u:594: p.33.3/.athānyatame sattvāḥ kṣudreṇa karmaṇā jīvikāṃ kalpayanti sma/
K10divav33u:596: p.33.4/.bhūta^pūrvaṃ brāhamṇa anyatamaḥ sattvo vadhūm ādāya ratham āruhyānyatam asminn araṇyapradeśe gataḥ/
K10divav33u:598: tasmān mātaṅgama [mā tvaṃ gamaḥ] iti saṃjñā udapādi/
K10divav33u:599: p.33.5/.kṣetraṃ karṣanti ye teṣāṃ karṣakā iti saṃjñā prvṛttā/
K10divav33u:600: bhāṣyeṇa ca parṣadaṃ rañjayati dharmeṇa śīlabratasamācāreṇa samyak,
K10divav33u:602: p.33.6/.tato +anye sattvā vāṇijyayā jīvikāṃ kalpayanti teṣāṃ vaṇija iti saṃjñā (34) udapādi/
K10divav33u:604: pravrajitvā parān jayanti kleśān jayanti^iti teṣāṃ pravrajitā iti loke saṃjñā udapādi/
K10divav33u:605: p.34.1/.api tu brāhmaṇa ekaiva saṃjñā loka udapādi/
K10divav33u:613: śukaḥ paṇḍitaś ca vedān vibhajati sma/
K10divav33u:614: tad yathā puṣyo bahv^ṛcānāṃ paṃktiś chantogānām eka^viṃśatir adhvaryavaḥ/
K10divav33u:619: tad yathā śuklā valkalā māṇḍavyā iti/
K10divav33u:627: paṃktir ety ekā bhūtvā sa^aśīti^sahasradhā bhinnā/
K10divav33u:628: tad yathā śīlavalkā araṇemikā laukākṣāḥ kauthumā brahma^samā mahā^samā mahā^yāgikāḥ sa^atyam ugrāḥ samanta^vedāḥ/
K10divav33u:639: paṃktir ity ekā bhūtvā sa^aśīti sahasradhā bhinnā/
K10divav33u:641: ete brāhmaṇā eka^viṃśaty adhvaryavo bhūtvā eka^uttaraśatadhā bhinnāḥ/
K10divav33u:642: tad yathā kaṭhāḥ kaṃinā vājasaneyino jātukarṇāḥ proṣṭhapadā ṛṣayaḥ/
K10divav33u:643: tatra daśa kaṭhā daśa kaṇimā ekādaśa vājasaneyinaḥ/
K10divav33u:658: p.36.4/.anumānam api brāhmaṇa pramāṇaṃ pratītya etāni dvādaśa^bhedaśatāni ṣoḍaśabhedāś ca ye brāhmaṇaiḥ paurāṇaiḥ samyag dṛṣṭāḥ/
K10divav33u:659: chandasi vā vyākaraṇe vā lokāyate vā (37)
K10divav33u:661: yad uta eka^jātyo nāmeti viditvā bandhur bhavitum arhati/
K10divav33u:662: tat te vrāhmaṇa bravīmi saṃjñāmātrakam etal lokasya yad uta brāhmaṇa iti vā kṣatriya
K10divav33u:663: iti vā vaiśya iti vā śūdra iti vā/
K10divav33u:665: putrāya me śārdūlakarṇāya prakṛtiṃ duhitaram utsṛja bhāryā^arthāya yāvantaṃ kula^śulkaṃ manyase tāvantam anupradāsyāmi/
K10divav33u:666: p.37.1/.idaṃ punarvacanaṃ śrutvā triśaṅkor mātaṅga^rājasya brāhmaṇaḥ puṣkarasārī tuṣṇīṃbhūto madgubhūtaḥ srastaskandho +adhomukho niṣpratibhaḥ pradhyānaparo +asthāt/
K10divav33u:667: p.37.2/.dadarśa triśaṅkur mātaṅga^rājo brāhmaṇaṃ puṣkarasāriṇaṃ tṛṣṇīṃbhūtaṃ madgubhūtaṃ srasta^skandham adhomukhaṃ niṣpratibhaṃ pradhyānaparaṃ
K10divav33u:669: yad api te brāhmaṇa evaṃ syād asadṛśena saha sambandho bhaviṣyati^iti/
K10divav33u:673: lokasya te mama putrasya śārdūlakarṇasya saṃvidyante/
K10divav33u:674: yad api te brāhmaṇa evaṃ syāt --- ye vājapiyaṃ yajñaṃ yajanti/
K10divav33u:675: aśvamedhaṃ puruṣa^medhaṃ śāmyaprāśaṃ nirargaḍaṃ yajñaṃ yajanti,
K10divav33u:676: sarve te kāyasya bhedātsugatau svarga^loke deveṣūpapadyanta iti/
K10divav33u:679: vājapeyaṃ brāhmaṇa yajñaṃ yajamānā aśvamedhaṃ puruṣa^medhaṃ
K10divav33u:680: śāmyaprāśaṃ nirargaḍaṃ yajñaṃ ca yajamānā bahudhā mantrān pravartayantaḥ prāṇihiṃsāṃ ca pravartayanti/
K10divav33u:681: tasmāt te brāhmaṇa bravīmi na hy eṣa mārgaḥ svargāya/
K10divav33u:682: ahaṃ te brāhmaṇa mārgaṃ svargāya vyākhāmi/ tac chṛṇu/
K10divav33u:684: p.38.1cd/.praśaṃsāṃ vitta^lābhaṃ ca pretya svarge ca modanaṃ//
K10divav33u:685: p.38.2/.yair brāhmaṇa itaḥ pūrvaṃ vājapeyo yajña iṣṭaḥ/
K10divav33u:686: yair aśvamedho yaiḥ puruṣa^medho yaiḥ śāmyaprāśo yair nirargaḍo yajña iṣṭaḥ,
K10divav33u:687: parigṛhītas tair nirargalaṃ ca kāmaiḥ kāmaḥ/
K10divav33u:689: ye brāhmaṇa itaḥ paścād vājapeyaṃ yajñaṃ yakṣyanti ye +aśvamedhaṃ puruṣa^medhaṃ ye śāmyaprāśaṃ nirargaḍaṃ yajñaṃ yakṣyanti te nirarthakaṃ mahā^vighātaṃ
K10divav33u:690: p.38.3/.tasmāt te brāhmana bravīmi --- ehi tvaṃ mayā sārdhaṃ sambandhaṃ yojayasvā/
K10divav33u:692: dharmeṇa hi caṇḍālā ajugupsanīyā bhavanti/ api ca/
K10divav33u:693: p.39.1ab/.śraddhā śīlaṃ tapastyāgaḥ śrutir jñānaṃ dayaiva ca/
K10divav33u:696: tad ebhir aṣṭābhiḥ prakāraiḥ svargagamanam iṣyate/
K10divav33u:697: ye prāyeṇa jānanti viśeṣeṇa khalv apy anekair vividhari yajñaiḥ/
K10divav33u:698: aṣṭau cemā brāhmaṇa nirdiṣṭā mātṛtulyā bhaginyo loke pravartante/
K10divav33u:709: p.39.3/.atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin brāhmaṇānāṃ saptagotrāṇi vyākhyāsyāmi tāni śrūyantāṃ/
K10divav33u:710: tad yathā gautamā vātsyāḥ kautsāḥ kauśikāḥ kāśyapā vāśiṣṭhā māṇḍavyā ity etāni brāhmaṇa saptagotrāṇi/
K10divav33u:712: atra ye gautamās te kauthumāste gargās te bharadvājāsta ārṣṭiṣeṇās te vaikhānasās te (40)
K10divav33u:715: te maitreyās te bhārgavās te sāvarṇyā ste salolās te bahujātāḥ/
K10divav33u:716: tatra ye kautsās te maudgalyāyanās te gauṇāyanās te lāṅgalāste lagnāste daṇḍalagnāste soma^bhuvāḥ[vah}/
K10divav33u:717: tatra ye kauśikās te kātyāyanās te darbhakātyāyanās te valkalinas te pakṣiṇas te laukākṣās te lohita^āyanāḥ (lohityāyanāḥ) /
K10divav33u:718: tatra ye kāśyapās te maṇḍanās te iṣṭās te śauṇḍāyanās te rocaneyās
K10divav33u:720: tatra ye vaḥśiṣṭhās te jātukarṇyās te dhānyāyanās te pārāśarās te vyāghranakhās ta āṇḍāyanasta aupamanyavāḥ/
K10divav33u:721: tatra ye māṇḍavyās te bhāṇḍāyanās te dhaumrāyaṇās te kātyāyanās te khalv avāhanās te sugandhārāyaṇās te kāpiṣṭhalāyanāḥ/
K10divav33u:722: p.40.1/.ity etāni brāhmaṇa evam ekonapañcāśad gotrāṇi brāhmaṇaiḥ paurāṇaiḥ samyag dṛṣṭāni chandasi vyākaraṇe padamīmāṃsāyāṃ/
K10divav33u:723: anyāni ca gotrāṇi vistarato mayā vācitāni/
K10divav33u:725: p.40.2/.yad utaikatvam iti viditvā bhavān bandhur bhavitum arhati/
K10divav33u:726: tasmāt te brāhmaṇa bravīmi sāmānyaṃ saṃjñāmātrakam idaṃ lokasya yad uta brāhmaṇa iti vā kṣatriya iti vā vaiśya iti vā śūdra iti vā/
K10divav33u:728: pppppputrāya me śārdūlakarṇāya prakṛtiṃduhitaram utsṛja bhāryā^arthāya/
K10divav33u:730: p.41.1/.idaṃ punarvacanaṃ śrutvā triśaṅkor mātaṅga^rājasya brāhmaṇaḥ puṣkarasārī tṛṣṇīṃ bhūto madgubhūtaḥ srastaskandho +adhomukho niṣpratibhaḥ pradhyānaparaḥ sthito +abhūt/
K10divav33u:731: adrākṣīt triśaṅkur mātaṅga^rājaḥ puṣkarasāriṇaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ tūṣṇīṃ bhūtaṃ madgubhūtaṃ srastaskandham abhomukhaṃ niṣpratibhaṃ pradhyānaparaṃ sthitaṃ/
K10divav33u:733: p.41.2ab/.yādṛśaṃ vāpyate bījaṃ tādṛśaṃ labhyate phalaṃ/
K10divav33u:734: p.41.2cd/.prajāpater hi caikatve nirviśeṣo bhavaty ataḥ//
K10divav33u:735: p.41.3ab/.na ca^indriyāṇāṃ nānātvaṃ kriyābhedaś ca dṛśyate/
K10divav33u:736: p.41.3cd/.brāhmaṇe vānya^jātau vā naiṣāṃ kiñcid viśiṣyate//
K10divav33u:737: p.41.4ab/.na hy ātmanaḥ samutkarṣaḥ śreṣṭha tvam iha yujyate/
K10divav33u:740: p.41.5cd/.bhavet te bhaginī bhāryā naitad brāhmaṇa yujyate//
K10divav33u:741: p.41.6ab/.yadi tāvad ayaṃ loko brahmaṇā janitaḥ svayaṃ/
K10divav33u:743: p.41.7ab/.atha vaiśyasya vaiśyā vai śūdrā śūdrasya vā punaḥ/
K10divav33u:744: p.41.7cd/.na bhāryā bhaginī yuktā brahmaṇā janitā yadi//
K10divav33u:745: p.41.8ab/.na sattvā brahmaṇo jātāḥ kleśajāḥ karmajāstvamī/
K10divav33u:746: p.41.8cd/.nīcaiś ca^uccaiś ca dūśyante sattvā nānā^āśrayāḥ pṛthak//
K10divav33u:747: p.41.9ab/.teṣāṃ ca jātisāmānyād brāhmaṇe kṣatriye tathā/
K10divav33u:748: p.41.9cd/.atha vaiśye ca śūdre ca samaṃ jñānaṃ pravartate//
K10divav33u:750: p.42.1cd/.itihāso nighaṇṭaś ca kutaś chando nirarthakaṃ//
K10divav33u:751: p.42.2ab/.asmākam apy adhyayane maitrī vidyā tathā śikhī/
K10divav33u:753: p.42.3ab/.manojavā ca gāndhārī ghorī vidyā vaśaṅkarī/
K10divav33u:763: p.42.6cd/.na hy asau brāhmaṇīputraḥ kiṃ vā brāhmaṇa manyase//
K10divav33u:766: p.43.2ab/.na hy asau brāhmaṇīputraḥ kiṃ vā brāhmaṇa vakṣyasi//
K10divav33u:767: p.43.2cd/.kṣatriyā reṇukā nāma jajñe rāmaṃ mahā^muniṃ/
K10divav33u:769: p.43.3ab/.na hy asau brāhmaṇīputraḥ kiṃ vā brāhmaṇa vakṣyasi//
K10divav33u:772: p.43.4ab/.paṇḍitāś ca vinītāś ca loke ca;
K10divav33u:774: p.43.4cd/.na hi te brāhmaṇīputrāḥ kiṃ vā brāhmaṇa vakṣyasi//
K10divav33u:775: p.43.5ab/.saṃjñā kṛteyaṃ lokasya brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyās tathā/
K10divav33u:776: p.43.5cd/.vaiśyāx ca^eva tathā śūdrāḥ saṃjñeyaṃ saṃprakīrtitā//
K10divav33u:777: p.43.6/.tasmāt te brāhmaṇa bravīmi saṃjñāmātrakam idaṃlokasya yad uta brāhmaṇa iti vā kṣatriya iti vā vaiśya iti vā śūdara iti vā/
K10divav33u:779: putrāya me (44) śārdūlakarṇāya prakṛtiṃ duhitaram anuprayaccha bharyarthāya/
K10divav33u:781: p.44.1/.idaṃ ca punarvacanaṃ śrutvā triśaṅkor mātaṅga^rājasya bbrāhmaṇaḥ puskarasārī triśaṅkuṃ mātaṅga^rājam idam avocat/
K10divav33u:789: tad yathā vātsyāḥ kautsyā bharadvājāś ca/
K10divav33u:811: atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin sotpattikāṃ sāvitrīṃ pravakṣyāmi/
K10divav33u:814: p.44.5/.bhūta^pūrvaṃ brāhmaṇātīte +adhvani vasur nāma ṛṣir bhūva/
K10divav33u:816: tena tatra takṣakaduhitā kapilā nāma āsāditā bhāryā^arthaṃ/
K10divav33u:817: sa tatra saṃrakta^cittas tayā kanyayā sārdhaṃ maithunam agacchat/
K10divav33u:818: sa ṛṣi (45) ṛddhyā bhraṣṭo dhyānebhyo vañcitaḥ/
K10divav33u:819: ṛddhiparihīnaḥ sa vipratisārī ātmano duścaritaṃ vigarhamāṇas tasyāṃ
K10divav33u:820: velāyāṃ sāvitrīṃ bhāṣate sma/ tad yathā/
K10divav33u:822: tat savitur vareṇyaṃ bhargo devasya dhīmahi/
K10divav33u:824: p.45.2/.iti hi brāhmaṇa ajñāna^śodhanārtham imam eva mantraṃ sa brāhmaṇo divā^rātraṃ japati sma/
K10divav33u:828: p.45.3cd/.gambhīrāv abhāse tatra hy ātmārāmas taporataḥ/
K10divav33u:829: p.45.4/.devasya śreṣṭhakaṃ bhījanam apanābhyo paviṣṭa imaṃmantram ajapat/
K10divav33u:839: p.46.2ab/.kāmā hi loke paramāḥ prajānāṃ kleśaprahāṇe bhūtā antarāyāḥ/
K10divav33u:840: p.46.2cd/.tasmād bhavantaḥ prajahantu kāmān tato +atulaṃ prāpsy atha brahma^lokaṃ/
K10divav33u:841: p.46.3/.itīyaṃ brāhmaṇa brahmaṇā sahāpatinā sāvitrī bhāṣitā,
K10divav33u:847: śrūyatāṃ bhoḥ puṣkarasārin nakṣatra^vaṃśaṃ kathayiṣyāmi/ tad yathā/
K10divav33u:848: p.46.5 /.kṛttikā rohiṇī mṛgaśirā ārdrā punarvashḥ puṣyaḥ aśleṣā maghā pūrvaphalgunī
K10divav33u:849: uttaraphalgunī hastā citrā svātī viśākhā anurādhā jyeṣṭhā mūlā pūrvāṣāḍhā uttarāṣāḍhā
K10divav33u:850: abhijit śravaṇā dhaniṣṭhā śatabhiṣā pūrvabhādrapadā uttarabhādrapadā revatī aśvinī bharaṇī /
K10divav33u:852: p.46.6/.kati^tārakāṇi kati^saṃsthānāni kati^muhūrta^yogāni kim^āhārāṇi kiṃ^daivatāni kiṃ^gotrāṇi/
K10divav33u:853: p.46.7/.kṛttikā bhoḥ puṣkarasārin nakṣatraṃ ṣaṭtāraṃ kṣura^saṃsthānaṃ triṃśan^muhūrta^yogaṃ (47)
K10divav33u:855: rohiṇī^nakṣatraṃ pañca^tārakaṃ śakaṭākṛti^saṃsthānaṃ pañca^catvāriṃśan^muhūrta^yogaṃ mṛgamāṃsāhāraṃ prajāpati^daivataṃ bhāradvājaṃ gotreṇa/
K10divav33u:858: ārdra^nakṣatram eka^tāraṃ tilaka^saṃsthānaṃ pañca^daśa^muhūrta^yogaṃ sarpirmaṇḍāhāraṃ sūrya^daivataṃ hārītītāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
K10divav33u:863: aśleṣā^nakṣatram eka^tāraṃ tilaka^saṃsthānaṃ pañca^daśa^muhūrta^yogaṃ pāyasa^bhojanaṃ sarpa^daivataṃ maitrāyaṇīyaṃ gotreṇa/
K10divav33u:866: pañca^tāraṃ nadī^kubja^saṃsthānaṃ triśan^muhūrta^yogaṃ tila^kṛsarāhāraṃ pitṛdaivataṃ piṅgalāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
K10divav33u:867: pūrvaphalgunī^nakṣatraṃ dvitāraṃ padaka^saṃsthānaṃ triśan muhūrta^yogaṃ vilvabhojanaṃ bhavadevataṃ gautamīyaṃ gotreṇa/
K10divav33u:869: padaka^saṃsthānaṃ pañca^catvāriṃśan^muhūrta^yogaṃ godhūmamatsyāhāram aryamādaivataṃ kauśikaṃ gotreṇa/
K10divav33u:870: hasta^nakṣatraṃ pañca^tāraṃ hasta^saṃsthānaṃ triṃśan^muhūrta^yogaṃ śyāmākabhojanaṃ sūrya^daivataṃ kāśyapaṃ gotreṇa/
K10divav33u:871: citrā^nakṣatram eka^tāraṃ tilaka^saṃsthānaṃ triṃśan^muhūrta^yogaṃ mudgakṛsaraghṛta^pūpāhāraṃ tvaṣṭṛdaivataṃ kātyāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
K10divav33u:872: p.48.1/.svātī^nakṣatram eka^tāraṃ tilaka^saṃsthānaṃ pañca^daśa^muhūrta^yogaṃ mudgakṛsaraphalāhāraṃ vāyudaivataṃ kātyāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
K10divav33u:873: viśākhā^nakṣatraṃ dvitāraṃ viṣāṇa^saṃsthānaṃ pañca^catvāriṃśan^muhūrta^yogaṃ tila^puṣpāhāram indrāgnidaivataṃ śāṃkhāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
K10divav33u:874: p.49.1.ity etāni bhoḥ puṣkarasārin sapta^nakṣatrāṇi dakṣiṇādvārakāṇi/
K10divav33u:875: p.49.2/.anurādhā^nakṣatraṃ catustāraṃ ratnābalī^saṃsthānaṃ triśan^muhūrta^yogaṃ surāmāṃsāhāraṃ mitradaivatam ālaṃbāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
K10divav33u:876: jyeṣṭhā^nakṣatraṃ tritāraṃ yavamadhya^saṃsthānaṃ pañca^daśa^muhūrta^yogaṃ śāliyavāgubhojanam indradaivataṃ dīrghakātyāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
K10divav33u:877: mūla^nakṣatraṃ saptatāraṃ vṛścika^saṃsthānaṃ triśan^muhūrta^yogaṃ mūlaphalāhāraṃ nairṛtidaivataṃ
K10divav33u:879: pūrvāṣāḍhā^nakṣatraṃ catustāraṃ govikrama^saṃsthānaṃ triśan^muhūrta^yogaṃ nyagrodhakaṣāyāhāraṃ toyadaivataṃ darbhakātyāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
K10divav33u:880: uttarāṣāḍhā^nakṣatraṃ catustāraṃ gajavikrama^saṃsthānaṃ pañca^catvāriṃśan^muhūrta^yogaṃ madhu^lājāhāraṃ viśva^daivataṃ maudgalāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
K10divav33u:883: śravaṇā^nakṣatraṃ tritāraṃ yavamadhya^saṃsthānaṃ triṃśan^muhūrta^yogaṃ pakṣimāṃsāhāraṃ viṣṇudaivataṃ kātyāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
K10divav33u:884: p.50.1/.ity etāni bhoḥ puṣkarasārin sapta^nakṣatrāṇi paścimadvārakāṇi/
K10divav33u:885: p.50.2/.dhaniṣṭhā^nakṣatraṃ catustāraṃ śakuna^saṃsthānaṃ triṃśan^muhūrta^yogaṃ kulatthapūpāhāraṃ vasudaivataṃ kauṇḍinyāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
K10divav33u:886: śatabhiṣā^nakṣatram eka^tāraṃ tilaka^saṃsthānaṃ pañca^daśa^muhūrta^yogaṃ yavāgubhojanaṃ varuṇadaivataṃ tāṇḍyāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
K10divav33u:891: revatī^nakṣatram eka^tāraṃ tilaka^saṃsthānaṃ triśan^muhūrta^yogaṃ dadhyāhāraṃ pūṣadaivatam aṣṭabhaginīyaṃ gotreṇa/
K10divav33u:894: bharaṇī^nakṣatraṃ tritāraṃ bhaga^saṃsthānaṃ triṃśan^muhūrta^yogaṃ tila^taṇḍūlāhāraṃ yamadaivataṃ bhārgavīyaṃ gotreṇa/
K10divav33u:895: p.51.1/.ity etāni bhoḥ puṣkarasārin sapta^nakṣatrāṇi uttara^dvārakāṇi/
K10divav33u:896: p.51.2/.amīṣāṃ bhoḥ pppuṣkarasārinn aṣṭāviṃśatīnāṃ nakṣatrāṇāṃ ṣaṇ^nakṣatrāṇi pañca^catvāriṃśan^muhūrta^yogāni/
K10divav33u:898: rohiṇī punarvasu uttaraphalgunī viśākhā uttarāṣāḍhā uttarabhādrapadā ceti/
K10divav33u:901: ārdrā aśleṣā svātī jyeṣṭhā śatabhiṣā ceti/
K10divav33u:904: p.52.1/.amīṣāṃ bhoḥ puṣkarasārin saptānāṃ nakṣatrāṇāṃ pūrva^dvārikāṇāṃ kṛttikā prathamā nāmāśleṣā paścimā nāma/
K10divav33u:905: amīṣāṃ saptānāṃ nakṣatrāṇāṃ dakṣiṇa^dvārikāṇāṃ maghā prathamā nāma viśākhā paścimā nāma/
K10divav33u:906: amīṣāṃ paścimadvārikāṇāṃ saptānāṃ nakṣatrāṇām anurādhā prathamā nāma śravaṇā paścimā nāma/
K10divav33u:907: amīṣāṃ saptānāṃ nakṣatrāṇām uttara^dvārikāṇāṃ dhaniṣṭhā prathamā
K10divav33u:909: p.53.2/.amīṣāṃ bhoḥ puṣkarasārinn aṣṭāviṃśatīnāṃ nakṣatrāṇāṃ sapta balāni/
K10divav33u:911: yad uta trīṇi pūrvāṇi viśākhānurādhā punarvashḥ svātiś ca/
K10divav33u:915: yad uta trīṇi uttarāṇi rohiṇī ceti/
K10divav33u:917: śravaṇā dhaniṣṭhā śatabhiṣā jyeṣṭhā mūlā iti/
K10divav33u:922: yad uta kṛttikā mṛgaśirā puṣyā aśvinī ceti/
K10divav33u:924: p.52.3/.amīṣāṃ bhoḥ puṣkarasārinn aṣṭaviṃśatīnāṃ nakṣatrāṇāṃ trayo yogā bhavanti/
K10divav33u:928: tatra nakṣatraṃ yadi purastād gacchati candraś ca pṛṣṭhataḥ,
K10divav33u:930: yad uta candraḥ purastād gacchati nakṣatraṃ ca pṛṣṭhataḥ,
K10divav33u:936: p.53.1/.atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin grahān pravakṣyāmi tac chrūyatāṃ/
K10divav33u:937: tad yathā śukro bṛhaspatiḥ śanaiścaro budho +aṅgārakaḥ sūryas tārādhipatiś ceti/
K10divav33u:939: p.53.2/.evaṃ viparivartamāne loke nakṣatreṣu pravibhakteṣu kathaṃ rātridivasānāṃ hrāso vṛddhiś ca bhavati/ tad ucyate/
K10divav33u:940: p.53.3/.hemantānāṃ dvitīye māsi rohiṇyām aṣṭamyāṃ dvādaśa^muhūrto divaso bhavati/
K10divav33u:942: grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse rohiṇyām aṣṭamyām aṣṭādaśa^muhūrto divaso bhavati/
K10divav33u:944: varṣāṇāṃ paścime māse rohiṇyām aṣṭamyāṃ catur^daśa^muhūrto divaso bhavati/
K10divav33u:956: p.54.2/.tad yathā bhoḥ puṣkarasārin striyā nātidīrghahrasvaḥ kartinyāḥ sūtrodyāmaḥ/
K10divav33u:961: etena kramasambandhena triṃśan^muhūrtam ekaṃ rātridivasam anumīyate/
K10divav33u:963: p.54.3/.āditya udayati ṣaṇṇavati^pauruṣāyāṃ chāyāyāṃ caturojā nāma muhūrto bhavati/
K10divav33u:964: ṣaṣṭipauruṣāyāṃ chāyāyāṃ śveto nāma muhūrto bhavati/
K10divav33u:965: dvādaśa^pauruṣāyāṃ chāyāyāṃ samṛddho nāma muhūrto bhavati/
K10divav33u:966: ṣaṭpauruṣāyāṃ chāyāyāṃ śarapatho nāma muhūrto bhavati/
K10divav33u:967: p.55.1/.pañca^pauruṣāyāṃ chāyāyām atisamṛddho nāma muhūrto bhavat/
K10divav33u:968: catuḥ^pauruṣāyāṃ chāyāyām udgato nāma muhūrto bhavati/
K10divav33u:969: tripauruṣāyāṃ chāyāyāṃ sumukho nāma muhūrto bhavati/
K10divav33u:970: sthite madhyāhne vajrako nāma muhūrto bhavati/
K10divav33u:971: parivṛtte madhyāhne tripuruṣāyāṃ chāyāyāṃ rohito nāma muhūrto bhavati/
K10divav33u:972: p.55.2/.catuḥ^pauruṣāyāṃ chāyāyāṃ balo nāma muhūrto bhavati/
K10divav33u:977: avataramāṇa āditye ṣaṇṇavati^pauruṣāyāṃ chāyāyāṃ parabhayo nāma muhūrto bhavati/
K10divav33u:979: p.55.4/.atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin rātryā muhūrtāni vyākhyāsyāmi/
K10divav33u:988: atikrānte +ardharātre brahmā nāma muhūrtaḥ/ ditir nāma
K10divav33u:992: iti bhoḥ puṣkarasārin imāni triśan muhūrtāni yair aho^rātraṃ prajñāyate/
K10divav33u:997: tad yathā striyā nātidīrghahrasvaḥ kartinyāḥ sūtrodyāmaḥ/
K10divav33u:1007: sumukho vajrako rohito balo vijayaḥ sarva^raso vasuḥ sundaraḥ para^bhayaḥ/
K10divav33u:1008: raudras tārāvacaraḥ saṃyamaḥ sāṃpraiyako +annanto gardabho rākṣaso +avayavo brahmā ditir arko vidhamano āgneya ātapāgnir abhijit/
K10divav33u:1011: p.57.2ab/.kālotpattim api te brāhmaṇa vakṣyāmi śṛṇu/
K10divav33u:1012: p.57.2cd/.kālasya kiṃ pramāṇam iti tad ucyate/
K10divav33u:1018: p.57.4/.nāḍikāyāḥ punaḥ kiṃ pramāṇaṃ/ tad ucyate/
K10divav33u:1025: yadā ca^evaṃ śīryeta tat toyaṃ ghaṭasya tadaikā nāḍikā/
K10divav33u:1026: etena nālikāpramāṇena vibhakte dve nāḍika eko muhūrtaḥ/
K10divav33u:1027: etena bho brāhmaṇa triṃśan muhūrtāḥ/ yai
K10divav33u:1035: p.58.2/.etena punarakṣinimeṣeṇa ṣoḍaśakoṭayo +aṣṭapañcāśac ca śata^sahasrāṇi aṣṭāśīti^sahasrāṇi sa evaṃ māpitaḥ/
K10divav33u:1056: p.59.1/.paramāṇūnāṃ koṭiśata^sahasrāṇi catur^viṃśatiś caikonatriṃśatkoṭi^sahasrāṇi dvādaśa ca śata^sahasrāṇi/
K10divav33u:1063: dve koṭī pañca^viṃśatiś ca sahasrāṇi pañca^śatāny aṣṭau ca paramāṇavaḥ/
K10divav33u:1068: paramāṇūnām aṣṭakoṭayaḥ saptacatvāriṃśac ca śata^sahasrāṇi sapta ca sahasrāṇi dve śate +aśītiś ca paramāṇavaḥ/
K10divav33u:1069: evaṃ māpitaṃ brāhmaṇa palasya parimāṇam iti/
K10divav33u:1075: dve koṭiśate tisraś ca koṭaya ekonatiṃśac ca śata^sahasrāṇi catuḥsaptati (60)
K10divav33u:1076: sahasrāṇi sapta ca śatāni viṃśatiś ca paramāṇavaḥ/
K10divav33u:1082: koṭiśatam aṣṭapañcāśac ca koṭayo dvir aśītiś ca śata sahasrāṇi eka^ṣaṣṭiś ca sahasrāṇi pañca^śatāni triṃśac ca paramāṇavaḥ/
K10divav33u:1083: evaṃ māpitaṃ brāhmaṇa dhānyasya parimāṇam iti/
K10divav33u:1086: atha khalu bho brāhmaṇa nakṣatra^vyākaranaṃ nāma^adhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi/
K10divav33u:1090: rohiṇyāṃ jātaḥ subhago bhavati bhogavāṃś ca/
K10divav33u:1093: punarvasau jātaḥ kṛṣimān bhavati gorakṣaś ca/
K10divav33u:1112: uttarāṣāḍhāyāṃ jāto bhakteśvaraḥ kulīnaś ca bhavati/
K10divav33u:1127: atha bhoḥ puṣkarasārin nakṣatra^nirdeśaṃ nāma^adhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi tac chrūyatāṃ /
K10divav33u:1129: p.62.2ab/.kṛttikāsu niviṣṭaṃ vai nagaraṃ jvalati śriyā/
K10divav33u:1131: p.62.3ab/.rohiṇyāṃ tu niviṣṭaṃ vai nagaraṃ tad vinirdiśet/
K10divav33u:1134: p.62.4ab/.mṛgaśīrṣe niviṣṭaṃ tu strībhir gobhir dhanais tathā/
K10divav33u:1135: p.62.4cd/.mālyabhogaiś ca saṅkīrṇam adbhutaiś ca puraskṛtaṃ//
K10divav33u:1138: p.63.2ab/.punarvasau niviṣṭe tu nagaraṃ dīpyate śriyā/
K10divav33u:1140: p.63.3ab/.srīmatpuṣye niviṣṭe tu prajā duṣṭā prasīdati/
K10divav33u:1141: p.63.3cd/.yuktāḥ śriyā ca dharmiṣṭhās tathiva cirajīvinaḥ//
K10divav33u:1143: p.63.4cd/.vanaspatis tathā kṣipraṃ puṣyet tatra punaḥ punaḥ//
K10divav33u:1146: p.63.6ab/.maghāyāṃ ca niviṣṭe tu vidyāvanto mahā^dhanāḥ/
K10divav33u:1148: p.64.1ab/.phalgunyāṃ tu striyo mālyaṃ bhojanācchādanaṃ śubhaṃ/
K10divav33u:1150: p.64.2ab/.uttarāyāṃ tu phālgunyāṃ dhānyāni ca dhanāni ca/
K10divav33u:1151: p.64.2cd/.mūrkhā janā jitāḥ strībhir niviṣṭe nagare bhavet//
K10divav33u:1152: p.64.3ab/.haste ca viniviṣṭe tu vidyāvanto mahā^dhanāḥ/
K10divav33u:1153: p.64.3cd/.parasparaṃ ca rucitaṃ śayanaṃ nagare bhavet//
K10divav33u:1154: p.64.4ab/.citrāyāṃ ca niviṣṭe tu strī^jitāḥ sarva^mānavāḥ/
K10divav33u:1155: p.64.4cd/.śrīmat^kāntaṃ ca nagaraṃ jvalantaṃ tad vinirdiśet//
K10divav33u:1157: p.64.5cd/.lubdhāḥ krūrāś ca mūrkhāś ca prabhūtā nagare bhavet//
K10divav33u:1158: p.64.6ab/.viśākhāyāṃ niviṣṭaṃ tu nagaraṃ jvalati śriyā/
K10divav33u:1167: p.65.3cd/.lubdhāḥ krūrāś ca mūrkhāś ca nivasanti narādhamāḥ//
K10divav33u:1170: p.65.5ab/.abhijiti niviṣṭe tu nagare tatra moditāḥ/
K10divav33u:1174: p.65.7ab/.dhaniṣṭhāyāṃ niviṣṭaṃ tu strī^jitaṃ puram ādiśet/
K10divav33u:1181: p.66.2cd/.pūrṇaṃ ca dhana^dhānyābhyāṃ ratnāḍhyaṃ ca vinirdiśet//
K10divav33u:1182: p.66.3ab/.pure niviṣṭe raivatyāṃ sundarī janatā bhavet/
K10divav33u:1184: p.66.4ab/.aśvinyāṃ viniviṣṭaṃ tu nagaraṃ śivam ādiśet/
K10divav33u:1188: p.66.6ab/.purāṇi rāṣṭraṇi tathā gṛhāṇi nakṣatra^yogaṃ prasamīkṣya vidvān/
K10divav33u:1189: p.66.6cd/.iṣṭe praśaste ca niveśayet tu pūrve ca janme +adhigataṃ mayedaṃ//
K10divav33u:1225: p.68.1/.ayaṃ bhoḥ puṣkarasārin nakṣatrāṇāṃ sthāna^nirdeśa^vyākaraṇo nāma^adhyāyaḥ/
K10divav33u:1230: p.68.3/.kṛttikāsu grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati catuḥṣaṣṭy^āḍhakāni pravarṣati/
K10divav33u:1238: p.69.1/.rohiṇyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati eka^viṃśatyāḍhakāni pravarṣati/
K10divav33u:1241: eṣa ca varṣārātraḥ sāroparodhaḥ sasyaṃ ca saṃpādayati/
K10divav33u:1246: p.69.2/.mṛgaśirasi grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati catuḥṣaṣṭy^āḍhakāni pravarṣati/
K10divav33u:1254: p.70.1/.ārdrāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati aṣṭādaśāḍhakāni pravarṣati/
K10divav33u:1264: p.70.2/.punarvasau grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati/
K10divav33u:1271: p.71.1/.puṣye grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati dvātriṃśadāḍhakāni pravarṣati/
K10divav33u:1279: gaṇḍāḥ piṭakāḥ pāmāni ca / ity uktaṃ
K10divav33u:1281: p.71.2/.aśleṣāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati eka^viṃśatyāḍhakāni pravarṣati/
K10divav33u:1285: saṃvignāś ca^atra jñānino rājānaś ca bhavanti/
K10divav33u:1289: p.71.3/.maghāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati catuḥṣaṣṭy^āḍhakāni (72)
K10divav33u:1295: p.72.1/.pūrvaphalgunyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati catuḥṣaṣṭy^āḍhakāni pravarṣati/
K10divav33u:1297: tac ca sasyaṃ janayitvā para^cakra^pīḍitā manuṣyā na sukhenopabhuñjate/
K10divav33u:1298: paśūnāṃ maṇuṣyāṇāṃ ca^atra garbhāḥ sukhino bhavanti/
K10divav33u:1300: p.72.2/.uttaraphalgunyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati aśītyāḍhakāni pravarṣati/
K10divav33u:1306: p.72.3/.haste grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati ekonapañcāśadāḍhakāni (73)
K10divav33u:1309: patitāni ca sasyāni janasyārasāgrāṇi anudagrāṇi alpa^sārāṇy alpodakāni/
K10divav33u:1312: p.73.1/.citrāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati catuḥṣaṣṭy^āḍhakāni pravarṣati/
K10divav33u:1317: p.73.2/.svātyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati eka^viṃśatyāḍhakāni pravarṣati/
K10divav33u:1321: p.73.3/.viśākhāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati aśītyāḍhakāni (74)
K10divav33u:1328: p.74.1/.anurādhāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati ṣaṣṭyāḍhakāni pravarṣati/
K10divav33u:1332: p.74.2/.jyeṣṭhāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati ṣoḍaśāḍhakāni pravarṣati/
K10divav33u:1341: p.74.3/.mūle grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati catuṣaṣṭyāḍhakāni (75)
K10divav33u:1348: nikṣiptaśastrāś ca^atra rājāno bhavanti/ uktaṃ mūle/
K10divav33u:1349: p.75.1/.pūrvasyām āṣāḍhāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati ṣaṣṭyāḍhakāni pravarṣati/
K10divav33u:1356: p.75.2/.uttarasyām āṣāḍhāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati pūrṇam āḍhakaśataṃ pravarṣati/
K10divav33u:1365: p.75.3/.abhijiti grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra pravarṣati catuḥṣaṣṭy^āḍhākāni (76)
K10divav33u:1371: p.76.1/.śravaṇe tu grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati catuṣṣaṣṭyāḍhakāni pravarṣati/
K10divav33u:1378: p.76.2/.dhaniṣṭhāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati eka^pañcāśadāḍhakāni pravarṣati/
K10divav33u:1388: p.76.3/.śatabhiṣāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati ṣoḍaśāḍhakāni (77)
K10divav33u:1394: manuṣyā dārakadārikāś ca skandhe kṛtvā deśa^antaraṃ gacchanti/
K10divav33u:1396: p.77.1/.pūrvasyāṃ bhādrapadāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati catuḥṣaṣṭy^āḍhakāni pravarṣati/
K10divav33u:1406: p.77.2/.uttarasyāṃ bhādrapadāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati pūrṇam āḍhakaśataṃ pravarṣati/
K10divav33u:1415: etāś ca varṣāḥ puṣpāṇi phalāni ca sampādayanti/
K10divav33u:1417: p.78.1/.revatyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati eka^ṣaṣṭyāḍhakāni pravarṣati/
K10divav33u:1427: p.78.2/.aśvinyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati aṣṭacatvāriṃśadāḍhakāni pravarṣati/
K10divav33u:1435: p.79.1/.bharaṇyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati pūrṇam āḍhakaśataṃ pravarṣati/
K10divav33u:1445: p.79.3/.amīṣāṃ bhoḥ puṣkarasārinn aśṭāviṃśatīnāṃ nakṣatrāṇāṃ rāhugrahe phalavipākaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi/
K10divav33u:1446: p.79.4./kṛttikāsu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin yadi candra^graho bhavati kaliṅgamagadhānām upapīḍā bhavati/
K10divav33u:1447: yadi rohiṇyāṃ candra^graho bhavati prajānām upapīḍā bhavati/
K10divav33u:1448: yadi mṛgaśirasi candra^graho bhavati videhānāṃ janapadānām upapīḍā bhavati/
K10divav33u:1450: evam ārdrāyāṃ punarvasau puṣye ca vaktavyaṃ/
K10divav33u:1451: aśleṣāyāṃ yadi candra^graho bhavati nāgānāṃ haimavatānāṃ
K10divav33u:1453: yadi maghāsu candra^graho bhavati gauḍikānām upapīḍā bhavati/
K10divav33u:1454: yadi pūrvaphalgunyāṃ somo gṛhyate caurāṇām upapīḍā (80) bhavati/
K10divav33u:1455: yady uttaraphalgunyāṃ somo gṛhyate +avantīnām upapīḍā bhavati/
K10divav33u:1456: yadi hasteṣu somo gṛhyate saurāṣṭrikāṇām upapīḍā bhavati/
K10divav33u:1457: yadi citrāyāṃ somo gṛhyate pakṣiṇāṃ dvipadānāṃ ca pīḍā bhavati/
K10divav33u:1460: yady anurādhāsu somo gṛhyate vaṇijānām upapīḍā bhavati śākaṭikānāṃ ca/
K10divav33u:1461: yadi jyeṣṭhāyāṃ somo gṛhyate dauvālikānāṃ pīḍā bhavati/
K10divav33u:1462: yadi mūle somo gṛhyate +adhvagānāṃ pīḍā bhavati/
K10divav33u:1463: yadi pūrvāṣāḍhāyāṃ somo gṛhyate +avantīnāṃ pīḍā bhavati/
K10divav33u:1464: yady uttarāṣāḍhāyāṃ somo gṛhyate kāmbojakānāṃ pīḍā bhavati/
K10divav33u:1466: yady abhijiti somo gṛhyate dakṣiṇāpathikānāṃ pīḍā bhavati/
K10divav33u:1468: yadi śravaṇeṣu somo gṛhyate caurāṇāṃ ghātakānāṃ ca^upapīḍā bhavati/
K10divav33u:1469: yadi dhaniṣṭhāyāṃ somo gṛhyate kurupāñcālanāṃ pīḍā bhavati/
K10divav33u:1470: yadi śatabhiṣāyāṃ somo gṛhyate maulikānām ātharvaṇikānāṃ ca pīḍā bhavati/
K10divav33u:1471: yadi pūrvabhādrapadāyāṃ somo gṛhyate gāndhikānāṃ yavana^kāmbojakānāṃ ca pīḍā
K10divav33u:1474: yadi revatyāṃ somo gṛhyate nāvikānāṃ pīḍā bhavati/
K10divav33u:1476: yadi bharaṇyāṃ somo gṛhyate bharukacchānāṃ pīḍā bhavati/
K10divav33u:1477: p.81.1/.evaṃ bhoḥ puṣkarasārin nakṣatre candra^graho bhavati tasya tasya deśasya pīḍā bhavati/
K10divav33u:1483: p.81.3cd/.ṣaṭtārāṃ kṛttikāṃ vidyād āśrayaṃ tāsu kārayet/
K10divav33u:1485: p.81.4ab/.sarpirviloḍayet tatra gavāṃ veśma ca kārayet/
K10divav33u:1486: p.81.4cd/.ajaiḍakāś ca kretavyā gavāṃ ca vṛṣam utsṛjet//
K10divav33u:1487: p.81.5ab/.aśmasāramayaṃ bhāṇḍaṃ sarvam atra tu kārayet/
K10divav33u:1491: p.82.1ab/.gṛhaṃ ca māpayet atra tathā +avāsaṃ prakalpayet/
K10divav33u:1492: p.82.1cd/.navaṃ ca chādayed vastraṃ krayaṇaṃ na^atra kārayet//
K10divav33u:1495: p.82.3ab/.śastrāṇi kṣurakarmāṇi sarvāṇy atra tu kārayet/
K10divav33u:1496: p.82.3cd/.tejasāni ca bhāṇḍāni kārayec ca krīṇīta ca//
K10divav33u:1497: p.82.4ab/.āyuṣyaṃ ca śiraḥ^snānāṃ strīṇāṃ viṣkambhaṇāni ca/
K10divav33u:1498: p.82.4cd/.pravarṣaṇaṃ ced devasya na^atra vairaṃ praśāmyati//
K10divav33u:1500: p.82.5cd/.āyuṣmāṃś ca yaśasvī ca yajña^śīlo +atra jāyate//kṛttikāsu
K10divav33u:1502: p.82.6cd/.kṣetravastuvihārāṃś ca navaṃ veśma ca kārayet//
K10divav33u:1503: p.82.7ab/.prayojayec cakrān vārān dāsāṃś ca^eva gṛhe paśūn/
K10divav33u:1505: p.83.1ab/.ṛṇaṃ na dadyāt tatra^eva vairam atra tu vardhate/
K10divav33u:1506: p.83.1cd/.saṃgrāmaṃ ca surāyogaṃ dvayam eva vivarjayet//
K10divav33u:1507: p.83.2ab/.pravarṣaṇaṃ ca devasya janma ca^atra praśasyate/
K10divav33u:1510: p.83.3ab/.saumyaṃ mṛgaśiro vidyād ṛju tisraś ca tārakāḥ/
K10divav33u:1511: p.83.3cd/.mṛdūni yāni karmāṇi tāni sarvāṇi kārayet/
K10divav33u:1512: p.83.3ef/.yāni karmāṇi rohiṇyāṃ tāni sarvāṇi kārayet//
K10divav33u:1513: p.83.3ab/.sakṣīrān vāpayed vṛkṣān bījāni kṣīravanti ca/
K10divav33u:1516: p.83.4cd/.uṣṭrāṃś ca balīvardāṃś ca damayed api kṛṣṭaye//
K10divav33u:1517: p.83.5ab/.ācchādayen navaṃ vāsaś ca^alaṅkāraṃ ca kārayet/
K10divav33u:1518: p.83.5cd/.dvijātīnāṃ tu karmāṇi sarvāṇy evātra kārayet//
K10divav33u:1519: p.83.6ab/.pravarṣaṇaṃ ca devasya suvṛṣṭiṃ ca^atra nirdiśet/
K10divav33u:1520: p.83.6cd/.svapnaśīlas tathā trāsī medhāvī sa ca jāyate//
K10divav33u:1522: p.84.1ab/.ārdrāyāṃ mṛgayed arthān bhadraṃ karma ca kārayet/
K10divav33u:1525: prathamāṃ vṛṣṭiṃ vikrīṇīyāc ca na^atra gāṃ/
K10divav33u:1531: p.84.4ab/.punarvasau tu yukte +atra kuryād vai vrata^dhāraṇaṃ/
K10divav33u:1534: p.84.5cd/.punaḥ punar yadīccheta tatra karmāṇi kārayet//
K10divav33u:1535: p.85.1ab/.cikitsanaṃ na kurvīta yadīcchen na parābhavaṃ/
K10divav33u:1536: p.85.1cd/.pravarṣaṇaṃ ca devasya janma ca^atra praśasyate//
K10divav33u:1537: p.85.2ab/.alīlaś ca^atra jāyeta strī^lolaś ca^api mānavaḥ/
K10divav33u:1540: p.85.3ab/.dhanyaṃ yaśasyam āyuṣyaṃ puṣye nityaṃ prayojayet/
K10divav33u:1546: p.85.5cd/.purohitaṃ ca kurvīta dhvaja^agraṃ ca prakārayet//
K10divav33u:1548: p.85.6cd/.na ca rogo na cauraś ca kṣemaṃ ca^atra sadā bhavet//
K10divav33u:1550: p.85.7cd/.vaireṇātropanāhaiś ca ye janās tān vivarjayet/
K10divav33u:1551: p.85.7ef/.āyuṣmāṃś ca yaśasvī ca mahā^bhogaḥ prajāyate//puṣye//
K10divav33u:1557: p.86.2ef/.krodhanaḥ svapnaśīlaś ca kuhakaś ca^atra jāyate//aśleṣāyāṃ//
K10divav33u:1563: p.86.5cd/.suhṛc ca dvārikaś ca^eva rasa^kāmaś ca jāyate/
K10divav33u:1565: p.86.6ab/.saṃgrāmaṃ jīyate tatra yadi pūrvaṃ pravartate/
K10divav33u:1566: p.86.6cd/.dāruṇāni ca karmāṇi tāni vidvān vivarjayet//maghāsu//
K10divav33u:1573: p.87.3cd/.bhāgaṃ ye ca^upajīvanti teṣāṃ karma prayojayet//

K10divav33u:2303: rohiṇyāṃ baddho vā ruddho vā tri^rātreṇa mokṣyati^iti/
K10divav33u:2304: mṛgaśirasi baddho vā ruddho vā eka^viṃśati rātreṇa mokṣyati^iti/
K10divav33u:2305: ārdrāyāṃ baddho vā ruddho vā +ardha^māsena mokṣyati^iti/
K10divav33u:2306: punarvasau ruddho vā baddho vā sapta^rātrena/
K10divav33u:2319: śravaṇe dhaniṣṭhāyāṃ śatabhiṣāyāṃ pūrvabhadrapade uttarabhādrapade revatyāṃ
K10divav33u:2322: bharaṇyāṃ baddho vā ruddho vā parikleśam avāpsyati^iti vaktavyaḥ/
K10divav33u:2328: p.129.4/.mūrdhni tu yasyās tilako +asti sūkṣmaḥ snigdho bhavet padma^samāna^varṇaḥ/
K10divav33u:2329: p.129.5/.rājā tu tasyā bhavati^iha bhartā stana^upariṣṭāt pratibimbam āhuḥ//
K10divav33u:2330: p.130.1ab/.śīrṣe tu yasyās tilaka^alakaḥ syāt sūkṣmo bhaved añjana^cūrṇa^varṇaḥ/
K10divav33u:2331: p.130.1cd/.senāpatis tasyā bhaved dhi bhartā stana^antare +asyāḥ pratibimbakaṃ syāt//
K10divav33u:2332: p.130.2ab/.bhrūvontare +asyās tilaka^alakaḥ syād duṣcāriṇīṃ tāṃ pramadāṃ vadanti/
K10divav33u:2333: p.130.2cd/.pañca^eva tasyāḥ patayo bhavanti bahv^anna^pānaṃ labhate ca nārī//
K10divav33u:2334: p.131.1ab/.gaṇḍasya nāsādikam adhyadeśe bhavec ca bimbaṃ tilakasya yasyāḥ/
K10divav33u:2335: p.131.1cd/.tāṃ śoka^bhājaṃ pramadāṃ vadanti romapradeśe pratibimbam āhuḥ//
K10divav33u:2336: p.131.2ab/.karṇe tu yasyās tilaka^alakaḥ syād bahu^śrutāṃ tāṃ pramadāṃ vadanti/
K10divav33u:2337: p.131.2cd/.bahu^śrūtāṃ tāṃ śrutidhāriṇīṃ ca trike tu yasyāḥ pratibimbakaṃ syāt//
K10divav33u:2338: p.131.3ab/.yasya^uttaroṣṭhe tilaka^alakaḥ syāt tāṃ bhinna^satyāṃ pramadāṃ vadanti/
K10divav33u:2339: p.131.3cd/.kṛcchreṇa sā vai labhate hi vṛttim ūrau tu tasyās tila^bimbam āhuḥ//
K10divav33u:2340: p.132.1ab/.yasyā +adharoṣṭhe tilaka^alakaḥ syād duścāriṇīṃ tāṃ pramadāṃ vadanti/
K10divav33u:2341: p.132.1cd/.miṣṭa^anna^pānaṃ bahu ṛcchate sā tathā hi guhye pratibimbakaṃ syāt//
K10divav33u:2342: p.132.2ab/.cibuke tu yasyās tilaka^alakaḥ syād duścāriṇīṃ tāṃ pramadāṃ vadanti/
K10divav33u:2343: p.132.2cd/.miṣṭa^anna^pānaṃ bahu sā labheta guhye dvitīyaṃ pratibimbakaṃ syāt//
K10divav33u:2345: p.132.4/.atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin nakṣatra^janma^guṇaṃ nāma^adhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi/
K10divav33u:2349: p.132.5b/.bhavec chūras tathā caṇḍaḥ priya^vādī ca mānavaḥ//
K10divav33u:2350: p.132.6a/.rohiṇyāṃ puruṣo jāto dhanavān dharmikas tathā/
K10divav33u:2351: p.132.6b/.vyavasāyī sthiraḥ śūro dhruvaṃ ca^asya sadā mukhaṃ//
K10divav33u:2352: p.133.1ab/.jāto mṛgaśire yas tu mṛduḥ saumyas tu mānavaḥ/
K10divav33u:2353: p.133.1cd/.darśanīyo bhavec ca^asau strī^kāntas tu viśeṣataḥ//
K10divav33u:2355: p.133.2cd/.rodrakarmā bhavec ca^asāv īścaraś ca śatair mahān//
K10divav33u:2356: p.133.3ab/.jātaḥ punarvasau yas tu hy alolo buddhimān naraḥ/
K10divav33u:2357: p.133.3cd/.dharma^śīlo bhavec ca^asau jāta^krodhaś ca mānavaḥ//
K10divav33u:2358: p.133.4ab/.puṣyeṇa puruṣo jātas tejasvī brāhmaṇo bhavet/
K10divav33u:2359: p.133.4cd/.kṣatriyaś ca bhaved rājā vaiśya^sūdrau ca pūjitau//
K10divav33u:2360: p.133.5ab/.śvasanaḥ krodhanaḥ krūro hy aśleṣā^sambhavo naraḥ/
K10divav33u:2364: p.133.6cd/.dhanavān dhānyavān bhogī maghāsu puruṣo bhavet//
K10divav33u:2365: p.133.7ab/.pūrvaphālgunī^jātas tu yaḥ kaścit puruṣo bhavet/
K10divav33u:2367: p.133.8ab/.uttarāyāṃ tu phālgunyāṃ jāto bhavati bhogavān/
K10divav33u:2368: p.133.8cd/.divyajñānaś ca vijñāne puruṣaḥ subhago bhavet//
K10divav33u:2369: p.133.9ab/.haste jātaś ca śuddha^ātmā vikrānto mṛdu^bhojanaḥ/
K10divav33u:2373: p.134.1ab/.svātyāṃ ca puruṣo jāto bandhuś lāghī cicakṣaṇaḥ/
K10divav33u:2375: p.134.2ab/.viśākhāsu naro jātas tejasvī dravyavān mahān/
K10divav33u:2376: p.134.2cd/.śūro vikramavān dakṣaḥ subhagaś ca bhaved asau//
K10divav33u:2378: p.134.3cd/.śuciś ca^eva kṛta^jñaś ca dharma^ātmā ca bhavec ca saḥ//
K10divav33u:2382: p.134.5cd/.dṛḍho vīro bhavec ca^asau kilviṣī ca sa mānavaḥ//
K10divav33u:2384: p.134.6cd/.matsya^māṃsa^priyaś ca^api ghātakaḥ syāt sa mānavaḥ//
K10divav33u:2385: p.134.7ab/.sa^anukrośaś ca dātā ca vidyāniṣṭhaḥ suhṛjjanaḥ/
K10divav33u:2386: p.134.7cd/.viśvadaive naro jāto bhaved api ca niścitaḥ//
K10divav33u:2387: p.134.8ab/.ācāryaḥ śāstra^kartā ca viśvāsī ca kriyāparaḥ/
K10divav33u:2392: p.135.1ab/.vāruṇe yadi nakṣatre jāto bhavati mānavaḥ/
K10divav33u:2393: p.135.1cd/.paruṣo kveṣaśīlaś ca parivādī ca sarvaśaḥ//
K10divav33u:2394: p.135.2ab/.jāto bhādrapadāyāṃ tu pūrvasyām iha mānavaḥ/
K10divav33u:2397: p.135.3cd/.medhāvī bahv apatyaś ca dharma^śīlo mahā^dhanaḥ//
K10divav33u:2401: p.135.5cd/.mahā^jana^priyaś ca^api śūraś ca subhagaś ca saḥ//
K10divav33u:2410: u1.2ab/.māghasya prathame pakṣe śailo vā pārthivā yadi/
K10divav33u:2414: u1.2ef/.vidyuto vā^atha dṛśyante tadā vidyāj jana^kṣayaṃ//
K10divav33u:2415: u1.3ab/.aśvinyām arkato dhūmo nirgacchann api chādayet/
K10divav33u:2418: u1.4cd/.samantād vadhyate rāṣṭraṃ madhye durbhikṣam ādiśet//
K10divav33u:2421: u1.5cd/.naśyanti karvaṭās tatra yadi devo na varṣati//
K10divav33u:2422: u1.6ab/.caitra^māse yadā puṣye sūrye kṛṣṇāṃ pradṛśyate/
K10divav33u:2425: u1.7cd/.saṃgrāmaṃ tatra jānīyād ubhau ghātyete pārthivau//
K10divav33u:2427: u1.8cd/.sa^amātyo vadhyate rājā rāṣṭre durbhikṣam ādiśet//
K10divav33u:2434: u1.12ab/.māse +atha śrāvaṇe mūle candra^sūryau na bhāsataḥ/
K10divav33u:2435: u1.12cd/.sphuliṅgāś ca^atra dṛśyante vidyād roga^bhayaṃ mahat//
K10divav33u:2440: u1.15ab/.ravivad bhāti tad^rāṣṭraṃ vinaśyeta punaḥ punaḥ/
K10divav33u:2441: u1.15cd/.rājñāṃ vidyād dhatānāṃ vai bhūmiḥ pāstyati śoṇitaṃ//
K10divav33u:2442: u1.16ab/.bharaṇyāṃ māgha^māse tu kṛṣṇo vāyuḥ samutthitaḥ/
K10divav33u:2443: u1.16cd/.chādayec candra^sūryau tu śīghraṃ rāṣṭraṃ vinaśyati//
K10divav33u:2444: u1.17ab/.māse tu phālgune vāyuḥ pāṃśuvarṣaṃ savidyutaṃ/
K10divav33u:2446: u1.18ab/.saha^ādityena candre +atha yadā kaścid grahaś caret/
K10divav33u:2447: u1.18cd/.vāyur vā viṣamo vātii vidyād rāja^vadhaṃ tadā//
K10divav33u:2459: u1.23ab/.śrāvaṇe vāyavaḥ pītāḥ sadā kṛṣṇaṃ nabhas^talaṃ/
K10divav33u:2461: u1.24ab/.śrāvaṇe varṣate hy agniḥ pūrvabhādrapade divā/
K10divav33u:2463: u1.25ab/.yadā bhādrapade māse nabhaḥ syāc channa^garjitaṃ/(p.138)
K10divav33u:2466: u1.26cd/.pātayec ca^evam āghātaṃ kṛtsnaṃ rāṣṭraṃ vinaśyati//
K10divav33u:2467: u1.27ab/.kārttike śukla^trayodaśyāṃ yadā candre dhanur bhavet/
K10divav33u:2468: u1.27cd/.samantān naśyate rāṣṭraṃ madhye durbhikṣam ādiśet//
K10divav33u:2469: u1.28ab/.ulkā^pātā hy aśanayo māgha^māse bhavanti vā/
K10divav33u:2473: u1.29cd/.bhavec chabdas tadākāśe tad^rāṣṭraṃ naśyate laghu//
K10divav33u:2474: u1.30ab/.svātyāṃ caitre yadā varṣaṃ niruddhaṃ vāta^varṣitaṃ/
K10divav33u:2479: u1.32ab/.āṣāḍhe māsi puṣye +atha dṛśyante vyogni vidyutaḥ/
K10divav33u:2481: u1.33ab/.śrāvaṇe tu yadā mūle bahu devaḥ pravarṣati/
K10divav33u:2483: u1.34ab/.māse bhādrapade yatra nirghātaḥ patati kṣitau/
K10divav33u:2485: u1.35ab/.māse bhādrapade puṣye vidigbhyo niścared dhvaniḥ/
K10divav33u:2486: u1.35cd/.kṣatriyaḥ kupyate kṣipraṃ vipakṣā tu datā prajā//
K10divav33u:2487: u1.36ab/.bharaṇyām aśvayuje śabda upariṣṭād bhaved yadi/
K10divav33u:2489: u1.37ab/.kārttike tu yadā^ārdrāyāṃ śabdaḥ śrayeta bhairavaḥ/
K10divav33u:2492: u1.38cd/.vātāturas tadā rāṣṭre vyādhir bhavati dāruṇaḥ//
K10divav33u:2493: u1.39ab/.pauṣa^māse yadā svātyāṃ śabdo bhavati bhairavaḥ/
K10divav33u:2495: u1.40ab/.māghe śukle tu nirghāto nityaṃ śāmyed vasundharāṃ/
K10divav33u:2499: u1.42ab/.pūrvabhādrapadāyāṃ tu caitre kampet kṣitir divā/
K10divav33u:2500: u1.42cd/.tasmin varṣe ca tadrāṣṭre parasainyān mahad^bhayaṃ//
K10divav33u:2501: u1.43ab/.pūrvāyāṃ ced āṣāḍhāyāṃ rātrau caitre ca niścalet/
K10divav33u:2502: u1.43cd/.asibhir hanyate rājā hanyate ca mahā^janaḥ//
K10divav33u:2503: u1.44ab/.vaiśākhe kampitā bhūmiḥ kṛṣṇa^pakṣe hy abhīkṣṇaśaḥ/
K10divav33u:2504: u1.44cd/.anāvṛṣṭyā tu durbhikṣaṃ māsān ṣaṭ tatra nirdiśet//
K10divav33u:2505: u1.45ab/.jyeṣṭhe māse bharaṇyāṃ tu divā kamped vasundharā/
K10divav33u:2507: u1.46ab/.jyeṣṭhe māse yadā mūle rātrau bhūmiḥ prakampate/
K10divav33u:2508: u1.46cd/.pratyanto vadhyate rājā rāṣṭre baliṃ samādiśet//
K10divav33u:2510: u1.47cd/.śasyaṃ vinaśyate tatra kalikarma ca jāyate//
K10divav33u:2513: u1.48cd/.jvaleyuḥ prapateyur vā naśyed rāṣṭraṃ tadā laghu//
K10divav33u:2514: u1.49ab/.caityā yatra prakampante hasanti ca namanti ca/
K10divav33u:2515: u1.49cd/.sarāṣṭraḥ kṣitipas tatra na cirān nāśam arcchati//
K10divav33u:2517: u1.50cd/.sadā parājito rājā caura^rāṣṭre ca vadhyate//
K10divav33u:2519: u1.51cd/.dvāraṃ vā nagarasya^atha bhūyiṣṭhaṃ naśyate prajā//
K10divav33u:2520: u1.52ab/.vāme vā kaṣīṇe candroḥ śṛṅge tiṣṭhed bṛhaspatiḥ/
K10divav33u:2525: u1.54cd/.jñeyaṃ roga^bhayaṃ ghoraṃ durbhikṣaṃ ca^atra nirdiśet//
K10divav33u:2526: u1.55ab/.rāhuṇā nigṛhītas tu ca^ullkayā hanyate śaśī/
K10divav33u:2528: u1.56ab/.yasya caiva^atha nakṣatre śaśī sūryo vigṛhyate/
K10divav33u:2529: u1.56cd/.rāhuṇā kṣitiyo rājyaiḥ saha pīḍām avāpnuyāt//
K10divav33u:2530: u1.57ab/.rājño vai ca^atha nakṣatre candraṃ ketur yadā viśet/
K10divav33u:2534: u1.59ab/.bṛhaspatiś ca śukraś ca lohita^aṅgaḥ śanaiścaraḥ/
K10divav33u:2538: u1.61ab/.maghāyāṃ lohita^aṅgo vā śravaṇe vā bṛhaspatiḥ/
K10divav33u:2540: u1.62ab/.tiṣṭhec chukro +atha rohiṇyāṃ jyeṣṭhe māse kathaṃcana/
K10divav33u:2543: u1.63cd/.somo vā raviṇā sārdhaṃ para^cakra^bhayaṃ tadā//
K10divav33u:2544: u1.64ab/.kākāḥ śyenāś ca bṛdhrāś ca vaseyuḥ sahitā mudā/
K10divav33u:2545: u1.64cd/.maithunaṃ vāritaṃ veyuḥ paraiḥ saha raṇas tadā//
K10divav33u:2548: u1.65cd/.para^cakreṇa yuddhaṃ tu bhavec ca^api punaḥ punaḥ/.
K10divav33u:2550: u1.66cd/.strīṇām eva bhavet tatra maraṇaṃ hy atidāruṇaṃ//
K10divav33u:2551: u1.67ab/.garbha^sthā dārakā yatra hasanti ca vadanti ca/
K10divav33u:2553: u1.68ab/.eka^pādāṃ stripādāṃś ca catur^aṅgāṃs tathā^eva ca/
K10divav33u:2554: u1.68cd/.nāryo yatra prasūyante rājño vyasanam ādiśet//
K10divav33u:2556: u1.69cd/.pramadā yatra deśe tu rājā tatra vinaśyati//
K10divav33u:2558: u1.70cd/.pramadā yatra sūyante rāṣṭraṃ tatra vinaśyati//
K10divav33u:2559: u1.71ab/.kharāś ca mahiṣāś ca^api paśavo +atha tathāvidhāḥ/
K10divav33u:2560: u1.71cd/.dvi^tri^śīrṣāḥ prasūyante deśe yatra sa naśyati//
K10divav33u:2562: u1.72cd/.jāyante yatra deśe tu sa deśo laghu naśyati//
K10divav33u:2563: u1.73ab/.pādāv ubhau yadā vaiśyā gurviṇī saṃprasūyate/
K10divav33u:2566: u1.74cd/.rājā vā rājāmātyo vā saha deśena naśyati//
K10divav33u:2568: u1.75cd/.trinetras trimukho vā^api vidyāt tatra mahad^bhayaṃ//
K10divav33u:2569: u1.76ab/.saukareṇa tu vakreṇa śarīraṃ mānuṣaṃ yadi/
K10divav33u:2570: u1.76cd/.sūtaṃ catur^diśaṃ rāṣṭraṃ hanyāt tatra na saṃśayaḥ//
K10divav33u:2571: u1.77ab/.ādityasya tu rūpeṇa mānuṣo yatra jāyate/
K10divav33u:2573: u1.78ab/.uttānaśāyī bālas tu deśaṃ yatra dvijottamaḥ/
K10divav33u:2574: u1.78cd/.dṛṣṭaḥ pravyāharan vedān kṣipraṃ deśo vinaśyatei//
K10divav33u:2575: u1.79ab/.kukṣiṃ bhitvā yadā bālo garbhān niṣkramate svayaṃ/
K10divav33u:2576: u1.79cd/.atrāṇāṃ mātaraṃ kṛtvā sa deśo naśyate laghu//
K10divav33u:2579: u1.80cd/.strīṇāṃ garbhāt prasūyante deśe tu bhayam ādiśet//
K10divav33u:2581: u1.81cd/.gāvo yatra prasūyante nirdiśed bhayam āgataṃ//
K10divav33u:2586: u1.83cd/.sajano jāyate yatra rāṣṭraṃ sādhipatiṃ dahet//
K10divav33u:2588: u1.84cd/.śuṣyeta sakalaṃ śasyaṃ janaś ca vilayaṃ vrajet/
K10divav33u:2590: u1.85cd/.svayaṃ kṣubhyeta tad^rāṣṭraṃ vinaśyeta na saṃśayaḥ//
K10divav33u:2591: u1.86ab/.phale phalaṃ yadā paśyet puṣpe vā puṣpam āśritaṃ/
K10divav33u:2592: u1.86cd/.garbhāḥ sraveyur nārīṇāṃ yuvarājaś ca vadhyate//
K10divav33u:2593: u1.87ab/.akāle pādapā yatra puṣpyanti ca phalanti ca/(p.143)
K10divav33u:2594: u1.87cd/.latā gulmo +atha vallī vā deśe tatra bhayaṃ bhavet//
K10divav33u:2596: u1.88cd/.kūjamānaṃ pataṅgaṃ vā tadā vidyān mahad^bhayaṃ//
K10divav33u:2597: u1.89ab/.vṛkṣāṇāṃ maṇḍapānāṃ vā chāyā na parivartate/
K10divav33u:2601: u1.91ab/.anāvartaṃ yadā puṣpaṃ phalaṃ ca^api pradṛśyate/
K10divav33u:2602: u1.91cd/.vināśaṃ tasya deśasya durbhikṣaṃ kalahaṃ vadet//
K10divav33u:2603: u1.92ab/.sthānāsthānaṃ gatā vṛkṣā dṛśyeyur yatra kutracit/
K10divav33u:2606: u1.93cd/.śastraṃ mūrcchayate tatra taskaraiś ca^api pūrvavat//
K10divav33u:2607: u1.94ab/.kampate rudate śāstā gacchan vā yatra dṛśyate/
K10divav33u:2609: u1.95ab/.devatā yatra deśe tu nṛtyanti ca hasanti ca/
K10divav33u:2610: u1.95cd/.aśrūṇi pātayeyur vā tadā vidyān mahad^bhayaṃ//
K10divav33u:2611: u1.96ab/.devatā yatra krīḍanti jvalanti nimiṣanti vā/
K10divav33u:2612: u1.96cd/.caleyur athavā yatra kṣiti^po +anyo bhavet tadā//
K10divav33u:2613: u1.97ab/.śivaliṅaṃ yadā kamped gagane vā^atha dṛśyate/
K10divav33u:2614: u1.97cd/.nimajjate dharaṇyāṃ vā dhruvaṃ rāja^vadho bhavet//
K10divav33u:2617: u1.99ab/.acalo vā calet sthānāc calaṃ vā^apy acalaṃ bhavet/
K10divav33u:2618: u1.99cd/.amātyo hanti rājānaṃ kalahaṃ ca^atra nirdiśet//
K10divav33u:2619: u1.100ab/.vamanti rudhiraṃ kanyā namante vā diśo daśa/(p.144)
K10divav33u:2621: u1.101ab/.varṣate kusumaṃ yatra rakta^vindum atha^api vā/
K10divav33u:2622: u1.101cd/.prāṇino vividhān vā^api vidyāc caura^bhayaṃ tadā//
K10divav33u:2624: u1.102cd/.nagarāṇy atha dhūmyante kṣipraṃ rājā vinaśyati//
K10divav33u:2625: u1.103ab/.indur vā dīpa^vṛkso vā dīpo yatra na dīpyate/
K10divav33u:2626: u1.103cd/.rājyakāmaḥ kumāro vā kṣubhyed viṭapako +api vā//
K10divav33u:2628: u1.104cd/.astraṃ vā^api gṛhaṃ dahyād rājño vyasanam ādiśet//
K10divav33u:2629: u1.105ab/.pated antaḥpure vidyud vṛkṣe vā^apy āśrame tathā/
K10divav33u:2630: u1.105cd/.puri caityacchāyāyāṃ vā rājārthe patitā hi sā//
K10divav33u:2632: u1.106cd/.vāyasaḥ kurute nīḍaṃ sa^amātyo dhvaṃsate nṛpaḥ//
K10divav33u:2640: u1.110cd/.śoṇitaṃ sakarakaṃ syāt tadā vidyāt parād bhayaṃ//
K10divav33u:2641: u1.111ab/.vidyuc ca patate ghorā karakāṇāṃ ca varṣaṇaṃ/
K10divav33u:2646: u1.113cd/.gaganaṃ dahyate tatra loka^pīḍā jvareṇa ca//
K10divav33u:2651: u1.116ab/.nāpsu majjati na^apy agnau pūrvavac ca na dṛśyate/
K10divav33u:2652: u1.116cd/.agnir utpatsyate tatra koṣṭha^āgāraṃ daheta saḥ//
K10divav33u:2655: u1.118ab/.jalaṃ jājvalyamānaṃ tu matsyo nirdahati svayaṃ/
K10divav33u:2656: u1.118cd/.anāvṛṣṭiṃ tadā brūyād durbhikṣaṃ ca mahad^bhayaṃ//
K10divav33u:2658: u1.119cd/.cakra^dvaye +api durbhikṣaṃ rāṣṭre rogaṃ ca nirdiśet//
K10divav33u:2659: u1.120ab/.triśīrṣaḥ pañca^śīrṣo vā yadā sarpo +atha dṛśyate/
K10divav33u:2661: u1.121ab/.kuśūlo yatra dṛśyeta kampayan tu vasundharāṃ/
K10divav33u:2663: u1.122ab/.sarpa; udyata^śīrṣas tu yudhyate puruṣaiḥ saha/
K10divav33u:2664: u1.122cd/.cakra^dvayād rogataś ca vidyāt tatra mahad^bhayaṃ//
K10divav33u:2668: u1.124cd/.tatas taṃ na cirāt paśyet saṃgrāmaṃ pratyupasthitaṃ//
K10divav33u:2669: u1.125ab/.kākaḥ śyenaś ca gṛdhro vā yasya nīyeta mūrdhani/(146)
K10divav33u:2671: u1.126ab/.prāsādāś ca prakampante śaraṇāni gṛhāṇi ca/
K10divav33u:2677: u1.129ab/.vṛkṣāḥ sarpāḥ prakampeyur mucyeyus tvaco vā tathā/
K10divav33u:2678: u1.129cd/.sarvasmin eva rāṣṭre tu vidyāc chatru^bhayaṃ mahat//
K10divav33u:2679: u1.130ab/.dine hy ulkā^prayuktir vā jvalantī yadi dṛśyate/
K10divav33u:2681: u1.131ab/.asiṃ prajvalitaṃ paśyet tomaraṃ cakram eva ca/
K10divav33u:2683: u1.132ab/.dīrgham ucchvasate vā +aśvaḥ aśrūṇi ca nipātayet/
K10divav33u:2684: u1.132cd/.pādena karṣate śīghraṃ yuddhe rāja^vadho dhruvaṃ//
K10divav33u:2685: u1.133ab/.kākaś ced gṛham āruhya hā putra; iti vāśati/
K10divav33u:2687: u1.134ab/.anagnau jāyate dhūmaḥ sthale padmāni vā yadā/
K10divav33u:2688: u1.134cd/.vināśaṃ tasya deśasya niyamāc chīghram ādiśet//
K10divav33u:2689: u1.135ab/.āravanti yadā ghoraṃ meghā vṛkamṛgās tathā/
K10divav33u:2690: u1.135cd/.vināśaṃ tasya deśasya vidyāc chīghram upasthitaṃ//
K10divav33u:2692: u1.136cd/.gṛhāḥ śūnyodakena^api śuṣkās tatra bhayaṃ bhavet//
K10divav33u:2696: u1.138cd/.anyad vā^api praharaṇaṃ parebhyo jāyate bhayaṃ//
K10divav33u:2699: u1.140ab/.narāṇāṃ pramadānāṃ ca rati^harṣo na jāyate/
K10divav33u:2700: u1.140cd/.sarvatra śoka^cintā vā mahat tatra bhayaṃ bhavet//
K10divav33u:2702: u1.141cd/.nadīṃ bhitvā nikuñjānvā sa deśo naśyate +acirāt//
K10divav33u:2703: u1.142ab/.yatrauṣadhyaś ca virasā jalaṃ ca parihīyate/
K10divav33u:2705: u1.143ab/.matsyāḥ kūrmāś ca sarpāś ca mriyante yatra jāṅgalāḥ/
K10divav33u:2707: u1.144ab/.apūrvāḥ pakṣiṇo yatra sthale vāriṇi; eva vā/
K10divav33u:2709: u1.145ab/.mahā^patho yadā kakṣaiḥ prasṛtair apatho bhavet/
