K10divav33u:2715: u1.148/.atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin puruṣa^pinyādhyāyaṃ vyākhāmi tac chrūyatāṃ/
K10divav33u:2722: catur^daśa gṛṣṭayo nakṣatrāṇāṃ padaṃ yatra saṃdṛśyate/
K10divav33u:2727: u2.1ab/.kṛttikāyāṃ hi jātasya mukhe vai catur^aṅgulaḥ/
K10divav33u:2729: u2.2ab/.bhogavān yaśasā yuktaḥ paṇḍito jvalati śriyā/
K10divav33u:2730: u2.2cd/.kṛttikāsv atha jātasya bhavaty etad dhi lakṣaṇaṃ//
K10divav33u:2733: u2.3cd/.rohiṇyāṃ jātakaḥ so +api vidvān dharma^rataḥ sadā//
K10divav33u:2736: u2.5ab/.grīvāyām ardha^gṛṣṭyā tu dāho yasya pradṛśyate/
K10divav33u:2737: u2.5cd/.mṛgaśīrṣe hy asau jātaḥ śūro bhoga^samarpitaḥ//
K10divav33u:2738: u2.6ab/.ardha^dvitīya^gṛṣṭyā tu pinyo vāme hi yasya tu/
K10divav33u:2739: u2.6cd/.ārdrāyāṃ krodhano jāto mūrkho gopatikaś ca saḥ//
K10divav33u:2740: u2.7ab/.vāme kakṣe vraṇo yasya kṛṣṇaś ca^eva punarvasau/
K10divav33u:2743: u2.8cd/.cakra^madhye ca haste ca sūryaś candro virājate//
K10divav33u:2746: u2.10ab/.hṛdaye yasya dāhaḥ syād śleṣāyāṃ kali^priyaḥ/
K10divav33u:2747: u2.10cd/.duḥśīlo duḥkhasaṃvāso maithunābhir ataś ca saḥ//
K10divav33u:2748: u2.11ab/.adha; urasi pṛṣṭhe vā yasya vraṇaḥ pradṛśyate/
K10divav33u:2749: u2.11cd/.maghāyāṃ dhanavān jāto mahā^ātma dhārmiko naraḥ//
K10divav33u:2756: u2.15ab/.vyaṃjane yasya pinyas tu dṛśyate niyamenahi/
K10divav33u:2757: u2.15cd/.citrā^jātaḥ sa ced rogī nṛtyagītaratas tathā//
K10divav33u:2760: u2.16cd/.jātaḥ svātyām asau lubdho guṇadviṣṭo hy apaṇḍitaḥ//
K10divav33u:2768: u2.20ab/.adho yasya^iha ca^ūrubhyāṃ pinyo jyeṣṭhe sa jāyate/
K10divav33u:2769: u2.20cd/.alpa^ayur apriyo duḥkhī duḥśīlaḥ kṛpaṇas tathā//
K10divav33u:2770: u2.21ab/.jānubhyām ūrdhvataḥ sūkṣmo vraṇo yasya^iha dṛśyate/(p.150)
K10divav33u:2771: u2.21cd/.mūlena bhāgyavān jātaḥ svagṛhaṃ nāśayel laghu//
K10divav33u:2776: u2.23cd/.yadi dṛśyet sa medhāvī bhogavān syāj jana^priyaḥ//
K10divav33u:2777: u2.24ab/.dvitīyaḥ pinyo dṛśyeta dhanavān bhogavān sadā/
K10divav33u:2779: u2.25ab/.dhaniṣṭhāyāṃ ca jaṅghāyāṃ kṛṣṇaḥ pinyaḥ pradṛśyate/
K10divav33u:2781: u2.26ab/.dvikugṛṣṭyā ca jaṅghāyāṃ kṛṣṇaḥ pinyaḥ pradṛśyate/
K10divav33u:2782: u2.26cd/.mūrkhaḥ śatabhiṣāyāṃ tu mriyate hy adakena saḥ//
K10divav33u:2783: u2.27ab/.adho jaṅghāṃ kugṛṣṭyā tu pūrvabhādrapade vraṇaḥ/
K10divav33u:2784: u2.27cd/.paropatāpako mūrkho daridraś caura; ity api//
K10divav33u:2785: u2.28ab/.kuguṣṭyā yasya pinyaḥ syāj jāto bhādrapada^uttare/
K10divav33u:2787: u2.29ab/.ubhayoḥ pādayoḥ sūkṣmaḥ pinyo yasya pradṛśyate/
K10divav33u:2788: u2.29cd/.revatyāṃ jāyate nīco nāpitaḥ sa havaty api//
K10divav33u:2790: u2.30cd/.arogo balavān nityam aśvinyāṃ jāta; eva saḥ//
K10divav33u:2791: u2.31ab/.atha pāṇitale pinyo bharaṇyām akṣayaḥ smṛtaḥ/
K10divav33u:2793: u2.32ab/.nakṣatrāṇāṃ padaṃ hy etad yena caryā prajāyate/
K10divav33u:2794: u2.32cd/.etad dhi loka^prajñānaṃ loko yatra samāśritaḥ//
K10divav33u:2796: u2.33/.atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin piṭakādhyāyaṃ nāma^adhyāyaṃ vyākhāsyāmi/
K10divav33u:2801: u3.1cd/.strīṇāṃ ca puruṣāṇāṃ ca piṭakaṃ sarva^karmakaṃ//
K10divav33u:2802: u3.2ab/.lābha^alābhaṃ sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ jīvitaṃ maraṇaṃ tathā/
K10divav33u:2803: u3.2cd/.prājñā yenābhijānanti taṃ ca sarvaṃ nibodhatāṃ//
K10divav33u:2804: u3.3ab/.tatrābhighātadagdhā vā tilās tad rūpakā; api/
K10divav33u:2809: u3.5cd/.yadā savarṇa^piṭako mūrdhni rājā mahān smṛtaḥ/
K10divav33u:2810: u3.6ab/.śīrṣe tu dhana^dhānyābhyāṃ kāntaye subhagāya ca/
K10divav33u:2814: u3.8ab/.aśrūpātaḥ dhruvaṃ śokaḥ śravaṇe goṣu nāśakaḥ/
K10divav33u:2819: u3.10cd/.cibuke hanudeśe ca dhanaṃ gāvaḥ satāṃ śriyaḥ//
K10divav33u:2820: u3.11ab/.gale tu dānam āpnoti pānam ābharaṇāni ca/
K10divav33u:2822: u3.12ab/.jāto +ayaṃ śiraso mūle hanuni ca dhana^kṣayaḥ/
K10divav33u:2826: u3.13cd/.pārśve tu sukha^śayyāyai stane tu sutajanyatā//
K10divav33u:2828: u3.14cd/.bāhvoḥ śatru^vināśāya yuktaṃ strī^lābha; eva ca//
K10divav33u:2829: u3.15ab/.dadāty ābharaṇaṃ jātaḥ prabāhvoḥ kurpare kṣudhā/
K10divav33u:2831: u3.16ab/.saubhagaṃ dhana^lābhaṃca jātaḥ pāṇau dadāti ca/
K10divav33u:2832: u3.16cd/.puṣpito hy ekadeśe tu daśaneṣu nakheṣu ca//
K10divav33u:2835: u3.18ab/.jaghane vyasanaṃ vidyān nārya dauḥśīlyam eva ca/
K10divav33u:2836: u3.18cd/.putrotpattis tu vṛṣaṇe liṅge bhāryā tu śobhanā//
K10divav33u:2839: u3.20ab/.jānau śatru^bhayaṃ vidyāt tathā^eva ca dhana^kṣayaṃ/
K10divav33u:2840: u3.20cd/.jānu^saṃdhau vijānīyān meḍhrake hy atha jātakaiḥ/
K10divav33u:2842: u3.21ab/.strī^lābhaṃ vakṣasi ca^eva bhaved anyo nirarthakaḥ/
K10divav33u:2843: u3.21cd/.jaṅghāyāṃ parasevā tu paradeśāt tu bhujyate//
K10divav33u:2844: u3.22ab/.maṇibandhe tu piṭako bandhanaṃ nirdiśed dhruvaṃ/(p.153)
K10divav33u:2845: u3.22cd/.parivādhaṃ sa labhate bandhanaṃ ca na saṃśayaḥ/
K10divav33u:2846: u3.22ef/.pārśve gulphe ca jānīyāc chastreṇa maraṇaṃ dhruvaṃ//
K10divav33u:2849: u3.24ab/.yasya pāda^tale jātas tathā hasta^tale +api ca/
K10divav33u:2850: u3.24cd/.dhanaṃ dhānyaṃ sutā gāvaḥ striyo yānāni ca^apnuyāt//
K10divav33u:2851: u3.25ab/.snigdhaṃ snigdheṣu vijñeyaṃ caleṣu ca calaṃ phalaṃ/
K10divav33u:2852: u3.25cd/.sthāna^sthe vipulaṃ dadyāt phalaṃ nṛṇāṃ śubhodayaṃ//
K10divav33u:2853: u3.26ab/.vivarṇo viparītaś ca phalaṃ sarvaṃ prayacchati/
K10divav33u:2854: u3.26cd/.puṃsāṃ madhye ye snigdhāś ca deśe dakṣiṇataś ca ye/
K10divav33u:2855: u3.26ef/.tathā ca^abhyantare ca^eva sthāne tu pratipūjitāḥ//
K10divav33u:2856: u3.27ab/.strīṇāṃ mṛduṣu deśeṣu vaktrān teṣu ca parvataḥ/
K10divav33u:2857: u3.27cd/.tattvaṃ vijñāya pinyānaṃ sthānaṃ varṇaṃ ca janma ca//
K10divav33u:2858: u3.28ab/.sthāna^asthānaṃ ca matimān vikāraṃ gatim eva ca/
K10divav33u:2859: u3.28cd/.ādiśet tu naraḥ paścād yatha^evaṃ samudāhṛtaṃ//
K10divav33u:2860: u3.29ab/.vāmabhāge tu nārīṇāṃ vijñeeyāḥ piṭakāḥ śubhāḥ/
K10divav33u:2861: u3.29cd/.dakṣiṇe tu manuṣyāṇāṃ bhavanti hy artha^sādhakāḥ//
K10divav33u:2862: u3.30ab/.viparītās tu piṭakā moghās tu bahavaḥ smṛtāḥ/
K10divav33u:2863: u3.30cd/.yathoktānaṃ ca sandhisthāḥ sarve viphaladāḥ smṛtāḥ//
K10divav33u:2864: u3.31ab/.siddhāḥ dhruvā vraṇā bhidyās tathā sadyaḥ^kṛtāś ca ye/
K10divav33u:2865: u3.31cd/.dharma^kīlasamāś ca^eva sarve te piṭakāḥ smṛtāḥ//
K10divav33u:2867: u3.32cd/.ity āha bhagavāṃs triśaṅkuḥ śiṣyebhyo nitya^darśanaṃ//
K10divav33u:2868: u3.33ab/.na nakhena na śastreṇa na^āyasena kathaṃcana/(p.154)
K10divav33u:2869: u3.33cd/.kāñcanena suvarṇena dahed viprāṃś ca bhojayed//
K10divav33u:2871: u3.35/.atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin svapna^adhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi/
K10divav33u:2876: u4.1ab/.śubha^aśubhaṃ ca svapnānāṃ yat phalaṃ samudāhṛtaṃ/
K10divav33u:2878: u4.1ef/.yas tu paśyati svapna^ante kuṭumbaṃ tasya vardhate//
K10divav33u:2879: u4.2ab/.yas tu paśyati svapna^ante rājānnaṃ kuñjaraṃ hayaṃ/
K10divav33u:2880: u4.2cd/.suvarṇaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ ca^eva kuṭumbaṃ tasya vardhate/
K10divav33u:2881: u4.3ab/.sārasāṃś ca śukān haṃsān krauñcān śvetāṃś ca pakṣiṇaḥ/
K10divav33u:2882: u4.3cd/.yas tu paśyati svapne vai kuṭumbaṃ tasya vardhate/
K10divav33u:2883: u4.4ab/.samṛddhāni ca śasyāni navāni surabhīṇi ca/
K10divav33u:2884: u4.4cd/.padminīṃ puṣpitāṃ ca^api purṇa^kumbhāṃs tathā^eva ca//
K10divav33u:2885: u4.5ab/.prasannam udakaṃ ca^eva puṣpāṇi vividhāni ca/
K10divav33u:2886: u4.5cd/.yas tu paśyati svapna^ante kuṭumbaṃ tasya vardhate//
K10divav33u:2887: u4.6ab/.pāṇau pāde +atha vā jānau śasterṇa dhanuṣā^api vā/
K10divav33u:2890: u4.7cd/.yas tu paśyati svapna^ante kuṭumbaṃ tasya vardhate//
K10divav33u:2893: u4.9ab/.patitaś ca^aruhed bhūyas tatrasthaś ca vibudhyate/(p.155)
K10divav33u:2895: u4.10ab/.goyutaṃ ca rathaṃ svapne hayaṃ vā yo +abhirohati/
K10divav33u:2901: u4.12ab/.āsane śayane yane śarīre +atha gṛhe kṣayaḥ/
K10divav33u:2902: u4.12cd/.yeṣām ārohaṇaṃ śastaṃ teṣām ārohaṇāt kṣayaḥ/
K10divav33u:2903: u4.12ef/.yeṣām ārohaṇād doṣās teṣām ārohaṇād guṇāḥ//
K10divav33u:2904: u4.13ab/.tri^sāhasraṃ bhavet kaṇṭhe daśa śīrṣasya chedane/
K10divav33u:2907: u4.14cd/.śuṣka^udapāna^ṃ tu labhate svapne dṛṣṭvā dhruvaṃ bhayaṃ//
K10divav33u:2909: u4.15cd/.ajāṃ vā paśyataḥ svapne vyādhi^kleśaṃ vinirdiśet//
K10divav33u:2910: u4.16ab/.kākaṃ śyenam ulūkaṃ vā gṛdhraṃ vā^apy atha vartakaṃ/
K10divav33u:2911: u4.16cd/.mayūraṃ paśyataḥ svapne tasya vyasanam ādiśet//
K10divav33u:2912: u4.17ab/.nagnaṃ paśyati hy ātmānaṃ pāṃśunā dhvastam eva vā/
K10divav33u:2914: u4.18ab/.kuṇḍthāḥ striyo +atha saṃlokya caurān dyūta^karāṃs tathā/
K10divav33u:2915: u4.18cd/.kuśīlāṃś cāraṇān dhūrtān svapne dṛṣṭvā dhruvaṃ bhayaṃ//
K10divav33u:2917: u4.19cd/.udvartanaṃ vā kurvāṇaḥ svapna^ante rogam arcchati//
K10divav33u:2918: u4.20ab/.dhvajaṃ chatraṃ vitānaṃ vā svapna^ante yasya dhāryate/
K10divav33u:2920: u4.21acd/.antrais tu yasya nagaraṃ samantāt parivāryate/(p.156)
K10divav33u:2922: u4.22ab/.manuṣyaṃ bhūmi^bhāgaṃ vā svapna^ante grasate yadi/
K10divav33u:2923: u4.22cd/.hradaś ca vā samudro +ayaṃ mahad^aiśvaryam āpnuyāt//
K10divav33u:2924: u4.23ab/.dhanuḥ praharaṇaṃ śastraṃ raktam ābharaṇaṃ dhvajaṃ/
K10divav33u:2925: u4.23cd/.kavacaṃ vā labhet svapne dhana^lābhaṃ vinirdiśet//
K10divav33u:2926: u4.24ab/.prapātaṃ parvataṃ tālaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ kuñjaraṃ hayaṃ/
K10divav33u:2928: u4.24ef/.svapne prapatitau dṛṣṭvā rājñāṃ vyasanam ādiśet//
K10divav33u:2930: u4.25cd/.tayor astaṃ gataṃ dṛṣṭvā rājño vyasanam ādiśet//
K10divav33u:2932: u4.26cd/.valmīkaṃ bhasma^rāśiṃ vā svapne vyasanam ādiśet//
K10divav33u:2933: u4.27ab/.kṛṣṇa^vastrā tu yā nārī kālī kāmayate naraṃ/
K10divav33u:2935: u4.28ab/.tamasi praviśet svapne śambhor vā ca^amaraṃ tathā/
K10divav33u:2936: u4.28cd/.vṛkṣād vā prapatet svapne maraṇaṃ tasya nirdiśet//
K10divav33u:2937: u4.29ab/.vṛkṣāṃ kāṣṭhaṃ tṛṇaṃ vā^api virucaṃ yas tu paśyati/
K10divav33u:2938: u4.29cd/.svapne śīrṣaṃ śarīraṃ vā maraṇaṃ tasya nirdiśet//
K10divav33u:2939: u4.30ab/.devo vā varṣate yatra yatra ca^eva^aśaniḥ patet/
K10divav33u:2940: u4.30cd/.bhūmir vā kampate yatra svapne vyasanam ādiśet//
K10divav33u:2941: u4.31ab/.candra^ādityau yadi svapne khaṇḍau bhinnau ca paśyati/
K10divav33u:2942: u4.31cd/.patitau patamānau vā cakṣus tasya vinaśyati//
K10divav33u:2947: u4.33cd/.labdhvā tu puruṣaḥ svapne dhana^nāśaṃ samarcchati//
K10divav33u:2948: u4.34ab/.gāyantī vā hasantī vā nṛtyantī vā vibudhyate/
K10divav33u:2954: u4.36cd/.krīḍed akuśalāṅkair vā svapne dṛṣṭvā dhruvaṃ kaliḥ//
K10divav33u:2955: u4.37ab/.āsane śayane yane vāstre sābharaṇe gṛhe/
K10divav33u:2962: u4.39cd/.utpadyate dhruvaṃ tasya skandha^nyāso na saṃśayaḥ//
K10divav33u:2963: u4.40ab/.abhīkṣṇaṃ varṣate devo jalaṃ pāṃśum atha^api vā/
K10divav33u:2964: u4.40cd/.aṅgāraṃ vā^api varṣeta maraṇaṃ tatra nirdiśet//
K10divav33u:2966: u4.41cd/.rajju jālena vā svapne para^cakrād vinirdiśet//
K10divav33u:2970: u4.43cd/.gāyate hasate ca^eva prahāraṃ tasya nirdiśet//
K10divav33u:2973: u4.44cd/.pariṣvajet naraṃ svapne bandhanaṃ tasya nirdiśet//
K10divav33u:2974: u4.45ab/.kṛṣṇa^sarpo yadi svapne hy abhirohati yaṃ naraṃ/
K10divav33u:2975: u4.45cd/.gātrāṇi veṣṭayed vā^api bandhanaṃ tasya nirdiśet//
K10divav33u:2976: u4.46ab/.latābhiḥ sthāṇu^vṛndair vā yantrai vā parivāryate/(p.158)
K10divav33u:2977: u4.46cd/.svapna^ante puruṣo yas tu bandhanaṃ tasya nirdiśet//
K10divav33u:2979: u4.47cd/.yasya chidyeran svapna^ante bandhanāt sa vimucyate//
K10divav33u:2980: u4.48ab/.viṣamāṇi ca nimnāni parvatān nagarāṇi ca/
K10divav33u:2981: u4.48cd/.yas tu paśyati svapna^ante kṣipraṃ kleśād vimucyate//
K10divav33u:2982: u4.49ab/.pūtanā vā piśācā vā duścalā malinā^atha vā/
K10divav33u:2983: u4.49cd/.evaṃrūpāṇi rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā svapne dhruvaṃ kaliḥ//
K10divav33u:2984: u4.50ab/.susnātaṃ ca suveśaṃ ca sugandhaṃ śukla^vāsasaṃ/
K10divav33u:2985: u4.50cd/.puruṣaṃ vā^atha nārīṃ vā dṛṣṭvā svapne mahat^sukhaṃ//
K10divav33u:2986: u4.51ab/.tṛṇaṃ vṛkṣama atho kāṣṭhaṃ virūḍhaṃ yatra dṛśyate/
K10divav33u:2987: u4.51cd/.gṛhe vā yadi vā kṣetre kṣipraṃ dravya^kṣayo bhavet//
K10divav33u:2989: u4.52cd/.naro vā labhate nārīṃ nārī vā labhate naraṃ//
K10divav33u:2991: u4.53cd/.svapna^ante yas tu paśyeta strī^lābhaṃ tasya nirdiśet//
K10divav33u:2992: u4.54ab/.yas tu hy annāni paśyeta bhūṣaṇaṃ nigaḍais tathā/
K10divav33u:2993: u4.54cd/.naras tu labhate bhāryāṃ nārī vā labhate patiṃ//
K10divav33u:2994: u4.55ab/.mekhalāṃ karṇikāṃ mālāṃ strīṇām ābharaṇāni ca/
K10divav33u:2995: u4.55cd/.labdhvā naro labhed bhāryāṃ nārī ca labhate patiṃ//
K10divav33u:2997: u4.56cd/.abhivadeta yā nārī patiṃ sā labhate +acirāt//
K10divav33u:2998: u4.57ab/.eṣām anyatamaḥ kuṣau praviśec ca yadi striyāḥ/
K10divav33u:3000: u4.58ab/.phalāni ca samagrāṇi vanāni haritāni ca//
K10divav33u:3003: u4.59cd/.labdhā nārī tu svapna^ante śrīmat^putraṃ prasūyate//
K10divav33u:3004: u4.60ab/.upāyana^sūtrayor antaḥ sajjaṃ tatra tu piṇḍakaṃ/
K10divav33u:3005: u4.60cd/.svapne yā labhate nārī sā^api putraṃ prasūyate/
K10divav33u:3006: u4.60ef/.yamaṃ tu bhājanaṃ ca^api yamaṃ tu sā prasūyate//
K10divav33u:3007: u4.61ab/.mlāyantīm atha grīṣmān te taruṇīm ātmikām api/
K10divav33u:3008: u4.61cd/.śuṣkāṃ dṛṣṭvā tathā svapne svapakṣa^maraṇaṃ bhavet//
K10divav33u:3009: u4.62ab/.bāhavo yasya vardhante cakṣur aṅgulayo +api vā/
K10divav33u:3010: u4.62cd/.jñātayo tasya vardhante śatruṇāṃ maraṇaṃ bhavet//
K10divav33u:3011: u4.63ab/.badhyante bāhavo yasya cakṣuś ca vyākulaṃ bhavet/
K10divav33u:3012: u4.63cd/.bāhur vā prapated yasya sva^pakṣa^maranaṃ bhavet//
K10divav33u:3013: u4.64ab/.devo vā yadi vā preto nāryā vastraṃ phalāni vā/
K10divav33u:3014: u4.64cd/.svapne prayacchate yasyāḥ putras tasyāḥ prajāyate//
K10divav33u:3015: u4.65ab/.apakṛṣṭo rudanyo vā nagno +atha malinaḥ kṛśaḥ/
K10divav33u:3018: u4.66ab/.carma yantraṃ gaṇitaṃ vā kīlaṃ vā^atha kilāṭakaṃ/
K10divav33u:3019: u4.66cd/.svapne labdhvā ca prāpnu[jānī]yād dhruvaṃ vastra^āgamo bhavet//
K10divav33u:3020: u4.67ab/.amānuṣo +atha rājā vā devaḥ preto +atha brāhmaṇaḥ/
K10divav33u:3021: u4.67cd/.svapne yathā te jalpa^nti sa tathā^artho bhaviṣyati//
K10divav33u:3023: u4.68cd/.yac ca^anusmarate dṛṣṭvā yac ca^api bahu paśyati//
K10divav33u:3025: u4.69cd/.viṣamaṃ vā tathā^adhvānaṃ chidraṃ vā pratipadyate//
K10divav33u:3026: u4.70ab/.agniṃ prajvalitaṃ taptaṃ śamitvā tu praśasyate/(p.160)
K10divav33u:3027: u4.70cd/.gṛhāṇāṃ karaṇaṃ śastaṃ bhedanaṃ na praśasyate//
K10divav33u:3028: u4.71ab/.nirmalaṃ gaganaṃ śastaṃ sameghaṃ na praśasyate//
K10divav33u:3029: u4.71cd/.prasannam udakaṃ śastaṃ kaluṣaṃ na praśasyate/
K10divav33u:3030: u4.72ab/.adhvānaṃ gamanaṃ śastaṃ na kvacit saṃnivartanaṃ/
K10divav33u:3032: u4.73ab/.māṃsasya darśanaṃ sādhu bhakṣaṇaṃ na praśasyate/
K10divav33u:3033: u4.73cd/.madyasya darśanaṃ śastaṃ pānaṃ tu na praśasyate//
K10divav33u:3034: u4.74ab/.pṛthivī haritā śastā vivarṇā na praśasyate/
K10divav33u:3036: u4.75ab/.svapneṣu ruditaṃ śastaṃ hasitaṃ na praśasyate/
K10divav33u:3038: u4.76ab/.mālyasya darśanaṃ śastaṃ dhāraṇaṃ na praśasyate/
K10divav33u:3039: u4.76cd/.gātraṃ vikartitaṃ sādhu prokṣitaṃ na praśasyate//
K10divav33u:3041: u4.77cd/.vyādhito malinaḥ śasto bhūṣito na praśasyate/
K10divav33u:3043: u4.78ab/.dhūmrā ghanā dundubhi^śaṅkha^śabdo vāto +abhra^vṛṣṭiś ca tathā samantāt/
K10divav33u:3044: u4.78cd/.sarva^sthirāṇāṃ ca calaś ca yaḥ syād ye ca^antare doṣa^kṛtā vikārāḥ//
K10divav33u:3045: u4.79ab/.pūrveṣu rūpeṣu yathāvad iṣṭā rāja^rṣayo deva^gaṇāś ca sarve/
K10divav33u:3048: u4.80ab/.yat pūrva^rūpeṣu bhavet praśastaṃ duḥsvapnam etāni śamaṃ nayanti/
K10divav33u:3049: u4.80cd/.gāvaḥ pradānaṃ dvija^pūjanaṃ ca duḥsvapnam etena parijitaṃ syāt//
K10divav33u:3050: u4.81ab/.devaṃ ca yaṃ bhaktigato manuṣyas taṃ tu parāṃś ca^arcayituṃ yateta/(p.161)
K10divav33u:3051: u4.81cd/.svapnaṃ tu dṛṣṭvā prathame pradoṣe saṃvatsara^ante +asya vipākam āhuḥ//
K10divav33u:3052: u4.82ab/.ṣaṇ^māsikaṃ yac ca bhaved dvitīye ṣaṭpākṣikaṃ yat tu bhavet tṛtīye/
K10divav33u:3053: u4.82cd/.adhyardha^māse taram eva yat syāt phalec caturthe rajanī^prabhāte//
K10divav33u:3055: u4.83cd/.pūjā gurūṇāṃ parimiṣṭam annaṃ duḥsvapnam etāni vināśayanti//
K10divav33u:3057: atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārinn aparam api svapna^adhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi/
K10divav33u:3063: u5.1cd/.nimittaṃ yādṛśaṃ yasya śṛṇu vakṣyāmi tatvataḥ//
K10divav33u:3064: u5.2ab/.jāgrato yadi vā trasto divā svapnāni paśyati/
K10divav33u:3065: u5.2cd/.na tu bhayaṃ bhavet tasya jānīyād eva buddhimān//
K10divav33u:3066: u5.3ab/.yasya tu yo bhavec chatrur yasya vidheyam icchati/
K10divav33u:3067: u5.3cd/.svapne tu kalahaṃ dṛṣṭvā kṣipraṃ prītir bhaviṣyati//
K10divav33u:3069: u5.4cd/.adhvānaṃ cira^kālena tathā hy eṣa nivartate//
K10divav33u:3070: u5.5ab/.madhyame bhavate naiva kṣipraṃ bhavati paścime/
K10divav33u:3072: u5.6ab/.dṛṣṭvā jalacarān matsyān evaṃ jānīta buddhimān/
K10divav33u:3073: u5.6cd/.yat kiñcid ārabhiṣyāmi kṣipram eva bhaviṣyati//
K10divav33u:3074: u5.7ab/.campāyāṃ dhṛṣaṇaṃ haste dhṛṣet svapna^antareṣu vā/
K10divav33u:3076: u5.8ab/.sarvāṇi khalu pānāni madhurāṇi sukhāni ca/
K10divav33u:3077: u5.8cd/.yas tu pibati svapna^ante sa ca lābhaiḥ prayujyate//
K10divav33u:3079: u5.9cd/.pratibuddhas tu jānīyāt śatrur eva pramūrcchati//
K10divav33u:3080: u5.10ab/.upari kākā gṛdhrāś ca dhāvanty upari yānti ca/
K10divav33u:3083: u5.11cd/.pratibuddho vijānīyād bhāryā me jāram icchati//
K10divav33u:3084: u5.12ab/.ekaś ca dharaṇau pādo dvitīyaḥ śirasi sthitaḥ/
K10divav33u:3086: u5.13ab/.samudraṃ yadi paśyed vā pātum icchati tajjalaṃ/
K10divav33u:3088: u5.14ab/.vṛkṣaṃ parvatam āruhya nāgaṃ ca turagaṃ tathā/
K10divav33u:3090: u5.15ab/.yas tu svapna^antare paśyet pitṝn yān iha ca^anyathā/
K10divav33u:3091: u5.15cd/.tathā mātā pitā ca^eva tasya jīvanti te ciraṃ//
K10divav33u:3094: u5.17ab/.ānanaṃ ca^udake dṛṣṭvā madhye +agnau ca vidhāvitaṃ/
K10divav33u:3098: u5.19ab/.caurāṇām api sāmagrīṃ svapna^ante yas tu paśyati/
K10divav33u:3100: u5.20ab/.kṛṣṇa^sarpa^gṛhītaṃ tu svapna^ante yas tu paśyati/
K10divav33u:3103: u5.21cd/.yas tu ca^ābharaṇaṃ paśyed bandhu^vargo bhaviṣyati//
K10divav33u:3107: u5.23ab/.yas tu svapna^antare paśyec ca^ātmānam agnitāpitaṃ/
K10divav33u:3114: u5.26ab/.yastu bānara^yuktena gacchate pur imāṃ diśaṃ/
K10divav33u:3115: u5.26cd/.pratibuddho vijānīyād rātrir eṣā hy apaścimā//
K10divav33u:3118: u5.28ab/.sumanāṃ vārṣikaṃ [kīṃ] ca^eva kumudāny utpalāni ca/
K10divav33u:3121: u5.29cd/.pratibuddho vijānīyād yakṣā me hy anukampakāḥ//
K10divav33u:3125: u5.31cd/.yas tu svapna^antare paśyet subhikṣaṃ tatra nirdiśet//
K10divav33u:3126: u5.32ab/.suvarṇaṃ ca tathā rūpyaṃ muktāhāraṃ tathāiva ca/
K10divav33u:3127: u5.32cd/.yas tu svapna^antare paśyan nidhiṃ tatra vinirdiśet//
K10divav33u:3128: u5.33ab/.bandhanaṃ bahu dṛṣṭvā tu chedanaṃ kuṭṭanaṃ tathā/
K10divav33u:3131: u5.35/.atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin māsa^parīkṣā^nāma^adhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi/
K10divav33u:3135: u6.1/.yadi phālgune māse nirghoṣa upari bhavet manuṣyāṇāṃ maraṇaṃ codayati/
K10divav33u:3138: yadi devo garjati prathamaṃ mahā^sasyāni bhavanti/
K10divav33u:3141: u6.2/.yadi caitre māse devo garjati tadā sarva^sasya^samutpattiṃ codayati/
K10divav33u:3142: yadi candra^graho bhavati mahān sannipāto bhavati/
K10divav33u:3144: yadi nīhāraṃ bhūmiṃ chādayati subhikṣaṃ codayati/
K10divav33u:3145: u6.3/.yadi vaiśākhe māse devo garjati subhikṣaṃ codayati/
K10divav33u:3146: yadi pūrve paścime śaṅkhe candra^graho bhavati kṣemaṃ codayati/
K10divav33u:3147: yadi ca^ulkā^pāto bhavati yasmiṃś ca janapade nipatati tatra deśe pradhāna^puruṣasya vināśo bhavati/
K10divav33u:3149: u6.4/.yadi jeyṣṭhe māse devo garjati rogaṃ codayati/
K10divav33u:3150: yadi sūrya^graho bhavati manuṣyāṇāṃ vināśaṃ codayati/
K10divav33u:3151: pūrve paścime vā śaṅkhe yadi candrasya sūryasya kiñcin nimittaṃ lakṣyate tadā kṣemaṃ codayati/
K10divav33u:3152: yadi madhya^rātrau candra^graho bhavati manuṣyāṇām anyonya^ghātaṃ codayati/
K10divav33u:3153: yadi ca^upari nirghoṣo bhavati adhyakṣa^puruṣasya pīḍāṃ codayati/
K10divav33u:3156: u6.5/.āṣāḍhe māse yadi sūrya^graho rucira^ābhāso bhavati subhikṣaṃ codayati/
K10divav33u:3160: u6.6/.śrāvaṇa^māse yadi sūrya^graho bhavati rājyaṃ parivartate/
K10divav33u:3161: yadi candra^graho bhavati prathame māse durbhikṣaṃ codayati/
K10divav33u:3163: yadi (p.165) tārakā yatra deśe patanti tatra yuddhaṃ codayati/
K10divav33u:3164: yadi ca^atiśayaṃ bhūmi^cālo bhavati rogaṃ codayati/
K10divav33u:3165: yadi nirghoṣo bhavati tatra gṛhe yo gṛha^svāmī bhavati tasya vināśaṃ codayati/
K10divav33u:3166: atra ca māse +abhinavaṃ prāvaraṇaṃ na prāvaritavyaṃ/
K10divav33u:3169: u6.7/.yady aśvayuje māse devo garjati manuṣyāṇāṃ vināśanaṃ codayati/
K10divav33u:3171: yadi pūrve yāme candrasya nimittaṃ dṛśyate subhikṣaṃ codayati/
K10divav33u:3174: tatra ca manuṣyā anyonyaṃ vadhayiṣyanti^iti codayati/
K10divav33u:3175: u6.8/.yadi kārttike māse devo varṣati mahad^ākulaṃ codayati/
K10divav33u:3177: yady eka^antarūpaṃ vāto vāti tatra ca manuṣyā jalena vibhramiṣyanti/
K10divav33u:3179: yadi pūrve yāme utpāto bhavati mahā^varṣaṃ bhavati/
K10divav33u:3182: u6.9/.yadi mārgaśīrṣe māsi devo garjati śasya^vināśo bhavati/
K10divav33u:3184: yadi ca^ākāśe nirghoṣo bhavati yat pūrva^bhāgīyā manuṣyās teṣām āmayaṃ codayati/
K10divav33u:3185: yadi bhūmi^cālo bhavati yas tatra janapade pradhāna^puruṣo sa vadhān mokṣyati/
K10divav33u:3186: u6.10/.yadi pauṣe māse devo garjati prathame yāme janapada^nāśo bhavati/
K10divav33u:3188: prathame yāme ca yadi candra^uparāgo bhavati lohita^varṇaś ca dṛśyate udaka^āgamaṃ codayati/
K10divav33u:3191: yadi tārakāḥ patantyo vidṛśyante tatra janapade ākulaṃ codayati/
K10divav33u:3192: yaty ākāśe nirghoṣo bhavati manuṣyāṇāṃ maraṇaṃ codayati/
K10divav33u:3193: yadi dvitīye nirghoṣo bhavati amnuṣyāś caurair hanyante/
K10divav33u:3194: yady atraiva māse tārakā utsṛṣṭā na candro dṛsyate sasyaṃ saṃcodayati/
K10divav33u:3195: yadi bhūmi^cālo bhavati mahāmanuṣyasya maraṇaṃ bhavati/
K10divav33u:3200: u6.12/.atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin khañjarīṭaka^jñānaṃ^nāma^adhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi/
K10divav33u:3209: u7.3ab/.tatra sarve pravarteyur yatra yeṣu bhaved bhavet/
K10divav33u:3212: u7.4cd/.kṛkare svalpa^celatvaṃ purīṣe tu dṛśaṃ śravaḥ//
K10divav33u:3213: u7.5ab/.bhasme vivādam aphalaṃ vālukāyāṃ tu saṃbhramaḥ/
K10divav33u:3217: u7.6cd/.pakṣayā carate vyādhiḥ patito mṛtyum ādiśet//
K10divav33u:3219: u7.7cd/.vṛkṣa^agre vidyate pānaṃ gṛheṣv atha ... lasaḥ//
K10divav33u:3223: u7.9ab/.gavāṃ pṛṣṭhe dhruvaṃ siddhir aśvapṛṣṭhe dhruvaṃ jayaḥ/
K10divav33u:3224: u7.9cd/.avikānām ajānāṃ ca pṛṣṭhe sarvatra śasyate//
K10divav33u:3225: u7.10ab/.uṣṭrapṛṣṭhe ghruvaṃ kleśaḥ śvānapṛṣṭhe ca vidravaḥ/(p.167)
K10divav33u:3226: u7.10cd/.pṛṣṭhe ca gardabhasya^iha maraṇaṃ na^atra saṃśayaḥ//
K10divav33u:3227: u7.11ab/.kīle tu maraṇaṃ vidyād yūpa^agre ca na saṃśayaḥ/
K10divav33u:3228: u7.11cd/.kumbha^sthāne śmaśāne vā mṛto vā yatra dṛśyate//
K10divav33u:3234: u7.13cd/.sameṣu samake kṣetre samān varṇān vinirdiśet/
K10divav33u:3238: u7.14ef/.tāṃ diśaṃ gamanaṃ vidyād yathā tasya tathā punaḥ//
K10divav33u:3239: u7.15ab/.kīṭā vā^atha pataṅgā vā bhayaṃ yad iha dṛśyate/
K10divav33u:3241: u7.16ab/.apāṃ samīpe gajamastake vā sūrya^udaye brāhmaṇa^sannidhau vā/
K10divav33u:3242: u7.16cd/.mukhya prakāśe +apy ahimastake vā yaḥ paśyate khañjanakaṃ sa dhanyaḥ//
K10divav33u:3243: u7.17ab/.mātaṅga^rājo matimāṃs triśaṅkuḥ provāca tattvaṃ kañjanaṃ ca śāstraṃ/
K10divav33u:3244: u7.17cd/.snigdhe sarukṣe viṣame same ca ādeśa yad doṣa^guṇair yathoktaiḥ/
K10divav33u:3245: u7.17ef/.tamādiśet tatra samīkṣya vidvān śubha^aśubhaṃ tatphalam ādiśec ca//
K10divav33u:3247: u7.19/.atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin śivā^rutaṃ nāma^adhyāyaṃvyākhyāsyāmi/
K10divav33u:3253: teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ tapasā vīryeṇa ca imaṃ śivā^rutaṃ nāma^adhyāyaṃ vyākhāmi/
K10divav33u:3256: yādṛśaṃ ca yathā vāśet teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ vāśān śṛṇotha me/
K10divav33u:3257: pūrvasyāṃ diśi yadi vāśet śivā pūrva^mukhaṃ sthitvā trīn vārān vāśed vṛddhiṃ nivedayati/
K10divav33u:3258: caturo vārān yadi vāśed atra maṅgalaṃ nivedayati/
K10divav33u:3266: u8.3/.dakṣiṇāyāṃ dakṣiṇa^mukhaṃ sthitvā trivārān vāśed `atṛ atṛ' kurute maraṇaṃ tatra nivedayati/
K10divav33u:3267: caturo vārān vāśati dakṣiṇa^mukhaṃ sthitvā dakṣiṇāyā eva diśāyāḥ priya^samāgamaṃ nivedayati/
K10divav33u:3276: u8.4/.paścimāyāṃ paścima^abhimukhaṃ sthitvā śivā trivārān vāśati maraṇaṃ nivedayati/
K10divav33u:3284: u8.5/.uttarasyāṃ diśi uttara^abhimukhaṃ sthitvā trivārān vāśati puruṣasya prasthitasya nirarthakaṃ gamanaṃ bhavati/
K10divav33u:3293: u8.6/.diśi vidiśi ca^eva giri^prāgbhāreṣu śikhareṣu nirdeśaṃ taṃ ca śṛṇotha me/
K10divav33u:3299: me sameti apramattena smṛtimatā pūjayitavyā śivā nityaṃ/
K10divav33u:3303: evaṃ ``sarve +arthās tasya sidhyanti triśaṅkor vacanaṃ yathā'' /
K10divav33u:3307: ūrdhva^mukho yadi vāśati varṣāṃ tatra nivedayati/
K10divav33u:3308: dvipathe yadi vāśati pūrva^mukhaṃ sthitvā artha^lābhaṃ nivedayati/
K10divav33u:3309: dakṣiṇa^abhimukho yadi vāśati yathā priya^samāgamanaṃ nivedayati/
K10divav33u:3310: dvipathe paścima^abhimukho yadi vāśati kalahaṃ vivādaṃ vigrahaṃ maraṇaṃ ca nivedayati/
K10divav33u:3311: kūpakaṇṭhake yadi vāśati arthaṃ tatra nivedayati/
K10divav33u:3314: atimṛdukaṃ yadi vāśati vyādhikaṃ tatra nivedayati/
K10divav33u:3315: gītahāreṇa yadi vāśati artham anarthaṃ ca nivedayati/
K10divav33u:3316: tribhir vārair arthaṃ caturbhir anarthaṃ pañcabhiḥ priya^samāgamaṃ ṣaḍbhir bhojanaṃ saptabhir bhayam aṣṭabhir vigrahaṃ vivādaṃ ca/
K10divav33u:3318: u8.9/.``atha bhūyaḥ pravakṣyāmi anupūrvaṃ śṛṇotha me'' /
K10divav33u:3319: nānā^āhāre yadi vāśati mārge saṃsthitasya^api sarvaṃ vakṣyāmi taṃ śṛṇotha me/
K10divav33u:3320: saṃprasthitasya puruṣasya śivā vāśati vā yā pūrva^mukhaṃ sthitvā kṣipra^gamanam artha^siddhiṃ nivedayati/
K10divav33u:3321: atha dakṣiṇa^mukhaṃ vāśati yā artha^siddhiṃ nivedayati/
K10divav33u:3325: atha saṃprasthitasya vāśati yā purataḥ sthitvā upakleśaṃ nivedayati/
K10divav33u:3326: atha dakṣiṇe vāśati yadi dakṣiṇa^mukhā eva diśaḥ (p.170)
K10divav33u:3328: paścimato yadi vāśati caurato +ahitam asya duḥkha^daurmanasyaṃ nivedayati/
K10divav33u:3329: atha mārge vrajato dakṣiṇato vāśati mahā^vyādhim anarthaṃ caurā muṣanti tan nivedayati/ glānasya
K10divav33u:3332: glānasya yadi vāśati uttara^mukhaṃ sthitvā ārogyadhana^lābhaṃ ca nivedayati/
K10divav33u:3333: atha mūrdhnā vāśati yā upakreśaṃ nivedayati/
K10divav33u:3334: atha paścimamukhaṃ sthitvā yā anyonyaṃ vyāharate yama^śāsanaṃ [nivedayati]/
K10divav33u:3338: u8.10/.śivā purataḥ puruṣasya mārga^prayātasya yadi vāśati,
K10divav33u:3341: mārgaṃ vrajato +asya śivā vāmena^āgatya gacchate dakṣiṇa^mukhaṃ kṣema^mārgaṃ vijānīyād artha^siddhiṃ ca nivedayati/
K10divav33u:3342: mārge vrajataḥ puruṣasya śivā vāmena^āgatya puratā vāśati yā tathā sabhayaṃ mārgaṃ vijñāpayati/
K10divav33u:3344: dakṣiṇāṃ diśaṃ vāmaṃ gatvā vāmataḥ parivarteta ``na tan mārgeṇa gantavyaṃ triśaṅku^vacanaṃ yathā'' /
K10divav33u:3345: purataḥ śivā gatvā agrataś ca niṣīdati sabhayaṃ mārgaṃ vijānīyāt/
K10divav33u:3347: śivā purata āgatya vāmena parivartate bhayam etīha+a tena^api bhayaṃ jānīyād vicakṣaṇaḥ/
K10divav33u:3348: senāyām āvāhitāyāṃ śivā vaśati paścimaṃ nivartanaṃ nivedayati/
K10divav33u:3351: senāyāṃ vraja^mānāyāṃ śivā āgacched agrataḥ senājayaṃ nivedayati/
K10divav33u:3353: sārthasya vrajamānasya śivā gacchaty agrataḥ kṣemamārgaṃ nivedayati/
K10divav33u:3355: puruṣasya pathi vrajato vāmato vāśati mārgaṃ nivedayati/
K10divav33u:3358: pūrveṇa^uttareṇa^api śivā vāśati kṣemaṃ tatra nivedayati/
K10divav33u:3359: dakṣiṇe paścime yadi vāśati yā bhayaṃ tatra nivedayati/
K10divav33u:3360: u8.12ab/.vāmato na praśaṃsanti tathā^eva vidiśāsu ca/
K10divav33u:3362: u8.13ab/.adharāṃ tu bhayaṃ vakṣye triśaṅku^vacanaṃ yathā//
K10divav33u:3368: yaḥ śivāyā divaso bhavati sa divaso jñātavyaḥ/
K10divav33u:3376: u8.16/.yat kiñcit kāryam ārabhiṣyati tatsarvaṃ nivedayati/
K10divav33u:3391: u9.2cd/.tatra jātaṃ sukhataraṃ dvitīyā jñānam antare//
K10divav33u:3392: u9.3ab/.tṛtīyā sā lekhā yatra pradeśinyā pravartate/
K10divav33u:3395: u9.4cd/.dviniḥsṛto viśuddha^ātmā jīved varṣaśataṃ hi saḥ//
K10divav33u:3396: u9.5ab/.triṃśat tribhāgena jāyīyād ardhe pañcāśad āyuṣaḥ/
K10divav33u:3402: u9.8ab/.dīrghāyuṣaṃ vijānīyād dīrghalekhā tu yā bhavet/
K10divav33u:3403: u9.8cd/.hrasvāyuṣaṃ vijānīyād dhrasvalekhā tu yā bhavet//
K10divav33u:3405: u9.9cd/.divā tu janma nirdiṣṭam aṅguṣṭha^yavake dhravaṃ//
K10divav33u:3406: u9.10ab/.avyakto yavako yatra tatra lagnaṃ vinirdiśet/
K10divav33u:3408: u9.11ab/.divasaṃ janma nirdiśed rātrau strī^saṃjñako bhavet/(p.173)
K10divav33u:3409: u9.11cd/.rātriḥ sandhyā samākhyātā bhāgair anyair na saṃśayaḥ/
K10divav33u:3413: u9.13ab/.yavamālā ca matsyaḥ syād aṅguṣṭha^yavako ratau/
K10divav33u:3415: u9.14ab/.yasya syād yavakaś ca^api ca^apo vā svastikas tathā/
K10divav33u:3416: u9.14cd/.taleṣu yeṣu dṛśyante dhanyās te puruṣā hy amī//
K10divav33u:3417: u9.15ab/.matsyo dhānyaṃ bhaved bhogāyāmiṣādau yave dhanaṃ/
K10divav33u:3419: u9.16ab/.patākābhir dhvajair vā^api śaktibhis tomarais tathā/
K10divav33u:3422: u9.17ab/.prekṣyante śākhyā pañca haste catvāra eva ca/
K10divav33u:3423: u9.17cd/.kṣatriyo vā bhaved bhogī rājabhiś ca^api satkṛtaḥ//
K10divav33u:3424: u9.18ab/.vaiśyo +atha kṣatriyo vāgmī dhana^dhānyaṃ na saṃśayaḥ/
K10divav33u:3426: u9.19ab/.satatam abhipūjyaḥ syāt sarveṣāṃ ca priyaṃvadaḥ/
K10divav33u:3427: u9.19cd/.viśīlaḥ śīlakuñco vā bahubhir na bahus tathā//
K10divav33u:3428: u9.20ab/.śyāmavarṇā +atha bhinnā vā sā lekhā duḥkhabhāginī/
K10divav33u:3429: u9.20cd/.ktilekhā yasya dṛśyante yasya pūrṇāḥ karathitāḥ/
K10divav33u:3430: u9.20ef/.mahā^bhogo mahā^vidvān jīved varṣaśataṃ ca saḥ//
K10divav33u:3432: u9.21cd/.taleṣu yasya dṛśyante taṃ vidyāt pṛthivīpatiṃ//
K10divav33u:3433: u9.22ab/.bhagas tu bhāgyāya dhvajaiḥ patākair hastyaśvamālāṅkuśataś ca rājā/
K10divav33u:3434: u9.22cd/.matsyo nu pānāya yavo dhanāya vedis tu yajñāya gavāṃ ca goṣṭhaḥ//
K10divav33u:3435: u9.23ab/.anāmikāparva atikramed yadi kaniṣṭhikā varṣaśataṃ sa jīvati/
K10divav33u:3436: u9.23cd/.sametvaśītir varṣāṇi saptabhir yathā nadīnāṃ bharitāya nirdiśed//
K10divav33u:3437: u9.24ab/.śarīravarṇa^prabhavāṃ tu lekhāṃ savaiśikhāṃ varṇa^vihīnakāṃ ca/
K10divav33u:3439: u9.25ab/.abhyañjanodvartana satkarī[ṣaira]dhyakṣa cūrṇaiś ca vimṛjya pāṇiṃ/
K10divav33u:3440: u9.25cd/.prakṣālya caika^antaraghṛṣṭa^lekhām ekāgracittas tu karaṃ parīkṣet//
K10divav33u:3441: u9.26ab/.valayasamanarādhipaṃ bhajantyaḥ samanugatā maṇibandhane tu tisraḥ/
K10divav33u:3442: u9.26cd/.dvir api ca [sa] bhava^antare mahā^ātmā vippuladhana^śriya āha vastra^lābhaḥ//
K10divav33u:3443: u9.27ab/.dadati satatam unnatas tu pāṇir bhavati cirāya tu dīrghapīnapāṇiḥ/
K10divav33u:3445: u9.28ab/.sudṛśa[kara^talaiś ca]sādhavaste kuṭilakṛtair vinimīlitaiś ca dhūrtāḥ/
K10divav33u:3446: u9.28cd/.bhavati rudhirasannibhaḥ suraktaś ciram iha piṇḍitapāṇirīśvaraḥ syāt//
K10divav33u:3448: u9.29cd/.bhavati bahu^dhano nigūḍhapāṇiś ciram iha jīvati pāna^bhoga^bhogī//
K10divav33u:3449: u9.30ab/.subhaga iha tathoṣṇadīrghapāṇir dhruvam iha śītalapāṇikas tu śaṇṭhaḥ/
K10divav33u:3450: u9.30cd/.iha hi bahu^dhano balena yuktaḥ sutanu susañcitapāṇirekhako yaḥ//
K10divav33u:3451: u9.31ab/.dhanam upanayatīha pāṇilekhā kṛta^janitā jalavac ca yā sudīrghā/(p.175)
K10divav33u:3452: u9.31cd/.jalavadanugatā suvarṇa^varṇā dhanam adhigacchati nimnaśonnatā yā//
K10divav33u:3453: u9.32ab/.dhanam upalabhate surakta^pāṇir vipulamatho ca nirantarāṅguliḥ syāt/
K10divav33u:3454: u9.32cd/.bali^puruṣam api tyajeddhi vittaṃ ditavivaśā ca viśīrṇavarṇa^lekhā//
K10divav33u:3455: u9.33ab/.apagataghṛta^varṇa^pāṇilekho bhavati naro dhanavān balena yuktaḥ/
K10divav33u:3456: u9.33cd/.asubhṛti sadṛśā bhavet tathā bhūṣaṇa^vṛta[rūpavatī śubhā]eka^bhāryā//
K10divav33u:3457: u9.34ab/.bhavati bahu^dhano dhanair vihīnaḥ śrutam adhigamya viśālapāṇilekhaḥ/
K10divav33u:3460: u9.36/.atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin vāyasa^rutaṃ nāma^adhyāyaṃ vyākhāsyāmi tac chrūyatāṃ/
K10divav33u:3467: u10.1cd/.jayam parājayaṃ ca^eva lābha^alābhaṃ tathā^eva ca//
K10divav33u:3470: u10.3ab/.devāḥ pravadanti śreṣṭhā vāyasānāṃ namā namaḥ/
K10divav33u:3477: u10.6cd/.asūpaṃ nirdiśed bhojyaṃ guḍamiśraṃ tu gorasaṃ//
K10divav33u:3480: u10.8ab/.rūkṣaṃ nirgharṣate tuṇḍaṃ śiraś ca parimārjati/
K10divav33u:3481: u10.8cd/.saphalaṃ vṛkṣam āsthāya dhruvaṃ māṃsena bhojanaṃ//
K10divav33u:3483: u10.9cd/.vyādhena ca hataṃ māṃsaṃ nivedayati bhojanaṃ//
K10divav33u:3486: u10.11ab/.śuṣkavṛkṣe niṣīditvā kṣāmaṃ dīnaṃ ca vyāharet/
K10divav33u:3487: u10.11cd/.kalahaṃ sumahat kṛtvā na ca^arthaṃ tatra sidhyati//
K10divav33u:3488: u10.12ab/.kṣīravṛkṣe niṣīditvā kṣāmaṃ dīnaṃ ca vyāharet/
K10divav33u:3489: u10.12cd/.krameṇa yugamātreṇa na ccārthaṃ tatra sidhyati//
K10divav33u:3493: u10.14cd/.pṛṣṭhena darśayed bhāraṃ kṣudhāpīḍāṃ ca nirdiśet//
K10divav33u:3494: u10.15ab/.pakṣaṃ vidhūyamāno yaḥ paśyan pathasya vāśati/
K10divav33u:3495: u10.15cd/.na tatra gamanaṃ kuryāc cauraiḥ patham upadrutaṃ//
K10divav33u:3496: u10.16ab/.rajjuṃ vā phalakaṃ vā^api yadi karṣati vāyasaḥ/
K10divav33u:3497: u10.16cd/.na tatra gamanaṃ śreyaś cauraiḥ patham upadrutaṃ//
K10divav33u:3498: u10.17ab/.gomaye śuṣkakāṣṭhe vā yadi vāśati vāyasaḥ/
K10divav33u:3499: u10.17cd/.kalahaḥ kuvaco vyādhir na ca^arthaṃ tatra sidhyati//
K10divav33u:3500: u10.18ab/.tṛṇaṃ vā yadi vā kāṣṭhaṃ darśayec ca yadā khagaḥ/(p.177)
K10divav33u:3501: u10.18cd/.purataḥ śuṣkapāṇis tu tatra caura^bhayaṃ bhavet//
K10divav33u:3502: u10.19ab/.sārthopari niṣīditvā kṣāmaṃ dīnaṃ ca vyāharet/
K10divav33u:3504: u10.20ab/.yadā pradakṣiṇaṃ trastaṃ vāśanti vividhaṃ khagāḥ/
K10divav33u:3506: u10.21ab/.bhītas trastaḥ parītaś ca yas tu vyāharate khagaḥ/
K10divav33u:3507: u10.21cd/.paribādhan diśaḥ sarvās tatra bhayam upasthitaṃ//
K10divav33u:3508: u10.22ab/.gacchantaṃ samanugacchet puraḥ sthitvā tu vyāharet/
K10divav33u:3509: u10.22cd/.na tatra gamanaṃ kkuryān mārgam atra praśātanaṃ//
K10divav33u:3510: u10.23ab/.vāstumadhye pratisthāne kṣāmaṃ dīnaṃ ca vyāharet/
K10divav33u:3511: u10.23cd/.vyādhiṃ tatra vijānīyād vāse vā gṛha^svāmināṃ//
K10divav33u:3512: u10.24ab/.śakaṭasya yathā śabdaṃ viśrabdhaṃ vāśati vāyasaḥ/
K10divav33u:3515: u10.25cd/.niṣaṇṇo vāśate kākaḥ prasiddhaṃ gamanaṃ dhruvaṃ//
K10divav33u:3516: u10.26ab/.āsane śayane vā^api sthito vāśati vāyasaḥ/
K10divav33u:3520: u10.28ab/.brahma^sthāne niṣīditvā kṣāmaṃ dīnaṃ ca vāśati/
K10divav33u:3521: u10.28cd/.sandhisthāne harec cauras tatra vai nāsti saṃśayaḥ//
K10divav33u:3526: u10.31cd/.yasya yasya haret tasya dravya^lābhaṃ vinirdiśet//
K10divav33u:3528: u10.32cd/.kāṣṭhaṃ vā vāyasā yatra gṛham āropayanti ca/
K10divav33u:3529: u10.32ef/.nigadanty atra vijānīyād yācakāt tu mahā^bhayaṃ//
K10divav33u:3530: u10.33ab/.nīlaṃ pītaṃ lohitaṃ ca pratisaṃharaṇāni ca/
K10divav33u:3531: u10.33cd/.nigṛhṇanti yatra kākā vyādhiṃ tatra vinirdiśet//
K10divav33u:3532: u10.34ab/.grāmante bhayam ākhyāti kāko vā vāśati dhruvaṃ/
K10divav33u:3533: u10.34cd/.pratyekato vā vāśanti vidyāt tatra mahā^bhayaṃ//
K10divav33u:3535: u10.35cd/.niṣīdan saphale vṛkṣe sa vaden māṃsa^bhojanaṃ//
K10divav33u:3536: u10.36ab/.yasya śīrṣe niṣīditvā karṇaṃ karṣati vāyasaḥ/
K10divav33u:3546: u10.41ab/.prakāre toraṇa^agre vā yadi vāśati vāyasaḥ/
K10divav33u:3547: u10.41cd/.abhīkṣṇaṃ gharṣate tuṇḍaṃ saṃgrāmaṃ tatra nirdiśet//
K10divav33u:3548: u10.42ab/.maṇḍalāni vāvartāni bahir vā nagarasya ca/
K10divav33u:3549: u10.42cd/.vairaṃ ca vigrahaṃ ghoraṃ tatra ca^eva vinirdiśet//
K10divav33u:3550: u10.43ab/.grāme vā nagare vā^api kurvate yatra maṇḍalaṃ/(p.179)
K10divav33u:3552: u10.44ab/.pūrveṇa ca^eva grāmasya yadā sūyati vāyasī/
K10divav33u:3554: u10.45ab/.purastād dakṣiṇe pārśve yadi sūyati vāyasī/
K10divav33u:3555: u10.45cd/.varṣati prathame māse paścād devo na varṣati/
K10divav33u:3560: u10.47cd/.madhyamaṃ ca bhaved varṣaṃ madhya^śasyaṃ ca jāyate//
K10divav33u:3562: u10.48cd/.aśanir nipatet tatra bhayaṃ ca mṛgapakṣīṇāṃ//
K10divav33u:3567: u10.51ab/.yadā tu madhye vṛkṣasya nilayaṃ karoti vāyasī/
K10divav33u:3569: u10.52ab/.skandha^mūle tu vṛkṣasya yadā sūyati vāyasī/
K10divav33u:3570: u10.52cd/.anāvṛṣṭir bhaved ghorā durbhikṣaṃ tatra nirdiśet//
K10divav33u:3571: u10.53ab/.caturaḥ pañca vā potān yadā sūyati vāyasī/
K10divav33u:3572: u10.53cd/.subhikṣaṃ ca bhavet tatra phalānām uditaṃ bhavet//
K10divav33u:3574: u10.55/.atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin dvāra^lakṣaṇaṃ nāma^adhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi tac chrūyatāṃ/
K10divav33u:3578: u11.1ab/.māhendram atha divyaṃ ca māṅgalyaṃ pūrvataḥ smṛtaḥ/
K10divav33u:3579: u11.1cd/.dakṣiṇe tu diśo bhāge pūṣā ca pitryam eva ca//
K10divav33u:3582: u11.3cd/.atha vai dhanmitraṃ ca paramaṃ maitram eva ca//
K10divav33u:3585: u11.5ab/.samaṃ syāc caturasraṃ ca vistīrṇā ca^eva mṛttikā/
K10divav33u:3588: u11.6cd/.rakta^pāṃśur bhaved yatra rājñāṃ tat tu praśasyate//
K10divav33u:3589: u11.7ab/.trikoṇaṃ kuśasaṃstīrṇam uttānaṃ madhuraṃ ca yat/
K10divav33u:3590: u11.7cd/.vyāyām ato jalaṃ ca^eva vāstu tasya dhanauṣadhī//
K10divav33u:3592: u11.8cd/.anāvāsyaṃ ca tat proktaṃ yac ca putrakṣayāvahaṃ//
K10divav33u:3593: u11.9ab/.yat tu kañjalakakṣais tat tyaktaṃ varṣodakena ca/(p.181)
K10divav33u:3596: u11.10cd/.daśa dvādaśakaṃ vaiśye śūdrasya tatra lekhanaṃ//
K10divav33u:3601: u11.13ab/.uttarāyāṃ tu kartavyaṃ varcaḥ sthānām anuttaraṃ/
K10divav33u:3602: u11.13cd/.aiśānyām eva sarvāṇi prāsādaś ca puromukhaḥ//
K10divav33u:3607: u11.16ab/.vidviṣasya salokasya dvāre syān nu karagrahaḥ/
K10divav33u:3608: u11.16cd/.mahendre pure vā rājyaṃ sūrye sūraprabhāvatā//
K10divav33u:3611: u11.18ab/.puṣpe tu subhago nityaṃ vitathe +apy aśubho bhavet/
K10divav33u:3612: u11.18cd/.śoke bhūta^vikāraḥ syāt soṣe tasya viṣaṇṇatā//
K10divav33u:3614: u11.19cd/.hrade reṇu pariśrāva āditye tu kalir dhruvaṃ//
K10divav33u:3616: u11.20cd/.bhaved asya ca yad dvāraṃ tatra^agni^bhayam ādiśet//
K10divav33u:3617: u11.21ab/.kṣayaṃ vidyāt tasya tasya dhanasya ca kulasya ca/
K10divav33u:3618: u11.21cd/.yame mṛtyuṃ vijānīyāt kule śreṣṭha^uttamasya ca/
K10divav33u:3620: u11.22ab/.bhṛṅge krodhaḥ kaliś ca^eva pitari bhoga^sampadaḥ/
K10divav33u:3623: u11.23cd/.asurare maraṇaṃ ghoraṃ roge tu bahu^doṣatā//
K10divav33u:3624: u11.24ab/.balīṃś ca upahārāṃś ca pravakṣyāṃi yathāgṛhaṃ/
K10divav33u:3625: u11.24cd/.cicitrair vidiśair gandhaiḥ praipūjya baliṃ haret//
K10divav33u:3627: u11.25cd/.mahendre mukta^puṣpāṇi pāvake ca payo dadhi//
K10divav33u:3628: u11.26ab/.āditye parideyaṃ tu bhaktaṃ ca^eva priyaṅgavaḥ/
K10divav33u:3629: u11.26cd/.antarīkṣe jalaṃ divyaṃ puṣpāṇi jalajāni ca//
K10divav33u:3630: u11.27ab/.nandā pratipādā jñeyā ṣaṣṭhī trayodaśī jayā/
K10divav33u:3631: u11.27cd/.tāsu tāsu dhruvaṃ kuryāt prājño hy evaṃ vicakṣaṇaḥ//
K10divav33u:3633: u11.29/.atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin dvādaśa^rāśikaṃ nāma^adhyāyaṃ vyākhāsyāmi/
K10divav33u:3641: u12.2cd/.dvādaśaiva tu cittās te ye loke pracaranti vai//
K10divav33u:3642: u12.3ab/.tān ahaṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi śṛṇu tattvena me tataḥ/
K10divav33u:3643: u12.3cd/.dvādaśa^eva tu kuryāc ca maṇḍalāni vicakṣaṇaḥ/.
K10divav33u:3644: u12.4ab/.prathamaṃ meṣo nāma syād dvitīyaṃ tu vṛṣaḥ smṛtaḥ/
K10divav33u:3645: u12.4cd/.tṛtīyaṃ mithunaṃ nāma caturthaṃ ca^api karkaṭaḥ//
K10divav33u:3646: u12.5ab/.pañcamaṃ ca^api siṃhas tu ṣaṣṭhaṃ kanyā iti smṛtaṃ/
K10divav33u:3647: u12.5cd/.tulā tu saptamaṃ jñeyā vṛścikas tu tahtāṣṭamaṃ//
K10divav33u:3648: u12.6ab/.dnavī tu navamaṃ jñeyā daśamaṃ makaraḥ smṛtaḥ/
K10divav33u:3649: u12.6cd/.kumbhaś caikādaśaṃ jñeyo dvādaśaṃ mīna ucyate//
K10divav33u:3650: u12.7ab/.horā śarīraṃ jātasya dvitīye cintitaṃ dhanaṃ/
K10divav33u:3651: u12.7cd/.tṛtīye bhrātura ca^eva caturthe svajanas tathā//
K10divav33u:3652: u12.8ab/.cintyate pañcame putraḥ ṣaṣṭhe maṇḍale śatrutā/
K10divav33u:3653: u12.8cd/.saptame dārasaṃyogo hy aṣṭame naidhanaṃ smṛtaṃ//
K10divav33u:3654: u12.9ab/.navame cintyate dharmo daśame darmajaṃ phalaṃ/
K10divav33u:3656: u12.10ab/.ete dvādaśa^cittās tu yathā dṛṣṭā maharṣibhiḥ/
K10divav33u:3658: u12.11ab/.āgastya pṛcchate kaścit prathamaṃ maṇḍalaṃ spṛśet/(p.184)
K10divav33u:3659: u12.11cd/.śiras tu spṛśate yaś ca śabdaś ca upalakṣyate//
K10divav33u:3660: u12.12ab/.vyādhitaṃ ca^eva hy ātmānam āgneyāś ca vinaṣṭayaḥ/
K10divav33u:3661: u12.12cd/.yadi brūyāt tadā tasya ātmārthaṃ cintitaṃ bhavet//
K10divav33u:3662: u12.13ab/.kāñcanaṃ rajataṃ tāmraṃ lauhaṃ ca^eva bhṛśaṃ havet/
K10divav33u:3663: u12.13cd/.sa ca sarva^gataś ca^eva agnir aśnāti niścitaṃ//
K10divav33u:3665: u12.14cd/.yādṛśaś ca bhavec chabdas tādṛśaṃ tena cintitaṃ//
K10divav33u:3666: u12.15ab/.puruṣaḥ kaścid āgatya dvitīyaṃ maṇḍalaṃ spṛśet/
K10divav33u:3667: u12.15cd/.grīvāṃ vā parimārjayed galaṃ ca cibukaṃ punaḥ//
K10divav33u:3668: u12.16ab/.yadi śabdaś ca śrūyeta dṛṣṭā gāvas tathā^eva ca/
K10divav33u:3669: u12.16cd/.īdṛśaṃ ca dṛXṭvotpātaṃ gośabdaṃ tatra nirdiśet/
K10divav33u:3670: u12.16ef/.atha vā yādṛśaḥ śabdas tādṛśaṃ tena cintitam//
K10divav33u:3671: u12.17ab/.puruṣaḥ kaścid āgatya tṛtīyaṃ maṇḍalaṃ spṛśet/
K10divav33u:3672: u12.17cd/.mārjayen mukhadeśaṃ tu strī^cittaṃ tasya nirdiśet//
K10divav33u:3673: u12.18ab/.atha śabdo bhavet tatra śrūyantāṃ tādṛśās tu te/
K10divav33u:3674: u12.18cd/.jātaṃ prajātam upajātaṃ tathā jāto bhaviṣyati//
K10divav33u:3676: u12.19cd/.atha vā yādṛśaḥ śabdas tādṛśaṃ tena cintitaṃ//
K10divav33u:3677: u12.20ab/.puruṣaḥ kaścid āgatya caturthaṃ maṇḍalaṃ spṛśet/
K10divav33u:3678: u12.20cd/.kacchapaṃ spṛśate yas tu kalahaṃ tatra nirdiśet/
K10divav33u:3679: u12.20ef/.svajanaṃ vyavahāras tu sati kalahe na saṃśayaḥ//
K10divav33u:3680: u12.21ab/.ākaṭṭā kaṭṭeti śabdā bhavanti ca nirantaraṃ/(p.185)
K10divav33u:3682: u12.22ab/.puruṣaḥ kaścid āgatya pañcamaṃ maṇḍalaṃ spṛśet/
K10divav33u:3683: u12.22cd/.hṛdayaṃ spṛśate yas tu apatyaṃ tatra cintitaṃ//
K10divav33u:3685: u12.23cd/.śastra^dravyaṃ ca yat tasya brāhmaṇānaṃ kule sthitaṃ//
K10divav33u:3686: u12.24ab/.atha śabdo bhavet tatra yaṃ dṛṣṭvā tu maharṣibhiḥ/
K10divav33u:3687: u12.24cd/.putraputreti yacchabdo yad gataṃ gatam eva ca/
K10divav33u:3689: u12.25ab/.puruṣaḥ kaś cid āgatya ṣaṣṭhaṃ tu maṇḍalaṃ spṛśet/
K10divav33u:3690: u12.25cd/.spṛśate ca^api pārśvāni gātracintā tu cintitā//
K10divav33u:3691: u12.26ab/.vigrahas tu mahā^ghoraḥ śatruś ca^api pravadhyate/
K10divav33u:3692: u12.26cd/.atha vā tatra ye śabdāḥ śrotavyās te na saṃśayaḥ//
K10divav33u:3693: u12.27ab/.ayaṃ tu prakṣaraś ca^eva hataś ca vihatas tathā/
K10divav33u:3695: u12.27ef/.atha vā yādṛśaḥ śabdas tādṛśaṃ tena cintitaṃ//
K10divav33u:3696: u12.28ab/.puruṣaḥ kaścid āgatāy saptamaṃ maṇḍalaṃ spṛśet/
K10divav33u:3697: u12.28cd/.hastena mardayed hastaṃ tathā nāḍīṃ ca mardayed//
K10divav33u:3699: u12.29cd/.tatreme bhavanti śabdāḥ śrotavyā bhūmim icchatā//
K10divav33u:3700: u12.30ab/.sthitaṃ niviṣṭaṃ vartañ ca kṛtaṃ hasta^gataṃ tathā/
K10divav33u:3702: u12.30ef/.yādṛśo vā śrutaḥ śabdas tādṛśaṃ tena cintitaṃ//
K10divav33u:3703: u12.31ab/.puruṣaḥ kaścid āgatya aṣṭamaṃ maṇḍalaṃ spṛśet/(p.186)
K10divav33u:3704: u12.31cd/.udaraṃ ca^eva phicakaṃ dve ime parimārjayet//
K10divav33u:3705: u12.32ab/.nidhanaṃ dṛśyate tasya maraṇaṃ ca^api dṛśyate/
K10divav33u:3706: u12.32cd/.yadi bhaved bhaven mṛtyur yaś ca^anya^priya^saṅgamaḥ//
K10divav33u:3707: u12.33ab/.tatreme śabdāḥ śrotavyā mṛta eva bhaviṣyati/
K10divav33u:3709: u12.34ab/.puruṣaḥ kaś cid āgatya navamaṃ maṇḍalaṃ spṛśet/
K10divav33u:3710: u12.34cd/.ūruṃ ca spṛśate bhūyā dharma^cintā ca cintitā//
K10divav33u:3711: u12.35ab/.tatra śabdāś ca śrotavyā bhavanti hi na saṃśayaḥ//
K10divav33u:3712: u12.35cd/.yaja hi yājakaś ca^eva yajamānas tathāiva ca/
K10divav33u:3714: u12.36ab/.puruṣaḥ kaścid āgatya daśamaṃ maṇḍalaṃ spṛśet/
K10divav33u:3716: u12.37ab/.spṛśate jānunī ca^eva karma^cintāṃ tu nirdiśet/
K10divav33u:3717: u12.37cd/.tatra śabdā ahbvantīme śrotavyāś ca na saṃśayaḥ//
K10divav33u:3718: u12.38ab/.bhūmikarma ca kṣetraṃ ca kṣetrakarma tathāiva ca/
K10divav33u:3720: u12.39ab/.puruṣaḥ kaścid āgatya ekādaśaṃ tu saṃspṛśet/
K10divav33u:3721: u12.39cd/.jaṅghe tu spṛśate bhūyo hy artha^lābhaṃ vinirdiśet//
K10divav33u:3722: u12.40ab/.tatreme śabdāḥ śrotavyā bhavantīha na saṃśayaḥ/
K10divav33u:3724: u12.41ab/.etādṛśaṃ ravaṃ śrūtvā hiraṇyaṃ tasya nirdiśet/
K10divav33u:3725: u12.41cd/.atha vā yādṛśaḥ śabdas tādṛśaṃ phalam ādiśet//
K10divav33u:3726: u12.42ab/.puruṣaḥ kaścid āgatya dvādaśaṃ maṇḍalaṃ spṛśet/(p.187)
K10divav33u:3727: u12.42cd/.pādau ca spṛśate pṛcchan cittaṃ vā^apy anarthikaṃ//
K10divav33u:3728: u12.43ab/.yas tu tac cintito hy artha^āśā āgantukā ca yā/
K10divav33u:3730: u12.44ab/.nirāśaś ca^eva ghoṣaś ca nirāśaṃ tasya nirdiśet/
K10divav33u:3731: u12.44cd/.atha vā yādṛśaḥ śabdas tādṛśaṃ tena cintitaṃ//
K10divav33u:3733: u12.46/.atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin kanyā^lakṣaṇaṃ nāma^adhyāyaṃ vyākhāsyāmi/
K10divav33u:3738: u13.1ab/.tatvaṃ vijñāyate yena yena śubham upasthitaṃ/
K10divav33u:3739: u13.1cd/.ninditaṃ ca praśastaṃ ca strīṇāṃ vakṣyāmi lakṣaṇaṃ//
K10divav33u:3740: u13.2ab/.pitaraṃ mātaram ca^eva mātulaṃ bhrātaraṃ tathā/
K10divav33u:3743: u13.3cd/.tad vijñaiḥ saha saṅgamya kanyāṃ paśyeta śāstra^vit//
K10divav33u:3744: u13.4ab/.hastau pādau nirīkṣeta nakhāni hy aṅgulīs tathā/
K10divav33u:3745: u13.4cd/.pāṇilekhāś ca jañghae ca kaṭinābhyūrum eva ca//
K10divav33u:3746: u13.5ab/.oṣṭhau jihvāṃ ca dantāṃś ca kapolau nāsikāṃ tathā/
K10divav33u:3747: u13.5cd/.akṣibhravau lalāṭaṃ ca karṇau keśāṃs tathā^eva ca//
K10divav33u:3748: u13.6ab/.romarājīṃ savaraṃ varṇaṃ mantritaṃ gatim eva ca/(p.188)
K10divav33u:3750: u13.6ef/.tatra pūrvaṃ parīkṣeta svayam eva vicakṣaṇaḥ//
K10divav33u:3753: u13.8ab/.avyāvartāś catvāro yasyāḥ sarve ca^eva pradakṣiṇāḥ/
K10divav33u:3756: u13.9cd/.dhanyān sā janayet putrāṃs teṣāṃ prītiṃ ca bhuñjate//
K10divav33u:3757: u13.10ab/.yasyāḥ pāṇitale vyaktaḥ kacchapaḥ svastiko dhavajaḥ/
K10divav33u:3759: u13.10ef/.ekaṃ sā janayet putraṃ taṃ ca rājānam ādiśet//
K10divav33u:3766: u13.14ab/.sūkṣmā ca tuṅganāsā ca muktam āraktimodarī/
K10divav33u:3767: u13.14cd/.subhrūḥ suvarakeśāntā sā tu kanyā bahu^prajā//
K10divav33u:3770: u13.16ab/.yasyāvartau samau snighdau ubhau pārśvau susaṃsthitau/
K10divav33u:3774: u13.18ab/.ūrū jaṅghe ca pārśve ca tathā vikramaḥ saṃsthitaḥ/
K10divav33u:3775: u13.18cd/.rakta^ante vipule netre sā kanyā sukhamedhate//
K10divav33u:3777: u13.19cd/.yukta^nāmā tu yā nārī rājānam upatiṣṭhite//
K10divav33u:3782: u13.22ab/.kānta^jihvā tu yā nārī rakta^uṣṭhī priya^bhāṣiṇī/
K10divav33u:3785: u13.23cd/.sahasrāṇāṃ bahūnāṃ tu svāminī sā bhaviṣyati//
K10divav33u:3788: u13.25ab/.kīrtitās tu mayā dhanyā maṅgalya^lakṣaṇāḥ striyaḥ/
K10divav33u:3790: u13.26ab/.ūrdhva^prekṣī adhaḥprekṣī yā ca tiryak ca prekṣiṇī/
K10divav33u:3797: u13.29cd/.trīṃś ca sā puruṣān hanti devaraṃ śvaśuraṃ patiṃ//
K10divav33u:3798: u13.30ab/.pārśvato roma^rājī tu vinatā ca kaṭir bhavet/
K10divav33u:3799: u13.30cd/.dīrgham āyur avāpnoti dīrgha^kālaṃ ca duḥkhitā//
K10divav33u:3800: u13.31ab/.kāka^jaṅghā ca yā nārī rakta^akṣī vardhasvarā/
K10divav33u:3801: u13.31cd/.niḥsukhā ca nirāśā ca varjitā naṣṭa^bāndhavā//
K10divav33u:3804: u13.33ab/.yā tu sarva^samācārā mṛd^vaṅgī samatāṃ gatā/
K10divav33u:3805: u13.33cd/.sarvaiḥ samair guṇair yuktā vijñeyā kāma^cāriṇī//
K10divav33u:3806: u13.34ab/.yasyā roma^cite jaṅghe mukhaṃ ca parimaṇḍalaṃ/
K10divav33u:3807: u13.34cd/.putraṃ vā bhrātaraṃ vā^api jāram icchati tādṛśī//
K10divav33u:3809: u13.35cd/.uttaroṣṭhe ca romāṇi sā tu bhakṣayate patiṃ//
K10divav33u:3810: u13.36ab/.yasya hastau ca pādāu ca chidrau danta^antarāṇi ca/
K10divav33u:3811: u13.36cd/.patinā^upārjitaṃ dravyaṃ na tasyā ramate gṛhe//
K10divav33u:3814: u13.38ab/.yasyāḥ kaniṣṭhikā pāde bhūmiṃ na spṛśate +aṅguliḥ/
K10divav33u:3815: u13.38cd/.kaumāraṃ sā patiṃ syaktvā ātmanaḥ kurute priyaṃ//
K10divav33u:3817: u13.39cd/.na sā ramati kaumāraṃ bandhakītvena jīvati//
K10divav33u:3820: u13.41ab/.āvartaḥ pṛṣṭhato yasyā nābhī sā ca^anubandhati/(p.191)
K10divav33u:3821: u13.41cd/.na sā ramati kaumāraṃ dvitīyaṃ labhate patiṃ//
K10divav33u:3824: u13.43ab/.yasyās tu hasamānāyā gaṇḍe jāyati kūpakaṃ/
K10divav33u:3825: u13.43cd/.agnikārye +api sā gatvā kṣipraṃ doṣaṃ kariṣyati//
K10divav33u:3826: u13.44ab/.sama^asama^gatā subhrūr gaṇḍa^āvartā ca ya bhavet/
K10divav33u:3827: u13.44cd/.pralambhoṣṭhī tu yā nārī naikatra ramate ciraṃ//
K10divav33u:3829: u13.45cd/.aṣṭau bhakṣayate vīrān navame tiṣṭhate ciraṃ//
K10divav33u:3830: u13.46ab/.na devikā na nadikā na ca daivata^nāmikā/
K10divav33u:3832: u13.47ab/.nakṣatra^nāmā yā nārī yā ca gotra^sanāmikā/
K10divav33u:3833: u13.47cd/.suguptā rakṣitā vā^api manasā pāpām ācaret//
K10divav33u:3834: u13.48ab/.dārān vivarjayed etān yā mayā parikīrtitāḥ/
K10divav33u:3835: u13.48cd/.praśastā yās tu pūrvoktās tādṛśīyān naraḥ sadā//
K10divav33u:3839: u13.51/.atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin vastra^adhyāyaṃ vyākhāsyāmi/
K10divav33u:3846: u14.2ab/.punarvasuś ca dhanyā syāt puṣye vai vastravān bhavet/
K10divav33u:3847: u14.2cd/.aśleṣāsu bhaven moṣaḥ śmaśānaṃ maghayā vrajet//
K10divav33u:3848: u14.3ab/.phālgunīsu bhaved vidyā uttarāsu ca vastravān/
K10divav33u:3850: u14.4ab/.svātyāṃ ca śobhanaṃ vastraṃ viśākhā priya^darśanaṃ/
K10divav33u:3853: u14.5cd/.uttarā mṛṣṭa^bhojī syāc chravaṇe cakṣuṣo rujaṃ//
K10divav33u:3857: u14.7cd/.bharaṇī ca bhaya^ākīrṇā caura^gamyā ca sā bhavet//
K10divav33u:3859: u14.8/.atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin luṅgādhyāyaṃ pravakṣyāmi/
K10divav33u:3866: u15.1cd/.yair idaṃ dhriyate viśvaṃ kṛtsnaṃ sthāvara^jaṅgamaṃ//
K10divav33u:3867: u15.2ab/.vāpayet tu kathaṃ bījaṃ lāṅgalaṃ yojayet kathaṃ/
K10divav33u:3869: u15.3ab/.śāradaṃ vā^atha graiṣmaṃ tu kasmin māse tu vāpayet/
K10divav33u:3870: u15.3cd/.nimittaṃ kati śasyante kāni vā parivarjayet/
K10divav33u:3871: u15.3ef/.kasya vā dāpayed dhūpaṃ kena mantreṇa dāpayet//
K10divav33u:3873: u15.4cd/.tadā nāga^mukhī luṅgā dahati citra^mukhy api//
K10divav33u:3874: u15.5ab/.darbha^sūcī^mukhī vā^api kāraṇaṃ tatra ko bhavet/
K10divav33u:3875: u15.5cd/.kati saubhikṣikā luṅgaḥ kati daurbhikṣikāḥ smṛtāḥ/
K10divav33u:3876: u15.5ef/.kati varṇāḥ samākhyātāḥ kati varṇā nidarśitāḥ//
K10divav33u:3878: u15.6cd/.nirghāto vā bhavet tīvro +athavā^api medinī calet//
K10divav33u:3879: u15.7ab/.śasyaṃ phalasya kiṃ tatra nimittam upalakṣayet/
K10divav33u:3880: u15.7cd/.sarvam etat samāsena śrotum icchāmi tattvataḥ//
K10divav33u:3881: u15.8ab/.puṣkarasāriṇo brāhmaṇasya vacanaṃ śrūtvā triśaṅku^mātaṅga^adhipatir idaṃ vacanam abravīt/
K10divav33u:3883: u15.9cd/.sāgarād amṛtaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ manthite tu samudbhavaṃ//
K10divav33u:3884: u15.10ab/.amṛte bhakṣyamāṇe tu bhāgaṃ prārthitavān dvijaḥ/(p.194)
K10divav33u:3885: u15.10cd/.tato dattāḥ surair bhāgā amṛtād daśavindavaḥ//
K10divav33u:3886: u15.11ab/.tata utpannā ime bījā bhuvi loka^sukha^āvahāḥ/
K10divav33u:3888: u15.12ab/.śyāmakaṃ saptamaṃ vidyād ikṣuś ca^aṣṭamakaḥ smṛtaḥ/
K10divav33u:3889: u15.12cd/.śeṣās tu saṅgatā jātā bahavaḥ śasya^jātayaḥ//
K10divav33u:3892: u15.13ef/.mūleṣu ca^eva sarveṣu vindur ekaḥ prapātitaḥ//
K10divav33u:3895: u15.15ab/.kārttike mārgaśīrṣe vā grīāma dhānyāni vāpayet/
K10divav33u:3897: u15.16ab/.trayodaśyāṃ dvitīyāyāṃ tathā hi navamīṣu ca/
K10divav33u:3898: u15.16cd/.viśeṣatas tu nimneṣu sarva^bījāni hy utsṛjet//
K10divav33u:3904: u15.19ab/.grāma^kṣetre ca yad bījaṃ gṛhe ca gṛha^devatā/
K10divav33u:3906: u15.20ab/.brāhmaṇaṃ kṣatriyaṃ kanyām arciṣmantaṃ ca pāvakaṃ/(p.195)
K10divav33u:3907: u15.20cd/.vāraṇa^indraṃ vṛṣaṃ ca^eva hayaṃ vā svabhyalaṃkṛtaṃ//
K10divav33u:3908: u15.21ab/.pūrṇa^kumbhaṃ dhvajaṃ chatram āmāmāṃsaṃ surāṃ tathā/
K10divav33u:3909: u15.21cd/.uddhṛtāṃ dhāraṇīṃ ca^eva baddham eka^paśuṃ dadhi//
K10divav33u:3910: u15.22ab/.cakra^ārūḍhaṃ ca śakaṭaṃ kāka^ārūḍhāṃ ca sūkarīṃ/
K10divav33u:3912: u15.23ab/.sarve dakṣiṇato dhanyāḥ puraś ca mṛga^pakṣiṇaḥ/
K10divav33u:3914: u15.24ab/.ajo vā vāmataḥ śasyo jambukaś ca praśasyate/
K10divav33u:3915: u15.24cd/.vikṛtaṃ kubja^kuṣṭhiṃ ca mukhaṃ śmaśrudharaṃ tathā//
K10divav33u:3918: u15.25ef/.dṛṣṭvā nivartayed bījaṃ punar grāmaṃ praveśayet//
K10divav33u:3921: u15.26cd/.śrūtvā hy etāni vrajatāṃ sasya^sampattim ādiśet//
K10divav33u:3922: u15.27ab/.rāśisthaṃ grathitaṃ dhautaṃ svasthamaṃ kuritaṃ tathā/
K10divav33u:3923: u15.27cd/.śrūtvā saṃmārjitaṃ ca^eva ity āśukṛtinaṃ viduḥ//
K10divav33u:3924: u15.28ab/.śrūtvā mlānaṃ ca śuṣkaṃ ca manda^vṛṣṭiṃ ca nirdiśet/
K10divav33u:3925: u15.28cd/.śrūtvā nivartayed bījaṃ punar grāmaṃ praveśayet//
K10divav33u:3926: u15.29ab/.nīyamānaṃ ca yad bījaṃ varṣate yadi vāsavaḥ/
K10divav33u:3927: u15.29cd/.svayam eva tu tac chasyaṃ kāmaṃ kālena bhujyate//
K10divav33u:3928: u15.30ab/.nīyamānaṃ ca yad bījaṃ kampate yadi medinī/
K10divav33u:3929: u15.30cd/.bhramyate karṣakaḥ sthānān na tac chakyaṃ tu vāpituṃ//
K10divav33u:3933: u15.32cd/.dṛṣṭvā nivartayed bījaṃ punar grāmaṃ niveśayet//
K10divav33u:3935: u15.33cd/.kṛtvā suvipulāṃ vedīṃ darbhān āstīrya sarvataḥ/
K10divav33u:3937: u15.34cd/.veda^śāntiṃ japet pūrvaṃ śasyāśāntim ataḥ praṃ/
K10divav33u:3938: u15.35ab/.jayet pārāśaraṃ pūrvaṃ priyataṃ vācayed dvijaiḥ/
K10divav33u:3939: u15.35cd/.prathamaṃ prāṅmukhaṃ bījaṃ prakṣiped uttare +atha vā//
K10divav33u:3940: u15.36ab/.pipīlikā yadā kṣetre bījaṃ kurvanti saṅcayaṃ/
K10divav33u:3941: u15.36cd/.suvṛṣṭiṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca sarva^sasyeṣu sampadā/
K10divav33u:3942: u15.37ab/.haranti cet tṛṇād bījaṃ tṛṇe śasya^apahā api/
K10divav33u:3943: u15.37cd/.prasparaṃ ca hiṃsanti dhānyaṃ ca nidhanaṃ vrajet//
K10divav33u:3945: u15.38cd/.dṛṣṭvā tu sañcayaṃ nimne +anāvṛṣṭiṃ ca nirdiśet//
K10divav33u:3946: u15.39ab/.yadā tu proṣitaṃ bījaṃ sapta^rātreṇa jāyate/
K10divav33u:3947: u15.39cd/.suvṛṣṭiṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca sarva^śasyeṣu sampadā//
K10divav33u:3948: u15.40ab/.yadā tu proṣitaṃ bījam ardha^māsena jāyate/
K10divav33u:3949: u15.40cd/.alpaṃ niṣpadyate śasyaṃ durbhikṣaṃ ca^atra jāyate//
K10divav33u:3950: u15.41ab/.tri^rātrāc catūrātrād vā yadi luṅgaḥ prajāyate/
K10divav33u:3952: u15.42ab/.luṅgasya tu ye pādāḥ pañca sapta navā tathā/
K10divav33u:3953: u15.42cd/.suvṛṣṭiṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca sarva^sasyeṣu sampadā//
K10divav33u:3954: u15.43ab/.syāl luṅgasya tu ye pādāś catvāroṣṭapadā^atha vā/(p.197)
K10divav33u:3955: u15.43cd/.alpaṃ niṣpadyate śasyaṃ durbhikṣaṃ ca^atra nirdiśet//
K10divav33u:3956: u15.44ab/.luṅgasya yadi pādās tu dṛśyante dvādaśa kvacit/
K10divav33u:3957: u15.44cd/.kvacin niṣpadyate śasyaṃ drubhikṣaṃ kvacid ādiśet/
K10divav33u:3959: u15.45ab/.yadā pūrva^mūkhī luṅgā kṣemaṃ vṛṣṭiṃ ca nirdiśet/
K10divav33u:3960: u15.45cd/.yadā paścān mukhī luṅgā ativṛṣṭiṃ ca nirdeśet//
K10divav33u:3964: u15.47cd/.kvacin niṣpadyate śasyaṃ durbhikṣaṃ tatra nirdiśet//
K10divav33u:3965: u15.48ab/.yadā nāga^mukhī luṅgā dṛśyate yatra vā kavcit/
K10divav33u:3966: u15.48cd/.kvacin niśyadyate śasyaṃ durbhikṣaṃ ca^atra nirdiśet/
K10divav33u:3967: u15.48ef/.tatra^aśani^bhayaṃ ca^api bhayaṃ meghān na saṃśayaḥ//
K10divav33u:3970: u15.50ab/.nākṛṣer dharmam āpnoti nākṛṣeḥ sukham āpnuyāt/
K10divav33u:3971: u15.50cd/.dharmam arthaṃ tathā kāmaṃ sarvaṃ prāpnoti karṣakaḥ//
K10divav33u:3973: u15.52ab/.punar api puṣkarasārī brāhmaṇas triśaṅkuṃ mātaṅga^adhipatim etad avocat/
K10divav33u:3974: u15.53ab/.kathaṃ pṛthivyāṃ nāgāś ca kena vā vinivāritāḥ/(p.198)
K10divav33u:3976: u15.54ab/.kutaś ca^abhrāṇi jāyante nānā^varṇā diśo daśa/
K10divav33u:3977: u15.54cd/.kasya^eṣa mahataḥ śabdaḥ śrūyate dundubhis varaḥ//
K10divav33u:3978: u15.55ab/.ko hi sṛjati durbhikṣaṃ subhikṣaṃ ca^eva prāṇināṃ/
K10divav33u:3979: u15.55cd/.kas tatra sa muni^śreṣṭho nāma gotraṃ bravīhi me//
K10divav33u:3980: u15.56ab/.daivatāni ca me brūhi vidhānāni svayambhuvaḥ/
K10divav33u:3981: u15.56cd/.yajñaṃ ca yajña^bhāgaṃ ca hotavyaś ca yathā baliḥ//
K10divav33u:3982: u15.57ab/.pṛthivyāṃ daivataṃ brūhi āśrame daivataṃ brūhi/
K10divav33u:3983: u15.57cd/.deve tu daivataṃ brūhi kena devo sā kalpitā//
K10divav33u:3985: u15.58cd/.karake daivataṃ brūhi tathā sthālyāṃ ca daivataṃ//
K10divav33u:3987: u15.59cd/.vāyu^skandhaiś ca katibhiḥ śukro vegaṃ pramuñcati//
K10divav33u:3988: u15.60ab/.atha triśaṅkur mātaṅga^adhipatir brāhmaṇaṃ puṣkarasāriṇam etad avocat/
K10divav33u:3989: u15.61ab/.pṛthivī vā vāyur ākāśam apo jyotiś ca pañcamaṃ/
K10divav33u:3990: u15.61cd/.tatra saṃvartate piṇḍaṃ tato meghaḥ pravartate//
K10divav33u:3991: u15.62ab/.eṣa vyāpnoti ca^ākāśaṃ vāyunā janyate ghanaḥ/
K10divav33u:3994: u15.63cd/.vāyur nabho garjayate agnir vidyotate diśaḥ//
K10divav33u:3995: u15.64ab/.marutā kṣipyate piṇḍaṃ sannipātaś ca garjate/(p.199)
K10divav33u:3996: u15.64cd/.virodhanaṃ tu vāyoś ca agnaś ca anilasya ca//
K10divav33u:3997: u15.65ab/.ākāśe vartate piṇḍaṃ paścāt patati medinīṃ/
K10divav33u:4001: u15.66cd/.yatra satyaṃ ca dharmaś ca havirmeghaś ca vartate//
K10divav33u:4004: u15.67ef/.dantāśanī tṛtīyā tu aśanis tu caturthikā//
K10divav33u:4005: u15.68ab/.pañcamī krimayaḥ proktāḥ ṣaṣṭhī tu śalabhās tathā/
K10divav33u:4007: u15.69/.navamī sambaraḥ proktā ity āha bhagavāms triśaṅkuḥ/
K10divav33u:4008: u15.70ab/.etāstv aśanyo vyākhyātās tāsāṃ vai devatāḥ śṛṇu/
K10divav33u:4010: u15.71ab/.dantāśanī tu sainyānāṃ grahā vātāśanī smṛtā/
K10divav33u:4014: u15.73ab/.[samba]rasya tu parjanyam ākhyātāḥ nava devatāḥ/
K10divav33u:4017: u15.74cd/.varuṇaṃ paścime vidyād uttare dhanadaḥ smṛtaḥ/(p.200)
K10divav33u:4018: u15.74ef/..... tyā daivataṃ viZṇur āśramaṃ viśva^daivataṃ//
K10divav33u:4025: u15.77ef/.vāyu^skandhaiś caturbhis tu śukro vegaṃ pramuñcati//
K10divav33u:4029: punar api puṣkarasārī brāhmaṇas triśaṅkum evam āha/
K10divav33u:4030: u15.80ab/.kim artham āśrame nityaṃ hūyate havya^vāhanaḥ/
K10divav33u:4034: u15.81ef/.praśamec ca samāsena tad bhava^arthaṃ tu ..... //
K10divav33u:4035: u15.82/.evam ukte triśaṅkur mātaṅga^adhipatir brāhmaṇaṃ puṣkarasāriṇam etad avocat/
K10divav33u:4040: u16.2cd/.tatra dagdhā anekā hi nāgāḥ koṭī^sahasraśaḥ//
K10divav33u:4044: u16.4cd/.tadā^prabhṛti bhūtānāṃ dṛṣṭaṃ vai trāsitaṃ manaḥ//
K10divav33u:4045: u16.5ab/.agninā tāpitāḥ kecid vāṇair anye ca sūditāḥ/
K10divav33u:4049: u16.7ab/.sahāmpatis tu nāmnā sa śasya^kāle tadāśrame/
K10divav33u:4052: u16.8cd/.dig^bhāgeṣu ca bhūtānāṃ teṣām arthaṃ dine dine//
K10divav33u:4055: u16.10ab/.sadhūmlaṃ jvalitaṃ dṛṣṭvā dīpyamānaṃ tu pāvakaṃ/
K10divav33u:4060: u16.13/.atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin tithi^karma^nirdeśaṃ nāma^adhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi/
K10divav33u:4074: u17.6ab/.bhadrā ca saptamī khyātā śreṣṭhā sā saukṛte +adhvani/
K10divav33u:4075: u17.6cd/.nṛpāṇāṃ śāsane chatre śayyānāṃ karaṇeṣu ca//
K10divav33u:4078: u17.8ab/.agrasenā tu navamī tasyāṃ kuryād ripu^kṣayaṃ/
K10divav33u:4083: u17.10cd/.kārayen nagaraṃ guptaṃ vivāhaṃ śāstra^karma ca//
K10divav33u:4084: u17.11ab/.yaśeti dvādaśīmm āhur vaire +adhvani ca garhitā/
K10divav33u:4085: u17.11cd/.vivāhe ca girau kṣetre gṛha^kramasu pūjitā//
K10divav33u:4086: u17.12ab/.jayā trayodaśī sādhvī maṇḍaleṣu ca yoṣitāṃ/(p.203)
K10divav33u:4088: u17.13ab/.ugrā caturdaśī tu syāt kārayed abhicārakaṃ/
K10divav33u:4089: u17.13cd/.vadha^bandha^prayogāṃś ca pūrvaṃ ca prahared api//
K10divav33u:4092: u17.15ab/.nanda^ādīnāṃ kriyā pūrve ṣaṣṭhy^ādīnāṃ tu madhyame/
K10divav33u:4095: u17.17/.api ca mahā^brāhmaṇa idaṃ pūrva^nivāsa^anusmṛti^jñāna^sākṣāt kriyāyāṃ vidyāyāṃ cittam abhinirṇayāmi nivartayāmi/
K10divav33u:4097: u17.18/.syāt te brāhmaṇa kākṣā vā vimatir vā anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena brahmā devānāṃ pravaro +abhūt/
K10divav33u:4099: aham eva sa tena kālena tena samayena brahmā devānāṃ pravaro +abhūvaṃ/
K10divav33u:4100: so +ahaṃ tataś cyutaḥ samāna indraḥ kauśiko +abhūvaṃ/
K10divav33u:4102: tataś cyutaḥ samānaḥ śvetaketur nāma maharṣir abhūvaṃ/
K10divav33u:4104: mayā te tadā brāhmaṇa catvāro vedā vibhaktāḥ/
K10divav33u:4105: u17.19/.(p.204)tad yathā puṣyo bahavṛcānāṃ paṃktiś chandogānāṃ/
K10divav33u:4108: syāt tava brāhmaṇa kāṅkṣā vā vimatir vā anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena vasur nāma maharṣir abhūt/
K10divav33u:4110: aham eva sa tena kālena tena samayena vasur nāma maharṣir abhūvaṃ/
K10divav33u:4111: mayā sā takṣakavadhūkāyāḥ kapilā nāma māṇivikā
K10divav33u:4113: so +ahaṃ tatra saṃrakta^citta ṛddhyā bhraṣṭo dhyānebhyo vañcitaḥ parihīnaḥ/
K10divav33u:4114: so +aham ātmānaṃ jugupsamānas tasyāṃ velāyām imāṃ gāthāṃ babhāṣe/
K10divav33u:4118: u17.20/.so +ahaṃ brāhmaṇa tvāṃ bravīmi sāmānya^saṃjñā mātrakam idaṃ lokasya brāhmaṇa iti vā kṣatriya iti vā vaiśya iti vā śūdra iti vā/
K10divav33u:4119: ekam eva^idaṃ sarvaṃ sarvam idam ekaṃ/
K10divav33u:4120: putrāya me śārdūlakarṇāya prakṛtiṃ duhitaram anuprayaccha bhāryā^arthāya/
K10divav33u:4122: idaṃ ca vacanaṃ punaḥ śrūtvā triśaṅkor mātaṅga^rājasya
K10divav33u:4124: u17.21ab/.bhagavān śrotriyaḥ śreṣṭhas tvatto bhūyān na vidyate/
K10divav33u:4128: u17.22cd/.śārdūlakarṇaḥ prakṛtis tu bhadrā ubhau rametāṃ rucitaṃ mama^idaṃ/
K10divav33u:4129: u17.23/.tatra tāni pañca^mātrāṇi māṇavaka^śatāni uccaiḥ śabdāni procur mahā^śabdāni/
K10divav33u:4130: mā tvaṃ bho upādhyāya vidyamāneṣu brāhmaṇeṣu cāṇḍālena sārdhaṃ sambandhaṃ rocaya/
K10divav33u:4131: na^arhasi bho upādhyāya vidyamāneṣu brāhmaṇeṣu cāṇḍālena sārdhaṃ sambandhaṃ kartum/
K10divav33u:4132: u17.24/.atha brāhmaṇaḥ puṣkarasārī teṣāṃ nidānaṃ nidāya śabdaṃ saṃsthāpya nipatya ślokena^etān arthān abhāṣata/
K10divav33u:4133: u17.25ab/.evam etad yathā hy eṣa triśaṅkur bhāṣate giraṃ/
K10divav33u:4134: u17.25cd/.tatvaṃ hy avitathaṃ bhūtaṃ satyam nityaṃ tathā dhruvaṃ//
K10divav33u:4135: u17.26/.atha brāhmaṇaḥ puṣkarasārī teṣāṃ māṇavakānāṃ taṃ mahāntaṃ śabdaṃ saṃsthāpya (p.206)
K10divav33u:4137: ayaṃ bhos triśaṅko brahmaṇā sahāpatinā cāturmahā^bhautiko mahā^puruṣaḥ prajñaptaḥ/ yasya/
K10divav33u:4138: u17.27ab/.śiraḥ satāraṃ gaganam ākāśam udaraṃ tathā/
K10divav33u:4139: u17.27cd/.parvatāś ca^apy ubhāv ūrū pādau ca dharaṇī^talaṃ//
K10divav33u:4141: u17.28cd/.sāgarāś ca^apy amedhyaṃ vai nadyo sūtra^sravo +asya tu//
K10divav33u:4142: u17.29ab/.aśrūṇi varṣaṇaṃ cārasya eṣa brahmā sahāpatiḥ/
K10divav33u:4143: u17.29cd/.bhavāṃs tu parama^jño +asi tan me brūhi yathā tathā//
K10divav33u:4144: u17.30/.iha bhos triśaṅko kim āha svalakṣaṇaṃ brahmaṇaḥ pratyavekṣasva/
K10divav33u:4145: pitrā ca mātrā ca kṛtāni karmāṇi bhavanti/
K10divav33u:4147: u17.31ab/.gacchanti sattvā bahu^garbha^yoniṃ na ca^eva kaścin manujo hy ayoniḥ/
K10divav33u:4148: u17.31cd/.samasta jātau pracaranti sattvā na mārutāj jāyate kaścid eva//
K10divav33u:4149: u17.32ab/.svabhāva^bhāvyaṃ hy avagaccha loke ke brāhmaṇa^kṣatriya^vaiśya^śūdrāḥ/
K10divav33u:4150: u17.32cd/.sarvatra kāṇāḥ kuṇinaś ca khañjāḥ kuṣṭhī kilāsī hy apasmāriṇo 'pi//
K10divav33u:4151: u17.33ab/.kṛṣṇāś ca gaurāś ca tathā^eva śyāmāḥ sattvāḥ prajā hy anyatame viśiṣṭāḥ/(p.207)
K10divav33u:4152: u17.33cd/.saha^asthi^carmāḥ sanakhāḥ samāṃsā duḥkhī sukhī mūtra^purīṣa^yuktāḥ/
K10divav33u:4153: u17.33ef/.na ca^indriyāṇāṃ praviviktir asti tasmān na varṇāś caturo bhavanti//
K10divav33u:4154: u17.34ab/.mantrair hi yadi labhyeta svargaṃ tu gamanaṃ dvijaḥ/
K10divav33u:4156: u17.34ef/.yasmāt kṛṣṇāni śuklāni karmāṇi saphalāni hi/
K10divav33u:4158: u17.35/.mānavaka^śateṣu sa tatra vinihato mahā^yaśasā triśaṅkunā puṣkarasārī brāhmaṇo +abravīt/
K10divav33u:4160: bhavān hi brahmā indraś ca kauśikaḥ/
K10divav33u:4165: u17.36ab/.jñānena hi tvaṃ parameṇa yuktaḥ svaṣu śāstreṣu bhavān kṛtārthaḥ/
K10divav33u:4166: u17.36cd/.śreṣṭho viśiṣṭo paramo +asi loke bhavān hi vidyā^caraṇena yuktaḥ//
K10divav33u:4167: u17.37ab/.dadāmi te +ahaṃ prakṛtiṃ mamāmalāṃ śīlena rūpeṇa guṇair upetaḥ/
K10divav33u:4168: u17.37cd/.śārdūlakarṇaḥ prakṛtiś ca bhadrā ubhau rametaṃ rucitaṃ mama^idaṃ//
K10divav33u:4169: u17.38ab/.pragṛhya bhṛṅgāram udaka^prapūrṇam āvarjito brāhmaṇo hṛṣṭa^cittaḥ/(p.208)
K10divav33u:4170: u17.38cd/.anupradāsīd udakena kanyakāṃ śārdūlakarṇasya iyam astu bhāryā//
K10divav33u:4172: u17.40ab/.kṛtvā niveśaṃ sa tadātmajasya gatvā^āśrame +asau nagaraṃ yaśasvī/
K10divav33u:4173: u17.40cd/.dharmeṇa vai kārayati svarājyaṃ kṣemaṃ subhikṣaṃ ca sadā^utsava^ādyaṃ // iti/
K10divav33u:4174: u17.41/.syād bhikṣavo yuṣmākaṃ kāṅkṣā vā vimatir vā vicikitsā vā/
K10divav33u:4175: anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena triśaṅkur nāma mātaṅga^rājo +abhūvaṃ/
K10divav33u:4176: syād evaṃ ca bhikṣavo yusmākam anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena śārdūlakarṇā nāma mātaṅga^rāja^kumāro +abhūt/
K10divav33u:4178: eṣa sa ānando bhikṣuḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena śārdūlakarṇā nāma mātaṅga^rāja^kumāro
K10divav33u:4179: +abhūt/ syād evaṃ yuṣmākam anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena puṣkarasārī nāma brāhmaṇo +abhūt/
K10divav33u:4181: eṣa śāradvatīputro bhikṣuḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena puṣkarasārī nāma brāhmaṇo +abhūt/
K10divav33u:4182: na^anyā sā tena kālena tena samayena puṣkarasāriṇo brāhmaṇasya prakṛtir nāma māṇavikā duhitā^abhūt/
K10divav33u:4184: eṣā sā prakṛtir bhikṣuṇī tena kālena
K10divav33u:4185: tena samayena puṣkarasāriṇo brāhmaṇasya prakṛtir nāma māṇavikā duhitā^abhūt/
K10divav33u:4186: sā etarhi (p.209) tena^eva snehena tena^eva premṇā +anandaṃ bhikṣuṃ gacchantam anugacchati tiṣṭhantam anutiṣṭhati/
K10divav33u:4187: yad yad eva kulaṃ piṇḍāya praviśati tatra tatra^eva dvāre tūṣṇīṃ bhūtā +asthāt/
K10divav33u:4188: u17.42/.atha khalu bhagavān etasmin nidāne etasmin prakaraṇe tasyāṃ velāyām imāṃ gāthām abhāṣata/
K10divav33u:4190: u17.43cd/.etena jāyate prema candrasya kumude yathā//
K10divav33u:4191: u17.44/.tasmāt tarhi bhikṣavo +anabhisamitānāṃ caturṇām ārya^satyānām abhisamayāya,
K10divav33u:4193: utsāha unnatir aprativāṇiḥ smṛtyā saṃprajanyena apramādato yogaḥ caraṇīyaḥ/
K10divav33u:4194: drutam eṣāṃ caturṇā duḥkhasya^ārya^satyasya duḥkha^samudayanya nirodhasya nirodha^gāminyāḥ pratipada ārya^satyasya amīṣāṃ caturṇām ārya^satyānām
K10divav33u:4195: anabhisamitānām abhisamayāya^adhimātraṃ tīvra^cchando vīryaṃ vyāyāma utsāha unnatir aprativāṇiḥ smṛtyā saṃprajanyena^apramādato yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ/
K10divav33u:4196: u17.45/.(p.210) asmiṃś ca khalu punar dharma^paryāye bhāṣyamāṇe bhikṣūṇāṃ ṣaṣṭi^mātrāṇām anupādāyāsravebhyaś cittāni vimuktāni/
K10divav33u:4197: saṃbahulānāṃ śrāvakāṇāṃ brahmaṇāṃ gṛhapatīnaṃ ca virajaskaṃ vigata^malaṃ dharma^cakṣur udapādi viśuddhaṃ/
K10divav33u:4199: ātta^manasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan/
